story:
Overview

In this sequel to the highly-touted BLACK TIGER: LEGACY OF FURY, Assistant Defense Attorney Jenn Fong must balance her career and personal life with her blossoming power and responsibilities as Black Tiger. In order to save the city of Los Santos and restore the disgraced names of both the Fong family and the Black Tiger, Jenn must go farther, dig deeper, and bring it with more bone-crushing kung fu than ever before. This is an 88-page full-color graphic novel with production 100% COMPLETE!! This Indiegogo campaign offers readers a chance to own a printed, limited edition collectible of this modern-day martial arts masterpiece!

Story

As the unexpected recipient of mystical martial arts super powers that have been in her family for three generations, Jenn strives to restore the heroic legacy of her father while warring factions bring the city of Los Santos to the brink of implosion.

Driven by the unsolved murder of her father and defamation of his name both as an officer of the peace and as Black Tiger, Jenn wages a personal and professional battle against injustice.

Jenn's purpose and the unpredictability of her new powers collide as the socially downtrodden meta-humans poise themselves for an insurrection that threatens not only the social fabric of the city, but also unmasks the true forces behind the death and desecration of her father's legacy. 

The Dream Team

Created/written by John Hervey (Troubleman), with pencils by Rod "Super" Luper (Star Wars: Outlander), covers by Valerio Giangordano (Savage Avengers) & Eduardo Ramirez Viera (Jinnrise), colors by Vincius Townsend (G.I. Joe) & Beezzz Studios, and letters by Marco Della Verde (Achille's Inc).

 

Get Caught Up

We are offering a second printing of the graphic novel that started it all, BLACK TIGER: LEGACY OF FURY! BLACK TIGER: LEGACY OF FURY is a no-holds-barred martial arts, super-powered adventure in which brother battles sister with the fate of their city and family legacy at stake!

BLACK TIGER: LEGACY OF FURY is a riveting story with amazing art packed into a 172-page, full-color graphic novel!

Stretch Goals!!!

$5,000 - Rod Luper's cover has now become a wraparound!!

$10,000 - One free, amazing 6" x 2" metal Dragon Bookmark to every Backer of a physical reward!!

You can also get a metal bookmark as an add-on or part of one of the tier bundles! You can't have too many.

Remaining Original Pages

What's up with the $500 Campaign Goal?

The budget for pencils, inks, colors and letters for 75 interior comic book pages and multiple cover/splash images is well in excess of ten thousands dollars. Fortunately the production has already been financed and completed.

Your campaign dollars will go to printing, shipping and the production of more BLACK TIGER comic books!

SHIPPING

All physical items come with an automatically generated tracking number e-mailed to you once the label is printed. We will offer replacements for any lost or damaged item. We will NOT offer refunds / replacements for books that we track as "DELIVERED", as it is your word against ours that any form of theft has occurred. Should this happen, please file a complaint with your local UPS / USPS / FEDEX provider.

We are not responsible for missing parcels after 3 months from the day they are sent out: that is when tracking information is no longer available to us, and it becomes the customer's word against our fulfillment that a package was not sent. Please read our fulfillment policies very carefully so that there is no confusion later on.

Oh, We Can Handle It! We're Professionals

Even for a graphic novel for which production is complete, it takes time to finish printing and produce merchandise. Once we receive the books, then the logistics of fulfilling the campaign perks begins. But please don't fret! We've successfully fulfilled multiple crowdfunding campaigns to the satisfaction of our backers in the past and, in the process, gained some valuable experience regarding the reward fulfillment process.

We will work diligently to fulfill all rewards in a timely fashion. Should any unforeseen delays occur, WE PROMISE TO COMMUNICATE! Backers will be given updates regarding the fulfillment process every step of the way.

We understand the faith that backers have in us. Keep your eyes on your email and the Updates tab of the campaign for frequent and timely news and announcements!

 

Other Ways You Can Help

You can also greatly help the campaign by:

Sharing the Indiegogo campaign on Facebook, Twitter, Instagram and any other social media site you are a part of helps us ensure a successful campaign as more people hear about our project!  For more info, check out www.beyondtimecomics.com!

Tell friends, family, everyone you know and everybody you meet!

Like and repost our Instagram posts, like and share our Facebook posts and Indiegogo updates and retweet our tweets... or even better, give us a shout out and include...

story:
Hello Everyone!

Art Thibert here, and we're kicking off the much anticipated finale to the origin of Black and White!  Wow, it feels great to be bringing this final volume to you.  Once again, the success of this book rests entirely where it should belong -- in the hands of people who love the characters and adventures that is the comic book genre's legacy!

Since the introductions have been made, let's jump right into the meat of the campaign!

BLACK & WHITE VOL 2

MAN VS MACHINE

THEY'RE BACK AND BADDER THAN EVER!

Black and White have boots on the ground once again as they confront Jake Chang (AKA JC) as he begins his 'burn the mother down' campaign to bring on his NEW WORLD ORDER! So that from the ashes will rise the Phoenix World order which is ruled by deadly robots with one master. 

We know that Reed and Whitney have an adversarial relationship and  that Reed is usually left holding the bag when it comes to Whitney's less than stellar decisions, but will her thirst for vengeance destroy the team before it even has a chance?  Keeping Whitney focused may just be the death of Reed.  

This graphic novel is an EPIC 64 page book written Joe Fulton and myself.  The artwork is mine while the colors are by Periya Pillai with letters are by Eric Weathers.   

 

There are lots of stretch goals and backer tiers so that we truly have something for everyone.

VOL 2 VARIANT COVER BY THE AMAZING

  KENNETH ROCAFORT    

 

VOL 2 VARIANT COVER BY THE

INCREDIBLE JOE BENNETT

This fantastic Joe Bennett cover is still a work in progress; however, in the next couple of days I will be inking this bad boy up on my YouTube channel. https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC47tEPJ2T2gEb8...  Once that is complete, we will get the great Kyle Ritter to put the finishing touches on it with his color magic.  

 

HIGH OCTANE ADVENTURE

We also have a 22 pg High Octane Adventure by the extremely talented Von Klaus and Pedro Ang.  Trust me, this stand alone comic is one you will want in your B&W collection.  

 

BLACK & WHITE VOL. 1 - 2ND PRINTING

 

GREG CAPULLO VARIANTS

Original Vol 1 Capullo Variant/Original Vol 1 Capullo Virgin Variant

ORIGINAL STORY LAYOUT PAGE ART

If you have ever wanted to own behind the scenes artwork for your favorite comic book, then these layouts are for you. They are signed pencils and inks on  5.5 x 8.5 sketch paper. They are only $40 (no shipping).  They can be found in the add on section at checkout.

 

ORIGINAL HEAD SKETCH

Receive a penciled, inked and ink-wash original head sketch with the character of your choice (no creator-owned characters, please.) done on 6" x 9" Bristol Board!  Also receive all stretch goals. 

 

STRETCH GOALS

 

Our stretch goals bring a big bang for your backing!  Here are a few of the stretch goal items.

$30,000   UNLOCKED!   This card is now YOURS!

This Black and White trading card will will look great paired with your Early Bird card! I can see a display here!

$40,000    UNLOCKED!

Boom Baby!  It's an Inko Sticker!

$50,000     UNLOCKED!

Upgraded Cover

$55,000     UNLOCKED!

Upgraded Paper Stock

$60,000     UNLOCKED!

Grab your Phoenix World Rises patch.  This patch represents the true evil of Phoenix World Alliance!

$65,000     UNLOCKED!

PDF of Joe Fulton & Art's story plot breakdowns.

$75,000     UNLOCKED!

EPILOGUE -- ​FOUR extra pages of what's to come for Reed and Whitney.  Let's get this bad boy unlocked!

$80,000     UNLOCKED!

UV Enhancements on Main Cover! 

$85,000     UNLOCKED!

Fan Art Trading Card Set!  Do you love contests?  Hey, so do we!  Here is the ultimate fan fun.  When we unlock the 85K stretch goal, start sending in your drawings of Black & White and five -- yup, five -- people will have their Black & White drawings made into a special fan art trading card  set and given out as stretch goals to everyone!  Just imagine how much fun it will be to open your Black & White mailer and see your own drawing in the box! 

So grab some paper, lick the point of your pencil and start planning the drawing of Black & White you will submit!  

$90,000

Whoo-Hoo!  We got a great stretch goal here!  A Black & White die cut sticker is now yours! But that's not all.  Hold onto your hats (and your eardrums) as Art performs a live drum solo on his YouTube. Just so you know, Art is pretty darn good on those drums!  

$100,000

Something spectacular this way comes!

 

ORIGINAL ART FOR MAIN COVER TIER

story:
Shui Entertainment is an artistic collective in which work different artists, for example illustrators, comic artists, voice actors, writers and so on.
We've decided to start this campaign for the reprint of "Bacchai", Flavia de Vita's comic book concerning the tragedy of Euripides. The volume is available in English and Italian.

Plot: The city of Thebes is struck by a strange spell: the Theban women, in the throes of a mystical fury, abandon their houses to join the Bacchantes, a colorful and mysterious group of wanderers loyal to a new olympic divinity, Dionysus. Who is this god? And what is his connection with the royal family of Thebes?

Our goal is to reach 1500€, with that amount of money we'll be able to complete the following objectives:
- print each copy of "Bacchai"
- print each poster
- print each sticker
- print each bookmark
- make each wooden keychain
- make each amigurumi
- pay Flavia's amazing work
- pay the editors and graphics
- make the shipping boxes
- pay all the shipping costs

To gain the needed money we created different perks, depending on your needs and possibilities:
- Initiated: "Bacchai" printed volume, 15€


- Acolyte: "Bacchai" printed volume + 4 stickers + 1 bookmark + 2 posters, 30€


- Bacchante: "Acolyte" + wooden keychain, 36€


- King of Thebes: "Bacchante" + Dionysus amigurumi, 56€


- God of Olympus: "King of Thebes" + 2 extra printed volumes, 86€


- Faun: "Initiated" + 2 extra printed volumes, 45€


- Idolater: all the gadgets, 42€

 

This is our first crowdfunding campaign, but we've already realized different printed volumes, during the last 2 years. Among them we have "QUASAR - QUASi stellAR", an introspective space-themed artbook designed by Beatrice "KyOo" Garofalo, and "Vitamin Sea", our own creation magazine of which there are 3 official volumes and 1 Christmas Special.

Our Founder and Art Director has previously created and made possible the realization of other printed volumes. Among them we can find "Mors in Fabula", an horror-themed artbook that collects urban legends from all over the world, which are the common thread for the events narrated in it, and "Hetzer & Friends", a collection of self-contained tank-themed comic and parody boards, created by Angelo's World.

Each contribution will bring us closer to our goal and will be immensely appreciated, but if you don't have the financial resources to contribute, don't worry, you can help us a lot by talking to your friends about this campaign!
Thank you so much in advance to anyone who decides to help us!

Here are some images as preview!

story:
NEW PLATINUM STRETCH GOAL ACHIEVED!

We did it!  Thanks to the strong support of Billy's fans, we cracked the Platinum Stretch goal in record time!  Now Billy Tucci will write and draw a new 8-page story that will be added to the Miss Fury Joy Division Graphic Novel!  The book will increase in size from 110 to 120 pages to give us this awesome bonus extra story and art!

All of Billy's fans were instrumental in making this incredible addition happen as Billy and Dynamite could not be happier to let you know about this in time for the holidays!  It's thanks to your continuing support and encouragement on this new project that Billy will now be able to tell a story packed with action, intrigue, and good old fashion heroics!  Please share with your friends and to quote Billy, let's be #Fury Strong!

 

 

Miss Fury, the Original Girl Power Super Hero is Back!

Miss Fury, real name Marla Drake, dates back to 1941 and holds the esteemed distinction of being the first female hero created by a woman in the medium. Writer and artist June Tarpé Mills chronicled the tales of the original "Cat Woman" for a full decade in newspaper strips, with the character also licensed at the time for a Marvel comic book. Mills and her heroine were more ahead of their time than even their notable first indicates. Mills dropped her first name when signing the strip to disguise her gender. When Marla was depicted wearing a bikini in a 1947 strip, 37 papers dropped the feature in protest.

Why is Miss Fury Essential Now?

In 1941 June Tarpe' Mills broke the gender barrier by creating Miss Fury in the world of comics.  We brought together an incredible creative team with a passion for World War II action and a love of the importance of this character and her creator.  Billy Tucci tells the story which picks up from the original golden age continuity with the original characters.  An incredible group of illustrators, colorists, and letterers help to bring this groundbreaking icon back to comics in an amazing 100-page original graphic novel available only on IndieGoGo. 

The Creators

Lovingly crafted by World War II historian and multiple Eisner nominated Billy Tucci (Shi, Sgt. Rock)!

Beautifully illustrated featuring the stunning artwork of artist Maria Laura Sanapo (Red Sonja & Vampirella Meet Betty & Veronica)

Beautiful colors by the amazing Ceci de la Cruz

Thoughtful lettering by Mindy Lopkin

Vibrant Variant cover by Asha Kishna

Maria Sanapo's Incredible Interior Art

That's All Great...But Will I Get The Reward If I Pledge?

We understand concerns about some projects filling after you pledge for them.  Dynamite Entertainment has a long history of creating fan-friendly comics and graphic novels.  More importantly, we have a passion for this project and are working around-the-clock to finish it.  The script is done, the interior art is flowing, and you can see the amazing colors above.  This book will be finished in the assigned timetable and will ship to you immediately following!

THE ULTIMATE MISS FURY SET!

 

ADD-ONS

These items can be added to any order during checkout! Just look for these options listed across the bottom of the screen when you review your order.

Please note - one of the graphics on the trading cards set and the frameable print collections contains tasteful nudity in an homage to a 1940s Tarpe Mills illustration.  Buyers of these items must be 18+ years old to purchase.  Thank you.

story:
DragonGuard  Artist Kevin Sharpe here .

I'd like to Introduce you to Dragon Guard. Before I do, I want to tell you about myself. I'm a 25 year veteran of the comics Industry. I've worked for Marvel , DC , Dynamite Entertainment, Image , Crossgen, and IDW for starters. I've drawn some of the most popular characters in comics, From Thor, to Xtreme Xmen, to Black panther  and Generation X and Nova as well as Legion of SuperHeroes, Man of Steel,  Katana - Shazam, and Arsenal. I've even drawn cult faves like Vampirella and Army of darkness.

 One of my biggest passions, is Fantasy, BIG , BOLD,  80’s cartoon Fantasy. Beyond anything I've ever drawn, DragonGuard is a love letter to that era of Fantasy—like Thundercats, Masters-of the universe, Visionaries , Conan, Gargoyles, Sectaurs, and Dungeon and Dragons. I want to show you what I can do , and you'll see from the art, that this is my best looking work EVER.

Are you let down  by the big two?  Tired of your favorite books being bogged down by stories that are less and less about good comics and more about agendas????  

I am too. That's what DragonGuard is here for ...the Fans!!

What is DRAGONGUARD?

On the faraway planet of Mysterra, an ancient evil arises that threatens the cosmos. A long forgotten order of mystic warriors called the DragonGuard return to find,  protect, and train the heralded sword bearer.......the teenage son of a humble blacksmith!

DragonGuard is a 60 page,  full color,  Epic Fantasy comic, that's a love letter to the fantasy cartoons of the glorious 80's .  If you love Thundercats, He-man, Visionaries, Conan, Sectaurs or Gargoyles or if you miss the bombastic excitement of 90's comics like Pitt, Wildcats or BATTLE CHASERS, then this comic is FOR YOU!!

 

I NEED YOU!

To make this comic a reality, I need BACKERS and that means you. 

While I can draw this book,  I can't pay for everything to produce it. I can give you highly detailed pencils, but I can't pay for colors , letters, production costs, and printing. 

When you back the book, and select from perks,  you help fund these costs, so I can give you the most exciting art I can wring from these hands.

You can see throughout the campaign examples of my pencils, inking, and the color work in the book....REAL EXAMPLES. Not promotional art, not proposed art...THE ACTUAL COMIC ART. What you see, is what I have ready, and what YOU CAN TRUST you will get.


Joining me on this book is my creative team.

My creative team includes:

Loren Bobbitt--My editor and co-writer.  She's the creator, writer and artist of Unconquered on Webtoons. 

Alonso Espinoza--the main colorist for the book. He does Amazing work .  You see it right before your eyes. I want vibrant colors because I want kids to love this too and Alonso delivers!!!

Eric Weathers- He letters Everything.   He also has a book called Flying Fortress.

Bob Stone --Logo man and main production guy for the book. He worked on Jaw Breakers. 

 

 

and Me--Ill be drawing and Inking mostly everything.

 

I say MOSTLY, because there's some surprises for you . A guest cover or two along with cards, prints, and stretch goals that, if you dig my art, then you'll dig them as well!

You'll be Funding me to pay:

The creative team.

Printing-- I'm looking to print this as a perfect bound graphic novel not a floppy. But it depends on FUNDING! 

Shipping  for the books and the perks you will sign up for. 

Supplies ---the small stuff like mailers and mylar protectors to protect your investment in the dream!

 


 

Villains Cover B

 

 

OK. With any project there can be hiccups along the way. Right now the biggest unknown factor is with the current Coronavirus.  Some large printers have issued delays. My hope by printing in late October is to cushion any potential delays by a printer.  BUT because of the unusual times we are experiencing, its difficult to predict every bump in the road with our partners, We WILL keep you informed if theres any problems. You also have the option to back out at anytime BEFORE THE CAMPAIGN ENDS.  Also Barring any serious illness or complications with my health ( diabetes) I will work to be on time and will be giving you the best work of my career!  I will being updating looks at art weekly so you feel you are informed of progress.

story:
About

Welcome to the campaign for the Silverline Christmas Special 2021, the first of its kind. It will be published by Silverline Comics, a genre-spanning independent comic book and graphic novel publisher. The stories are all done, all we need now is  YOU!

The Stories

The Christmas Special is a trade paperback/squarebound softcover. It will contain at least FIFTEEN--yes, 15!--stories by Silverline creators and their books.

Each of the stories are 6 pages each and all of them are Christmas themed. There are a lot of creators involved. Included are (in alphabetical order):

  • Beah: Roland Mann - writer; Haley Martin - artist; Brian Dale - letterer.
  • Capetown: Brent T. Larson - writer; JW Franklin - artist; Mickey Clausen - colorist; Brian Dale - letterer.
  • Cat & Mouse: Roland Mann - writer; Peter Clinton - penciller; Thomas Florimonte - inker; Roberta Conroy - colorist; Brian Dale - letterer.
  • Demon's Tails: Dante Barry - writer; Cem Dayıoğlu- penciller; Thomas Florimonte - inker; Roberta Conroy - colorist; Brian Dale - letterer. 
  • Divinity: R.A. Jones/Barb Kaalberg -story; Barb Kaalberg - writer, inker, colorist; Rob Davis - penciller; Mike W. Belcher - letterer.
  • Kayless: Brent T. Larson - writer; Thomas Hedglen - penciller; Jose Fuentes - inker; Mickey Clausen - colorist; Mike W. Belcher - letterer.
  • Knight Rise: MacKenzie Wertman - writer; Quinton Bedwell - artist; Mickey Clausen - colorist; Brian Dale - letterer.
  • Obsoletes: Wes Locher - writer/letterer; Aaron Humphres - penciller; Mickey Clausen - inker; Haley Martin - colorist. 
  • Rochelle: John Crowther - writer; Dell Barras - artist; Jeremy Kahn - colorist; Brian Dale - letterer.
  • Satin's Ways: Ron Fortier - writer; Richard Jun - artist; Aiden Belcher - colorist; Mike W. Belcher - letterer.
  • SilverBlade: Dean Zachary - writer/penciller; Tom Simmons - inker; Aaron Humphres and Dan Hosek- colorists; Mike W. Belcher - letterer.
  • SilverStorm: John Metych - writer/letterer; Jaxon Renick - artist; Roberta Conroy - colorist.
  • Teen Beetle: John Crowther - writer; Henry Martinez - artist; Jeremy Kahn - colorist; Brian Dale - letterer.
  • Trumps: Kasisi Harris - writer; Thomas Hedglen - penciller; Winslow/Clausen - inkers; Mickey Clausen - colorist; Brian Dale - letterer. 
  • Twilight Grimm: R. A. Jones - writer; Rob Davis - artist; Mickey Clausen - colorist; Mike W. Belcher - letterer.
  • White Devil: R. A. Jones - writer; Jaxon Renick - artist; Jeremy Kahn - colorist; Brian Dale - letterer.
  • Wolf Hunter: Tim TK - writer; Quinton Bedwell - artist; Mickey Clausen - colorist; Mike W. Belcher - letterer.

We're still putting final touches on a few of them AND there are a couple of others we're working on to try to make it before the deadline. Fingers crossed for those!

Homage cover by Steven Butler (p), Thomas Florimonte (i), and Roberta Conroy (c).

story:
SHOTGUN SAMURAI is a 288 page manga style graphic novel

ALL CAPS artist Jose Garcia Cover!

 

BRAND NEW ARTWORK by MANGA STAR "Mangaka ODY"

and COMICSGATE VETERAN JOBALL!
 

Story

The Shotgun Samurai has left his old life behind him. After being made aware of the atrocities he has committed, he now seeks to make amends for his past life.

Shotgun Samurai, along with George and Tofu, set out to capture the Vice Regent to the Shogun.  Little did they know, the trap they set up, was actually a trap set for them! The vengeful “Ninja with No Face” has trained his whole life for this moment, when he can finally get revenge on the Shotgun Samurai!

 

100% COMPLETE!

VOL 1 will encompass the entire first story arc of the ongoing series. Currently 288 pages are completed! The book is CURRENTLY AT THE PRINTERS!

 

The World of Shotgun Samurai

Legend has it that a thousand years ago, there was a Dragon that roost atop the great mountain. To remedy his boredom, the Dragon would demand sacrifices from the village below.

Many generations passed and the citizens grew weary of the incessant sacrificing. They begged the Dragon for a break. 

The Dragon, in his arrogance, obliged. He offered them a wager, that if a champion was sent who could defeat him, he would imbue the victor with his strength. This story was widely regarded as an old wives tale…

 

A mysterious warrior, known as the “Man with the Dragon Sword,” wanders Japan in search of redemption for his past ridden with sin. Those he meets regard him as a hero, but those from his past life cannot forget the monster that lies within!

Tofu, once the top ninja of the Shogun's army, now hell bent on getting vengeance for what was taken from her.

In old Japan, there was rumored to be a Ramen so good, it could heal the world. George's ramen comes pretty close!

 

ADD ON: NUCLEAR WARHEAD SAMURAI ALTERNATE COVER

Artwork by Donkey Madness aka The Quaff with colors by Farah

Get the alternate cover for the REVOLUTIONARY 1 PAGE COMIC!!! for only $3!!

 

ADD ON: SHOTGUN SAMURAI GOES METAL!

Grab your comic book sized metal print! Choose your desired art, and add on as many other prints you want at the checkout!!

OTHER art to choose from:

MORE ADD ONS:

FOIL "Shotgun Samurai" trading card

The titular character Shotgun Samurai lovingly created by the very artist Donkey Madness and colors by Farah! Thanks to the backers we unlocked a FOIL background for this card! Get this special card with your book!  

 

"Tofu Strikes! trading card

Get this special Tofu card by Nyriam! Artist for "BONDS", get this "eye catching" card with your book!

Additional Perks:

 

Stretch goals

$1000 - UNLOCKED!!

SPECIAL JOSE GARCIA Trading Card "Breath of the Shotgun!"

Former Dreamworks and Cartoon Network artist Jose Garcia is a rising Comicsgate star!  Unlock this goal to get a free card with exclusive JOSE GARCIA art!

 

$2000 UNLOCKED!!

SHOTGUN BOOKMARKS

(The front and back of the bookmark)

 

$4000 UNLOCKED!!!

Donkey Madness special Shotgun Samurai pin-up poster

 

$5000 STRETCH GOAL! -UNLOCKED!

A SPECIAL GEORGE TRADING CARD for EVERY BACKER!

"George's Gift" by Yucky Gum

Colors by Matt Crotts

 

$7000 STRETCH GOAL-UNLOCKED!!

EVERY BACKER will get this amazing print drawn by John Dillard (creator of the Buckler)

 

10K STRETCH GOAL -UNLOCKED:

NUCLEAR WARHEAD SAMURAI

If we get to 10k, EVERYONE will get Jabba the Coach's DEBUT 1 page comic book for FREE!

GRAB the $3 ALT COVER! Available as an add on for any tier

Standard cover FREE at 10K

 

 

I am no stranger to producing books. I produced Shotgun Samurai floppies for comic shops all over New York

Thank you for your interest! share this page with everyone you know, lets make SHOTGUN SAMURAI the biggest book EVER!

story:
What would you sacrifice to save a loved one from a fate worse than death?

 

That is the question Ashyara faces on a daily basis in this broken, dying world.  Mortally wounded and running out of time, she was forced into a deal with the devil.  Now she continues her quest well beyond her natural lifespan.

 

 

Her existence sustained by the consumption of souls, Ashyara and her demonic partner Qaj find themselves in a bit of a predicament.  Their target is nearby, but a series of unfortunate events have left them completely drained with no time to recover.  And if that wasn't bad enough, another threat approaches the nearby town of Strin.

 

 

Will Ashyara give in to demonic influence and sacrifice a few to save many?  Will she decide it's not her problem and let the town fend for itself?  Or will she offer herself up in an attempt to save everyone?  Why do we even need to ask?

 

 

In the #CurrentYear comic book industry, which is filled with villains being sold as heroes, that sadly becomes a question we actually need to consider.  From this desolate, hopeless landscape, witness a new hero rise to become the ray of hope the world needs!

 

 

50 Page Main Story, with 3 side stories!

 

  • Haunted - Ashyara is stalked by a stealthy foe that refuses to engage her head on and slowly whittles away her strength.

  • Deadly Detour - A squad of Ignom Hunters face off against a fallen brother.

  • + a preview of what's going on elsewhere in the world...

 

 

Two cover choices, with one extra variant...

Cover A

 

Cover B

 

Cover B "Exposed"

(Actual book will be uncensored)

 

Rivals Wraparound Cover by Hanariel

(now only available as part of the "All Signed + Special Thanks" tier)

 

First 21 pages:

(These next 2 are a spread, but split here so they don't get compressed to unreadability)

(Another split spread coming!)

1-21 here on Twitter!:

https://twitter.com/RageGoldenEagle/status/1402804553959952384

 

The Characters:

Ashyara

The hero of our story. A former knight whose centuries long journey has refined her swordsmanship skills to perfection (on a good day), earning her the nickname "Blade Devil." Or maybe that was because of her Exoskeleton armor...

 

Qaj

Ashyara's demonic partner. While extremely weak on his own, he is capable of greatly boosting the strength of his contractor. As long as said contractor keeps him well fed anyway. And we know what demons like to eat!

 

Iuna:

The Witch of the Wastes. She is credited with destroying most of the world centuries ago, and is recognized as one of the most powerful beings in existence. And she is Ashyara's quarry. Her broken mind is all that stands between the world and total annihilation.

 

Hunters:

Special Forces who spend their lives fighting humanity's greatest threats in the wilderness. It's only because of their sacrifice that average people can sleep peacefully within safe, walled cities. Though some tend to forget this fact.

 

Barrel Shota:

Just an average boy who's simply in the wrong place at the wrong time, there's nothing special about him at all... Or is there?

 

Risks & Challenges

We already have at least half of the book finished (I say at least because it keeps growing...) and it's coming out regardless of how much money we raise.  How well this campaign does determines if there's enough interest to continue the series.

The only way this isn't happening is if either me or my artist die, end up in a coma, or some other freak accident occurs.

 

Stretch Goals

$65,000 REACHED: Each physical book will come with a pinup poster of its cover, AND this one of Moth-chan (Just a sample, with a simple background, logo, etc. to be added)

 

$90,000 REACHED: A monster(girl) bestiary will be added to the book, explaining what all these critters in the Blade Devil universe are and making them even more pleasing to look at!

$100,000 REACHED: Foil covers on all books!  We'll try a few things to see if it looks better to put foil on the entire cover or just key parts of it, but we'll make sure these books dominate your shelves.

$125,000 REACHED: All signed copies of the book will be signed by me AND the artist (provided there are no travel bans getting in the way by then).

$150,000 REACHED: Fanart Gallery added to the book!

$175,000 REACHED: "Xenodevil" jam cover art print with each book.  Be sure to check out Xenotype (also on Indiegogo) as well if you'd like this as a cover!

$200,000 REACHED: Art team gets a bonus!

Risks & Challenges
We already have at least half of the book finished (I say at least because it keeps growing...) and it's coming out regardless of how much money we raise.  How well this campaign does determines if there's enough interest to continue the series.
The only way this isn't happening is if either me or my artist die, end up in a coma, or some other freak accident occurs.
 
Stretch Goals
$65,000 REACHED: Each physical book will come with a pinup poster of its cover, AND this one of Moth-chan (Just a sample, with a simple background, logo, etc. to be added)

 
$90,000 REACHED: A monster(girl) bestiary will be added to the book, explaining what all these critters in the Blade Devil universe are and making them even more pleasing to look at!
$100,000 REACHED: Foil covers on all books!  We'll try a few things to see if it looks better to put foil on the entire cover or just key parts of it, but we'll make sure these books dominate your shelves.
$125,000 REACHED: All signed copies of the book will be signed by me AND the artist (provided there are no travel bans getting in the way by then).
$150,000 REACHED: Fanart Gallery added to the book!
$175,000 REACHED: "Xenodevil" jam cover art print with each book.  Be sure to check out Xenotype (also on Indiegogo) as well if you'd like this as a cover!

$200,000 REACHED: Art team gets a bonus!

story:
YOU WRITE 'EM, WE DRAW 'EM, WE ALL COLLECT 'EM AND HAVE HOURS, UPON HOURS OF FUN!

...And now we're back with INDIE DECK "FIRE!"

OUR SECOND EDITION

We all had them! We all collected them! Marvel and DC baseball cards! They were full of charts, Bios, Origins, Cool Pics, and POWER RATINGS! Now, INDIE DECK has brought that same collectibility to the Indie Market... And we are doing it again with our second edition...

THE FIRE EDITION!

COLLECT YOUR FAVORITES, TRADE THEM, GET 'EM SIGNED,  YOU'LL MIGHT BE HOLDING ON TO A GEM ONE DAY!

CARDS THUS FAR!

Let's Bring the "Collector" back to Indie Comics!

GET IN THE DECK!
INDIE DECK!

story:
The Napalm Brothers Issue #3 - The Outlaw DB Cooper

This third installment of The Napalm Brothers concludes the current story arc in an action packed, dystopian and psychedelic finale. The artist/writer Sixth draws inspiration from underground comics of the 1960s, Grindhouse movies and a dash of Latin street culture to bring us a contemporary story about war veterans, brotherhood and the age old clash between good and evil.

TNB #3 Cover

 

 

 

TNB #3 page 2

 

TNB #3 page 12

 

The Napalm Brothers Omnibus Cover

 

TNB #1 Variant Cover Art by Max Headshroom

 

TNB #2 Variant Cover Art by Dapper tattoo

 

STRETCH GOALS

Stretch goals will be combined between the two campaigns on KS & Indiegogo.

Our first stretch goal is for a 30 caliber metal bottle opener. Once we reach combined funding of $2500 all physical backers will get a bottle opener.

 

PERKS

Physical Copies of The Napalm Brothers Issues 1-3 — $6 each

  • Issue #1 is 24 pages
  • Issue #2 is 30 pages
  • Issue #3 will be 32 pages

Digital Copies of The Napalm Brothers Issues 1-3 — $5 each

 

 

$20 - Issue #3 + Swag

Includes TNB #3, print, bookmark, sticker & can koozie.

Koozie image is a mockup for reference only.

 

$20 - Catch Up - All 3 issues, both physical & digital copies.

 

$25 - TNB Omnibus

Contains issues 1-3 plus 10 pages of bonus content

 

 

$40 - Issue #3 + Swag + T-Shirt

Includes TNB #3, print, bookmark, sticker, can koozie, plus The Napalm Brothers T-shirt.

T-shirt is available in sizes XS-3XL

Koozie image is a mockup for reference only.

 

 

$54 - I Want It All!

Includes:

  • Physical copy of TNB #1 — Variant Cover by Max Headshroom
  • Physical copy of TNB #2 — Variant Cover by Dapper tattoo
  • Physical copy of TNB #3
  • Digital copy of TNB #1
  • Digital copy of TNB #2
  • Digital copy of TNB #3
  • T-shirt
  • Bookmark
  • Print
  • Sticker
  • Can Koozie

 

$63  - LCS Bundle!

Are you a Comic Shop and want to get TNB in your store?  Get 5 copies of each issue.  This is for LCS' only.

 

 

ADD-ONS

Add-ons available during checkout:

  • $5 - Digital Copies
  • $5 - Can Koozie
  • $6 - Physical Copies
  • $14 - Swag Pack
  • $20 - T-shirt

 

The Napalm Brothers was created by Sixth Scale Combat.  Sixth has done it all — writing, artwork and lettering. 

Fanatic Comics has joined with Sixth to get the books printed and to handle fulfillment.

If you have questions, contact us at fanatic_IGG@fanaticcomics.com

We will keep you abreast of all phases of this project as we move forward. Full transparency is important to us. 

 

SHIPPING

We ship with Gemini and only Gemini. Gemini today and Gemini tomorrow. Gemini all day.  Did we mention we only use Gemini mailers?

All books will be bagged/boarded and secured in Gemini mailers.

 

How can you help?

If you can contribute to our campaign, that is wonderful! If you cannot contribute by pledging, you can still help spread the word. Please use the share links at the top of the page to help get the word out to others who may be interested in backing the campaign.

In either case, we appreciate your support.

 

Risks and challenges

As with any project, there are always unforeseen circumstances that cause delays. The Napalm Brothers Issue #3 is scheduled to go to print in December.  Roughly 10 pages are complete and the rest is thumbnailed & lettered. We have considered possible printing & shipping delays and the holidays that will occur during this period. That is why we've projected fulfillment by February 2022.

story:
Welcome to Glyn in Monster Land

Monster Land is a world where evil has won. Grotesque creatures roam freely, leaving havoc in their wake, and the only people left are too stupid to be scared by them. Once a common wonder, magic is now dying, and what little remains its rulers desperately scheme and horde for themselves.

After failing an audition for a tyrant King, an apprentice witch named Glyn is banished to a dungeon and left to rot. She quickly discovers she is not alone and that her fellow inmates are a crazy bunch of Bright Magic monsters. Refusing to give up, Glyn forms a gang and attempts to break out of prison and overthrow their evil masters!

Thanks for checking out our comic book!

Glyn in Monster Land is a 48-page fantasy adventure that will entertain everyone young and old.

The comic is a complete and self-contained story bringing you pure escapism and laugh-out-loud comedy. A mix of The Dragon Prince, She-ra, Robin Hood, and Blackadder, there is something for everyone!

Everything is 100% finished!! Art, colors, and lettering, it's all done and ready to print!

Every page is illustrated by prolific European artist Luisa Russo who has worked for publishers Drakoo, Glénat, Piemme, Clair de Lune, Dark Horse, and several successful crowdfunds!

The book will have 48 pages of story and will be American-sized, stapled comic on 130gsm gloss paper stock. We will also include four pages of concept art, so 52 pages altogether.

The comic will be bagged, boarded, and posted in a Gemini mailer or a sturdy C-COM Bukwrap mailer which is very similar.

We have worked hard on Monster Land, but only YOU can bring it to life! Your support not only helps produce this book but will also help us turn it into a series.

Luisa designed this fantastic sheet of 8 kiss-cut Chibi art stickers that you can pick up at checkout. Don't miss them!

 

 

 

 

For more art and information about the characters, do visit our website!

https://glynvsmonsterland.com/about/

 

FREE STUFF FOR THE GLYN ARMY!

Check out this gorgeous hologram sticker!

Everyone who backed Monster Land before we went to print will receive a 125mm hologram sticker with every physical copy!

We are also giving away a bookmark and paper doll sheet too! These are limited only to early backers.

 

Risks & Challenges

All production creating the comic is complete! All 48 pages are beautifully drawn, lettered, colored, and ready to go to the printers. Apart from a pandemic lockdown or act of God, there will be no delays, and you will receive your book no matter what! We have listed the campaigns' fulfillment date as December in case of interference from government lockdowns, but we are confident that early backers will get their books before Halloween!

 

Can't Contribute But Want To Help?

That's okay, but please help us by spreading the word about Glyn in Monster Land to all your friends and family. Indiegogo's share button is really quick to use. Sharing is caring!

story:
RAGETALITY's WAR is a 56-page Perfect Bound Graphic Novel. Featuring 48 pages of story and 8 pages of bonus content. Every physical book automatically receives 2 BONUS campaign exclusive collector trading cards.

RAGETALITY's WAR is the ALL NEW pedal to the metal installment from the Ninety Four comic book universe, brought to you by the series creator, writer, artist, and colorist SHELBY ROBERTSON. At the beginning of this story, you are catapulted into the world of the future. We witness the aftermath of Ragetality, Slamm, and Clinton's haphazardly botched time-travel missions from the original Ninety Four series. They got a score to settle with their employer who set them up, but there's a plethora of obstacles set in their path. Hot on their trail are Painn, Lana, and Alanis, who happen to be their rival time-travelling hired guns. This book is a melting pot of Sci-Fi, Superhero, Anti-Hero, Humor, with a splash of 90's Nostalgia. ALSO be sure to consider adding the INDRAWN Ashcan set, which is 48 pages of ALL-NEW story that ties directly into Ragetality's War #1. It serves as an Intermission of sorts. We are offering 2 different Cover Editions for the RAGETALITY's WAR #1. Each physical copy includes 2 campaign exclusive trading cards, (PLUS all applicable Stretch Goal items in every order).

 

 

INDRAWN ASHCAN SET of 3: These INDRAWN Ashcans are tales set apart from the core Ragetality's War book, but are crafted SPECIFICALLY so that if you, THE READER, decides to integrate them as part of the story, so be it. Think of them as an intermission tales. They equal an additional 48 pages of ALL-NEW action packed black and white content.

 

RAGETALITY'S WAR INTERIOR SAMPLES:

 

INDRAWN ASHCAN SAMPLES:

INDRAWN ASHCAN DOUBLE PAGE SPREAD

INDRAWN ASHCAN INTERIOR PAGE

INDRAWN ASHCAN INTERIOR PAGE

 

ADD-ONS:

 

 

CAMPAIGN STRETCH GOALS:

  •   1. Goal 4,700 USD - UNLOCKED FREE Exclusive Mini Print added to every physical book order.
  •   2. Goal 5,500 USD - UNLOCKED FREE 2 ADDITIONAL Exclusive trading cards added to every physical book order. That makes 4 cards in all PER physical copy.
  •   3. Goal 6,500 USD - UNLOCKED FREE Ragetality Sticker added to every physical book order.
  •   4. Goal  7,500 USD - UNOCKED 14 PAGE PROLOGUE PLUS 4 ADDITIONAL Story Pages added to Ragetality's War, making the book 74 pages!
  •   5. Goal 8,500 USD - UNOCKED FREE ADDITIONAL Exclusive trading card added to every physical book order and Sticker upgraded to foil. That makes 5 cards in all!
  •   6. Goal 9,500 USD - UNLOCKED FREE Ragetality poker chip added to every backer order.
  •   7. Goal 10,500 USD - UNLOCKED NINETY FOUR ROLLED POSTER made available for purchase PLUS ADDITIONAL Ragetality RageBall Sticker added to every physical book order.
  •   8. Goal 11,000 USD - UNOCKED FREE Ragetality Bookmark added to every physical book order.
  •   9. Goal 13,000 USD - UNOCKED FREE 2 ADDITIONAL Exclusive trading cards added to every physical book order. That makes 7 cards in all!
  •   10. Goal 15,000 USD - UNLOCKED FREE 12 Page Ragetality's War Issue #2 ASHCAN Preview.
  •   11. Goal 17,000 USD - UNLOCKED 4 ADDITIONAL Pages added to the Ragetality's War Issue #2 ASHCAN Preview, making it 16 pages and 2nd stretch goal sticker gets upgraded to foil.
  •   12. Goal 19,000 USD - UNLOCKED FREE Exclusive FOIL Baseball style Ragetality trading card added to every physical book order. That makes 7 Regular trading cards PLUS 1 Foil trading card in all!
  •   13. Goal 21,500 USD - UNLOCKED FREE ADDITIONAL 'Homage' mini-print PLUS FREE ADDITIONAL Ragetality RageBall VARIANT EDITION Sticker.
  •   14. Goal 22,222 USD - UNLOCKED FREE EXCLUSIVE 3 trading card CONNECTING set for every physical book order. These 3 cards will connect to create a panoramic pinup image.
  •   15. Goal 25,500 USD - UNLOCKED FREE Ragetality's War ASHCAN SKETCHBOOK added to every physical book order.
  •   16. Goal 27,250 USD - UNLOCKED 4 pages added to Ragetality's War ASHCAN SKETCHBOOK, making it 16 pages in all!
  •   17. Goal 33,333 USD - LOCKED Special Double Sided Ragetality's War Mini-Print added to every physical book order.


RISKS AND CHALLENGES:
Since I am handling all production; writing, line-art, and coloring on Ragetality's War, projected date for fulfillment is January 2022. If funding allows, I'll be able to outsource some of the coloring work, which would make fulfillment a tad sooner. Regardless of that, as a personal goal of mine, I'm aiming at beating the January delivery date, just as I did on my previous 2 campaigns *Shelby Robertson Sketchbook, Ninety Four Vol. 1*, both shipped OVER A MONTH earlier than projected. I will be publishing updates regularly on this campaign regarding progress and preview imagery :) I appreciate each and every one of you!!

 

OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELP:
We understand that some of you are not able to support RAGETALITY's WAR by contributing money. Not a problem! We encourage you to share our campaign link through your social media pages and word of mouth. We appreciate all forms of support on our books and appreciate you for taking the time to do so!! Together we can keep comic books innovative and indie strong!

story:
The book

DOWNCAST: Submerged is an 80-page perfect-bound graphic novel. Including a 64-page main story, an 8-page back-up story, and extras.

The main story script, art and coloring is FINISHED. 

The story continues where the hit series left off.

Life is finally normal for Joanne and Jax. The tragedies of their past begin to fade as they each work at new apprenticeships. But their peace is suddenly shattered when a strange diver comes to strata looking for war with the gods. Joanne and Jax are forced to choose between their new lives or joining the diver on his hunt for false gods - a course that would permanently disrupt the future of humanity.   

 

"All for Owen" (2011) is a novel set in the post-apocalyptic rocky mountains. When a quiet community receives an omen of death, it's up to four teenage boys to travel across their valley to look for a cure. 

Creative Team:

Writer - Clint Stoker

Art - Ignacio Lazaro 

Letters - Eric Weathers

 

Stretch Goals:

$10,000 - Lettering Begins

$13,000 - Pre-Press Begins

$15,000 - Bookmarks for Everyone

$20,000 - Printing Proofs Begin

$25,000 - Spot Gloss UV on The Cover

$30,000 - Foil Stamped Cover

$35,000 - Sewn Binding

story:
THE STORY SO FAR:

On October 3rd, 1996 at precisely 10:30 PM the lives of Kierra and Nora changed forever. Both woke up with strange super powers, and soon discovered they weren't the only one's. Now they are in the middle of a time twisting world of gods and monsters, and must juggle Saving the World and Paying the Bills!

STW is a genre bending comic blending the humor, and sensibilities of 90's underground comics, with the high flying action of traditional super hero comics.

BUT YOU DON'T HAVE TO TAKE MY WORD FOR IT:

"It is like a better version of Ghost World with boobs."- Adam Lawson

"One of the newest and exciting voices and art in indy comics today. Period."- Eric Kent

"The most fun I've had since Johnny The Homicidal Maniac."-Dan Sacharow

"I'm in love with Hobo Girl. She's a fighter with an A+ underboob game."- NANCO

"always puts the extra effort in what he ships out. Puts a lot of people to shame."-Eric Hawkins

"Remember MTV animation like Beavis and Butthead?  That, but 100x better, with clever writing that delivers depth and humor in equal measure, on point artistry, and a tone only Tonic Comix could deliver. Miss it at our collective peril."-Cody Fernandez

 STW #6 SYNOPSIS:

The homeless population of Maplewood City have been disappearing at a terrifying rate, but the only person to notice is Hobo-Girl. Finding that she may be in over her head she reaches out to the On Call Heroes, Kierra and Nora. Their investigation leads them to the sewers of Maplewood, where ghastly beasts have created a subterranean empire led by the diabolical Hive Mother.

Stretchgoals!!

Of course there’s stretchgoals! We got stickers and posters gallore! Also if we reach $6,000 every physical order gets upgraded to a perfectbound edition! How awesome is that!?

 PREVIEW

WHO IZ TONIC COMIX?!

Tonicmole and Hunny

Tonicmole and Hunny combine like Voltron to publish the most exciting comix to hit the scene since Spider-man first did whatever a spider can! 

 

FINAL PLEA:

Buy our comix so we can eat please. We've discovered we need to eat at least two times a day, everyday. Though this is a major hassle, we've found no way around it. You see, for some reason, we get dizzy. Buying our comix insures we don't die, and/or get evicted, so....please buy our comix.
story_txt: THE STORY SO FAR:On October 3rd, 1996 at precisely 10:30 PM the lives of Kierra and Nora changed forever. Both woke up with strange super powers, and soon discovered they weren't the only one's. Now they are in the middle of a time twisting world of gods and monsters, and must juggle Saving the World and Paying the Bills!STW is a genre bending comic blending the humor, and sensibilities of 90's underground comics, with the high flying action of traditional super hero comics.BUT YOU DON'T HAVE TO TAKE MY WORD FOR IT:"It is like a better version of Ghost World with boobs."- Adam Lawson"One of the newest and exciting voices and art in indy comics today. Period."- Eric Kent"The most fun I've had since Johnny The Homicidal Maniac."-Dan Sacharow"I'm in love with Hobo Girl. She's a fighter with an A+ underboob game."- NANCO"always puts the extra effort in what he ships out. story:
September 28, 2021:

WHOA! BEARDZZERKER is being printed!  We hope to get them in next couple weeks so we can start fulfilling orders!

Check out the special OPEN MIC special offer...get all 7 #1 issue variants for $69 with free US shipping, dudes and dudettes!

 

WE ALSO JUST RECEIVED A VERY LIMITED NUMBER OF BEARDZZERKER T-SHIRTS TO SELL! 


LET PEOPLE KNOW WHO YOUR FAVE AXE GUITAR-TOTING HERO IS! $30 + SHIPPING

$9K & $10K STRETCH GOALS HAVE NOW BEEN UNLOCKED!

 

ALL BACKERS WILL NOW GET A BONUS TRADING CARD & STICKER!

 

 

STRETCH GOAL UNLOCKED! $8,000: All Backers will now get a ROCK STAR SATIN RIBBON BOOKMARK!

 

STRETCH GOAL UNLOCKED! $7,000: All Backers will get a BeardZZerker Color Guitar Pick from Picks Of Destiny!

WE'RE FULLY FUNDED, IN DEMAND & GETTING THE BOOK DONE! PLEASE BACK & SHARE NOW!


 

GET READY TO ROCK!


JUST ADDED! THE JIM O'RILEY "BEARDZZERKER'S EXCELLENT ADVENTURE COVER" SHOWN BELOW!
We are only offering this cover for the final days of the campaign, which closes soon!

JUST $15 plus low shipping or get all 7 cool covers!


PARODY PRESS COMICS brings you BEARDZZERKER!  
IT'S A "ROCK N' ROLL RIPPED VAN WINKLE" HEAVY METAL WARRIOR  ADVENTURE!

The 32-page book is written by DON CHIN, drawn by BILL MAUS, Colored by KAT MAUS, Lettered by KEITH GLEASON, with Graphic Design by LAURA CHIN!

We're asking YOU, dear reader, in the classic words of Meatloaf, to help make this "Rock N' Roll Dream Come Through!" Back this EXCITING book today!  Here's why...


HE'S NOT GONNA TAKE IT ANYMORE!!

Our Hero awakens from a 30-year coma to right the modern world's wrongs: a viral Rick Astley earworm pandemic, killer murder hornet invasion, selfish millennial musicians and more!





 

BEARDZZERKER wields “The Shredder”, a massive custom guitar “axe” forged of steel gifted to him by his old friend Genghis Khan. It is supernaturally empowered by the IMMORTAL ROCK N' ROLL GODS WHO GIVE IT THUNDEROUS POWERS FROM THE HEAVENS!

Get all Seven Bad-@$$ Variant Covers!

BEARDZZERKER VS. THE MURDER HORNET HORDE!

CAANAN WHITE pulls out all the stops as BEARDZZERKER, Cat Stevens & Holly fight a ravenous horde of Killer Murder Hornets!  Colored by MATT YACKEY!


 


 

SPECIAL GUEST COVER VARIANT #1
STARRING THE BODACIOUS BABE


 

BEARDZZERKER/SHI #1 variant cover by BILL MAUS and colored by MATT YACKEY! 
(Big Thanks to BILLY & DEB TUCCI for allowing us do this amazing cover collaboration with their beloved heroine!)​ 



BUT WAIT, THERE'S MORE! MAKE WAY FOR 
THE BRUTE!  REIGNBOW BRUTE, THAT IS!
 


 

BEARDZZERKER VS. ETHAN VAN SCIVER'S REIGNBOW THE BRUTE "BRUTE DEALER" COVER #1!

THIS MAY BE RTB's FIRST APPEARANCE IN PRINT!

Master Illustrator PRESTON ASEVEDO pulls out all the stops on this FRANK FRAZETTA "Death Dealer" Fantasy Art Homage!

Don't miss your chance to own this amazing original painted art, too!

Thank you, EVS, and ALL CAPS COMICS, for letting us portray "The Last Real Man in Fairyland" oozing his Toxic Masculinity and adopting the newly ownerless feline, Cat Stevens!





BEHOLD THE POWER OF THE SHREDDER!

 "THE MIGHTY BEARDZZERKER!" VARIANT COVER #1 by DAX MARTIAN! 
Dax (Hail Salad) unleashes this awesome JACK KIRBY inspired version of our hero and his friends, Rupert, Cat Stevens and Holly! 
 




BODACIOUS BOX OFFICE BEARDZZERKER!

​BEARDZZERKER MOVIE POSTER COVER VARIANT #1 
by THAD RHODES who does a Hollywood themed masterpiece that will pump...you up! 



Get the TOTALLY TRIUMPHANT USASSASSIN VARIANT #1!

​

THEY'RE BOTH BORN IN THE USA & BAD TO THE BONE!

THIS GLORIOUS ALL-AMERICAN THEMED VARIANT COVER #1 by USAssassin's MIKE McMAHON and colored by MATT YACKEY will be an awesome wrap-around piece featuring BEARDZZERKER, USASSASSIN, Holly, Bazooka Dog and Cat Stevens!

Thanks to Co-Creators Mike McMAHON and Mark Poulton for letting us use their amazing action-packed heroes!

​



Cats of Characters...Uh, we mean, CAST OF CHARACTERS!

Meet CAT STEVENS, a kitty from the 'Hood and BEARDZZERKER'S trusty feline companion.  He's furry, fierce and also plays a mean set of drums!

RUPERT: A mysterious Secret Agent (who might not be from this dimension), ordered to awaken BEARDZZERKER!  Only he knows the seven words you can't say in this parody!

HOLLY BERRY:  A beautiful farmer's daughter who doesn't take any bull!



MOST HEINOUS KILLER MURDER HORNETS WHO ARE ATTACKING CITIZENS AND EATING ALL OF OUR CROPS!


AGENTS UZI, DOUBLE GLOCK, HANS KNUCKLES & FRANZ BRATWURST want to mess BEARDZZERKER up...BIG TIME! And wait til you see their Kingpin boss, DOLPHIN!


 

DUDE...DON'T DELAY!
BACK US TODAY!


 

Our First 25 Backers Will Get a 3" Cat Stevens Die-Cut Sticker!  (Ain't he cute?)



PICK BEARDZZERKER & Get These

TOTALLY AWESOME Stretch Goals!

 

  • UNLOCKED! $7,000: All Backers will get a BeardZZerker Color Pearlescent Guitar Pick!

  • $8,000:  All Backers will get a Rock Star Satin Ribbon 7" Bookmark!

  • NEXT STRETCH GOAL TIERS:

  • $11,000: All Backers will get a BeardZZerker Print

  • $12,000: All Backers will get a BeardZZerker Magnet...and many more surprises in store as we go skyward!


GET THE HEAVY METAL BEARDZZERKER "KISS MY AXE" SOUNDTRACK BY LAZ NOVAK, TOO! JUST $7!

Guitar Prodigy LAZ NOVAK delivers a sizzling BEARDZZERKER .Mp3 Album!
Listen to seven awesome tracks for the ultimate Face-Melting Experience!

Click Below To Listen to a Sample!



CHECK OUT OUR STELLAR SKETCH CARDS TIERS...STARTING AT $50!



AND OUTSTANDING BILL MAUS ORIGINAL ART PAGE TIERS BUNDLED WITH SIGNED COMICS STARTING AT $175!
 


OWN THE PRESTON ASCEVEDO INKED COVER!
 

Thank you for helping us make the world laugh again, and for those about to ROCK, WE SALUTE YOU!



Don Chin and Bill Maus

Parody Press Co-Founders

Help Us Spread The Word On Social Media! 
Please use the Indiegogo media links below to share on Twitter, Facebook and more!

story:
COMPASS COMICS presents the MUST HAVE comic book of 2021!

Hello, my friends and welcome to the second Compass Comics IGG campaign! I'm Graham Nolan, a 38 year veteran of the comic book industry, writer/artist and long time Batman illustrator as well as the co-creator of Bane! I am having the time of my life creating a new universe that is centered around horror, monsters, sci-fi and the supernatural. All of my books will interconnect to form a connected universe that my characters and events will cohabitate. I am passionate about comics and the art form. I hope you are too and will come along for the ride!

Thanks for taking a look and backing true independent comics!

Best,

Graham

​

Art by Graham Nolan and colors by the talented Elizabeth Breitweiser!

The Story

It's 1957 and the Russians have just launched Sputnik into orbit. The world was changing and WWII veteran Travis Houston was struggling to adapt.

All Travis wanted when he mustered out of the Marine Corps, at the end of WWll, was some peace and quiet and a safe place to raise his son, James, but the horrors he experienced in the Pacific, and the death of his wife, have left him empty and distant.

The meteor shower changed all that. Only it wasn't a meteor shower. It was an invasion. Creatures from another world want ours, and the only thing standing between them and us is a man, a boy, and his dog.

The Houstons are vastly outnumbered, but they are Texans and they have each other...so the odds might just be even.

 

THE FIRST 5 INTERIOR PAGES (to be colored)!

FREE STUFF!!

 

GET SIGNED COMICS!

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

The Book

Because of all of you, many of the stretch goals have been hit so the book will now be a 64pg, full color, Perfect Bound, comic with a matte finish card stock cover. Wraparound Cover-A will also have a spot varnish on the cover!

Check out the stretch goals below that have already been unlocked and all the goodies EVERY backer receives!

The Creator 

Graham Nolan is a  veteran comic book writer, artist, and publisher and the recipient of the prestigious Inkpot Award for his contributions to the comic arts. He is the co-creator of the iconic Batman villain, "Bane", the creator of "Joe Frankenstein", "Monster Island", The Chenoo", "Sunshine State" and now, "Alien Alamo".

CHARACTER SKETCHES

 

STRETCH GOALS

Everybody wins when these stretch goals are unlocked:

  • $15K- Collectible TRADING CARD! -UNLOCKED!
  • $20K- Bookmark! - UNLOCKED!
  • $25K- FULL COLOR interior art! -UNLOCKED!
  • $30K- 8 more pages of ADDED STORY CONTENT! -UNLOCKED!
  • $40K- UPGRADED COVERS  (all versions) to card stock with matte finish!- UNLOCKED!
  • $50K- UPGRADED COVER (version-A) to matte finish with SPOT VARNISH! -UNLOCKED!
  • $60K- Alien Alamo sticker for everyone- UNLOCKED!
  • $70K- All version A covers will be SIGNED by Graham Nolan (whew!)- UNLOCKED!
  • $80K-Alien Alamo Patch!- UNLOCKED!
  • $90K-Exclusive Alien (creature) sticker! UNLOCKED!
  • $100K-Spot varnish on the VARIANT COVERS!- UNLOCKED!

 

TRADING CARD- UNLOCKED

 

THE BOOKMARK-UNLOCKED

VARIANT COVERS

COVER-B by AARON LOPRESTI

 

COVER-C by BUTCH GUICE

 

 


Art for the mini-print by Graham Nolan (color by Greg Wright)

 

ORIGINAL ART AVAILABLE!

 

 

COMPASS COMICS SWAG!

Show the world who your favorite comic book company is!

 

 

Risks & Challenges

Guess what? There are none! I deliver on my promises and keep my backers in the loop and informed at every step of the process. After the campaign ends and the production work begins, I will send updates every Monday of what was accomplished the previous week.

Other Ways You Can Help

I know times are tough. If you can't financially support the campaign, please consider sharing the link and talking it up to your network of friends and colleagues. 

Thank you for checking out this campaign and considering to support it.

story:
* Please be aware that we are currently unable to ship to Australia nor New Zealand.   When this changes we will update.  Currently, any orders to these locations will be refunded.

The Story Thus Far...

After the events of Mary Machinegun  and the first few pages of Mary Machinegun Issue 2 - Mary is now not only hunting down werewolves, but is about to be hunted by her own order!  Will she have time to stop the menace to humanity, or will the menace of humanity stop Mary before she can finish her task?  Find out in Mary Machinegun Issue 2!  

Did you miss Mary Machinegun issue 1 the first time around?  No problem!  We have you covered with Mary Machinegun: Reloaded!  The previous printing of Mary Machinegun has a lettering error or two and Mary Machinegun: Reloaded brings Es Kay to the Mary Machinegun Team to not only fix those small errors, but he brings a whole new level of life to the lettering.

Mary Machinegun Issue 2 is a 42 page monster of art and story! Art and colors are by Fern Cord (Mary Machinegun, Chariot Studio), flat colors by Carol Cord (Mary Machinegun, Neo Tokyo: The Truth is a Virus), written by Max DeVill (Mary Machinegun, Knightingdale), Edited by Johnny Reed (stolen from the corporate world) with lettering by Es Kay (The Listener, XCT, The Camelot Gang).  Mary Machinegun Issue 2 promises and delivers on tons more action and drama.  (Seriously, about 80% of this book is action for you action junkies).  Check out the covers and other offerings below.  Any one of them would be perfect for a bad girl comic collector.

*Mary Machinegun: Reloaded is available in the Digital Deluxe Tier, The Physical Catch Up Tier and as an ADD ON to physical purchases.

Who is Mary Machinegun?

Mary, a member of the Templar Order is tasked with hunting the supernatural in order to keep humanity safe.  After destroying a vampire, she is tasked with going undercover in a small town in Kentucky; this time to hunt an entire pack of werewolves.  While she conducts her investigation and hunt, she finds herself surrounded by not only the evil of the supernatural, but the most evil creatures of all - Mankind itself.  Will she accomplish her mission or will she fall under the spell of evil that seems to permeate humanity to it's core?

METAL COVER!

For those of you that are extremely discerning when it comes to your comic book purchases, we offer the Ed Benes cover in a Metal Cover format!  This cover is guaranteed to blow you away with its color and metallic variation.  Please be aware that there are only #3 through #9 available.

LET'S GET NAUGHTY!

Grab your own collection of four nude 6"x9" nude prints of Mary, Charlotte, and Ophelia as well as Fern Cord's COVER A's NAUGHTY EDITION!

MARY MACHINEGUN CALENDAR

That's right!  The Mary Machinegun character calendar has returned!  This time we take a look at the many different aspects of Ophelia's life!  Perfect for a desk that needs a little sexiness on it!

MARY MACHINEGUN STANDUP

One of our most popular items have returned for the second Mary Machinegun Kickstarter!  If you didn't get a Mary Machinegun cardboard stand-up last time you're definitely not going to want to miss this one!  If you did grab one?  Your cardboard standup needs some company!

* Please note that due to shortages in paper materials, the cardboard standups are a little more expensive than last campaign.

 

THE FULL MARY!

The Full Mary has has returned!  And this time you can choose a Naughty Variant or the core Cover A book to come along with nearly everything we have to offer.  You get Cover A or Cover A Variant (Naughty), a physical copy of Mary Machinegun: Reloaded, all Naughty 6"x9" prints made available, the Mary Machinegun Cardboard Standup, the Ophelia Calendar, and both Mary Machinegun: Reloaded, and Mary Machinegun Issue 2 via digital PDF.  Please note Naughty Variant runs a little more expensive due to the cost of the cover.

STRETCH GOALS

Everyone that purchases a physical product will also obtain the following items when funding hits the listed amount.  So if Mary Machinegun Issue 2 raises $4066.59 the everyone will receive the Mary Machinegun Bookmark free of charge.  If, for example, it makes $8099.43 then that opens up Mary Poker Chip #2, all 3 Mary Trading Cards and the Mary Machinegun Bookmark to be sent out with everyone's package!

-MARY MACHINEGUN BOOKMARK

This super cute bookmark has been created by Adri Travares and is perfect for marking your place in this huge 42 page book, or y'know, you could use it in other books too. 

-MARY MACHINEGUN TRADING CARDS

Trading card #1, Series 2.  Art by Fran Cord, color by Fern Cord.

Trading card #2, Series 2.  Art/Color Fern Cord

Trading card #3, Series 2.  Art/Color Fern Cord
story_txt: * Please be aware that we are currently unable to ship to Australia nor New Zealand.   When this changes we will update.  Currently, any orders to these locations will be refunded.The Story Thus Far...After the events of Mary Machinegun  and the first few pages of Mary Machinegun Issue 2 - Mary is now not only hunting down werewolves, but is about to be hunted by her own order!  Will she have time to stop the menace to humanity, or will the menace of humanity stop Mary before she can finish her task?  Find out in Mary Machinegun Issue 2!  Did you miss Mary Machinegun issue 1 the first time around?  No problem!  We have you covered with Mary Machinegun: Reloaded!  The previous printing of Mary Machinegun has a lettering error or two and Mary Machinegun: Reloaded brings Es Kay to the Mary Machinegun Team to not only fix those small errors, but he brings a whole new level of life to the lettering.Mary Machinegun Issue 2 is a 42 page monster of art and story! Art and colors are by Fern Cord (Mary Machinegun, Chariot Studio), flat colors by Carol Cord (Mary Machinegun, Neo Tokyo: The Truth is a Virus), written by Max DeVill (Mary Machinegun, Knightingdale), Edited by Johnny Reed (stolen from the corporate world) with lettering by Es Kay (The Listener, XCT, The Camelot Gang).  Mary Machinegun Issue 2 promises and delivers on tons more action and drama.  (Seriously, about 80% of this book is action for you action junkies).  Check out the covers and other offerings below.  Any one of them would be perfect for a bad girl comic collector.*Mary Machinegun: Reloaded is available in the Digital Deluxe Tier, The Physical Catch Up Tier and as an ADD ON to physical purchases.Who is Mary Machinegun?Mary, a member of the Templar Order is tasked with hunting the supernatural in order to keep humanity safe.  After destroying a vampire, she is tasked with going undercover in a small town in Kentucky; this time to hunt an entire pack of werewolves.  While she conducts her investigation and hunt, she finds herself surrounded by not only the evil of the supernatural, but the most evil creatures of all - Mankind itself.  Will she accomplish her mission or will she fall under the spell of evil that seems to permeate humanity to it's core?METAL COVER!For those of you that are extremely discerning when it comes to your comic book purchases, we offer the Ed Benes cover in a Metal Cover format!  This cover is guaranteed to blow you away with its color and metallic variation.  Please be aware that there are only #3 through #9 available.LET'S GET NAUGHTY!Grab your own collection of four nude 6"x9" nude prints of Mary, Charlotte, and Ophelia as well as Fern Cord's COVER A's NAUGHTY EDITION!MARY MACHINEGUN CALENDARThat's right!  The Mary Machinegun character calendar has returned!  This time we take a look at the many different aspects of Ophelia's life!  Perfect for a desk that needs a little sexiness on it!MARY MACHINEGUN STANDUPOne of our most popular items have returned for the second Mary Machinegun Kickstarter! story:
The campaign is a success and is now funded! Thank you to everyone that backed this campaign (as well as those that have spread the good word about it)! The campaign isn't to fund the book -- it's to gauge interest. The book is complete and awaiting quantities at the printers! There is still some time left to get in on the ground floor of this epic fantasy series!
 

We’re now in a In-Demand but only the Digital Edition & Standard Edition (In-Demand) are available! If you missed out on the campaign, you can still get your hands on these perks! Unfortunately, due to skyrocketing shipping costs, the Standard Edition (In-Demand) is only available for shipping within the United States. 


For more information, visit: www.infinitale-chronicles.com

Page Count: 50 Pages, Color

It all began with the birth of an ill-fated son in the royal family. Can a mother's right overcome the gods' might? The opening tale of The War of the Trees saga begins with a mystery uncovered from the fevered dreams of an ailing queen. As her husband journeys across the deadly wilderness to find answers, everything they knew about themselves, and the history of their world, is torn asunder. 

Standard Edition: The 50 page, full-color book!​​​

  • Chris Fisk is a former video game designer (Firefall, Defiance, Assassin's Creed: Memories, and multiple, unreleased games) with over a decade of experience designing entertainment media.
  • "Infinitale" began development as an amateur table-top role-playing game in the early 1990s. The tales contained within these comic books are the chronicled adventures of those game sessions.
  • This book's production has been entirely self-funded. Your support helps cover these costs and gauges interest in continuing the series. 
  • If you're a fan of "old school" fantasy (inspired by 1980s/1990s Anime & Saturday morning cartoons), Infinitale: Chronicles is the comic book series for you!

In the spirit of accessibility, I am seeking additional funding to pay a translator for this book to be available in the Spanish language. Other stretch goals may be revealed if this is achieved.

We’re now in a In-Demand but only the Digital Edition & Standard Edition (In-Demand) are available! If you missed out on the campaign, you can still get your hands on these perks! For more information, visit: www.infinitale-chronicles.com

Page Count: 50 Pages, Color
It all began with the birth of an ill-fated son in the royal family. Can a mother's right overcome the gods' might? The opening tale of The War of the Trees saga begins with a mystery uncovered from the fevered dreams of an ailing queen. As her husband journeys across the deadly wilderness to find answers, everything they knew about themselves, and the history of their world, is torn asunder. 





Standard Edition: The 50 page, full-color book!​​​






Chris Fisk is a former video game designer (Firefall, Defiance, Assassin's Creed: Memories, and multiple, unreleased games) with over a decade of experience designing entertainment media.
"Infinitale" began development as an amateur table-top role-playing game in the early 1990s. The tales contained within these comic books are the chronicled adventures of those game sessions.
This book's production has been entirely self-funded. Your support helps cover these costs and gauges interest in continuing the series. 
If you're a fan of "old school" fantasy (inspired by 1980s/1990s Anime & Saturday morning cartoons), Infinitale: Chronicles is the comic book series for you!





In the spirit of accessibility, I am seeking additional funding to pay a translator for this book to be available in the Spanish language. Other stretch goals may be revealed if this is achieved.

story:
About WAR PARTY

After their families are killed during the French & Indian War, and the surviving child is captured, a group of colonial fighters organize a rescue when they receive shape-shifting powers from an ancient tribe. Wolf, bear, eagle, jaguar & gator all team up in an unlikely alliance against the French, the British and their native allies.

‘War Party’ is a fantasy-adventure tale set in a brutal historical period.

Floppies? YES! Floppies!

WAR PARTY is in the traditional comic book format.  Each issue is 22-30 pages of story & art.

WAR PARTY is 6 ISSUES. A total of 140 PAGES.

(+20 additional pages from the unlocked $40K Stretch Goal)

The Team

ADD-ON PERKS:

*This delivery schedule is for Domestic (US) Backers only. International Backers will receive their items all in one shipment, and when all books have been printed. These dates are ESTIMATES and you could be receiving your books sooner than the months listed.

story:
GAIL SIMONE & WALTER GEOVANI RETURN TO RED SONJA #1 WITH A SPECIAL EDITION!

The creators return to the groundbreaking series they launched in 2013 bringing the She-Devil with a Sword back to comics in a huge way!  This series was special from the very beginning.  It was the combination of Gail's brilliant storytelling and Walter's inspired illustration that made it stand out as one of the very best Red Sonja tales ever told!   But the one thing that was missing from this mythic run was an edition featuring Walter's cover art.  By way of this IndieGoGo we are rectifying that one glaring issue!  Walter has done two wonderful cover editions for this special project!

The Homage cover is something very special.  It is an image that Walter drew to pay homage to the greatest Red Sonja artist of all time - the legendary Frank Thorne!

The Geovani cover is Walter's original vision for the cover of Red Sonja #1!  It is an incredible movie poster-esque image that jumps off the page with amazing vibrancy!  

LET'S LOOK INSIDE RED SONJA #1

INTERIOR PAGES 

To truly understand how amazing Walter Geovani's art is...you must look inside the issue!  Feast your eyes on the glory of the barbarian in battle and see exactly what Gail was describing in the video.  Walter captures the mood, the beauty, and the violence of this mythical world like no other!  Enter the world of Red Sonja if you dare!

THE CREATIVE TEAM

GAIL SIMONE - A warrior woman in her own right, Gail has delivered stories about the most popular characters in all of comics.  Her stories are the holy grail of Batgirl tales and her contributions to Red Sonja are as legendary as the character herself.  Gail's list of credits covers almost every major Marvel and DC character.  

WALTER GIOVANI - A magician with a pencil and pen, Walter has been illustrating fantastic worlds within the comic book medium for years.  His collaborations with Gail Simone have created some of the most beautiful work that characters like Red Sonja and Tarzan have ever seen.  Using his incredible vision for fantasy, Giovani and Simone's collaborations on Red Sonja have delivered some of the most memorable stories ever captured.  

A BONUS COVER OF EPIC PROPORTIONS

Gail and Walter wanted to make this project incredibly special.  It was vitally important that their fans know how much they appreciate their continued support.  That is why we came up with this glorious bonus offer!  Every fan that buys a three pack of the special Geovani covers of this new book will receive a BONUS cover ONLY AVAILABLE in the sets at NO EXTRA COST!  

All 3 Red Sonja #1 Homage Covers + Bonus -  you receive the Homage Main, Virgin Art, and Black & White covers PLUS a special 4th cover Cosplay Photo edition!

All 3 Red Sonja #1 Giovani Covers + Bonus - you receive the Geovani Main, Virgin Art, and Black & White covers PLUS a special 4th cover Virgin Photo Cosplay edition!

Talk about rare!  These cosplay covers will be IMPOSSIBLE to find anywhere but in your treasure horde!  Gracie the Lass and Morgan McClung bring these covers to life on the amazing cosplay editions!

DON'T FORGET TO GET THEM CGC GRADED!

All 3 covers are available CGC graded and slabbed, as well as the bonus COSPLAY covers when you order the set! All graded copies we send to our backers will be the highest possible grade we receive back from CGC.

story:
ALL BONUSES UNLOCKED!

  • The first TWO Alterna Series trading cards:  Every physical perk backer will receive *TWO trading cards per backing (back multiple times and get multiple copies of the same cards)  *cards #1 (EIKO) and #2 (KYRON MORVEL) have been unlocked
  • Collector Case Insert Set:  Every physical perk backer will receive (1) front pocket and (2) side pocket inserts (one set per backer, no matter how many times you back)
  • 6x9 Print:  Every physical perk backer will receive ONE random 6x9 inch print.  The prints will feature artwork from the covers shown on this campaign.
  • Alterna Attributes Power Cards: Every SECRET PERK backer will receive a full set of (3) Alterna Attributes Power Ranking trading cards (Card 1: Strength/Speed; Card 2: Endurance/Energy Blasts; Card 3: Fighting Ability/Intelligence) 
  • Alterna Comics Official Sketch Card: Every physical perk backer will receive an official blank Alterna Comics sketch card. 

 

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

 

The Best Deal in Comics just got BETTER

  • 10 NEW Issues for $25

  • Back Issues Are Also Available As Add-Ons

You can get all ten new issues or pick and choose the ones you want. If you missed out on previous issues within a series, you can add them on here as well. No need to visit our store for a separate purchase.

 

Our Fall 2021 Lineup

Alterna GIANTS (80 page $4.99 cover price; comics on newsprint):

  • Blood Realm Vol.3 (GIANT-SIZED 80 pager! Welcome to the cursed lands of Mhordrin where good is evil, evil is good, and only the strong and cunning will survive.  Dark Fantasy; Robert Geronimo)
  • T-Bird & Throttle #3 (GIANT-SIZED 80 pager! A disgraced former superhero must confront his past while a sinister conspiracy threatens to destroy his legacy once and for all. Super-Powered Action; Josh Howard)

 

Alterna Comics Single Issues ($1.99 cover price; comics on newsprint):

  • Downcast #3 (Joanne and her brother Jax are on the run from a corrupt government when the power to control gravity falls into their hands. Sci-fi Adventure; Clint Stoker, Ignacio Lazaro, Damian Penalba, Eric Weathers)
  • Tinseltown Vol.2 Losing the Light #4 (1915. Beneath the glamorous surface of Tinseltown, beats a rotten heart full of corruption, greed, and lies. Crime Drama; David Lucarelli, Henry Ponciano, Wes Locher)
  • Red Koi #5 (Samurai Ohira Eiko encounters ghosts, demons, dark secrets, and ancient enemies in this action fantasy series. Fantasy Action Adventure; Tyler Wentland, Nick Welch, Wes Locher)
  • It Came Out On a Wednesday #16 (A horror, sci-fi, fantasy series with stories from some of the best up-and-coming creators on the planet! This ish features a HOWLING good cover by ROB WILLIS. Fantasy Sci-fi Horror; Various creators, Cover Artist: Rob Willis)
  • Mr. Crypt and Friends #1 (MR. CRYPT and his best friend BARON RAT have misadventures as they try to make new friends and make the best out of every bad situation. Humor Adventure; Troy Vevasis, Aleksandar Jovic)
  • The Mighty Mascots #4 (A freak 3-D printing accident ends up turning a group of cereal mascots into heroic crimefighters! Super-Powered Action Humor; Keith Gleason, Ian Waryanto, Anton Bandi)
  • Wulf & Batsy #1 and 2 (Wandering from town to town while turning foes into food, WULF and BATSY are just a pair of blood-thirsty monsters looking for a nice place to call home.  Horror Adventure; Bryan Baugh)

 

 

Start Your Trading Card Set HERE

The ALTERNA SERIES™ is an official trading card set that can only be built by backing each Alterna Comics crowdfunding campaign.

Each card will be given for FREE to each backer.

The very first card in the set (EIKO from Red Koi) is available here, As you back each campaign, your trading card collection will also grow. A new character card (or two) will be featured for each campaign.

As part of our $15K stretch goal bonus, the second card in the set (KYRON MORVEL from Blood Realm) will be added on for all physical perk backers!

 

An official trading card binder with the Alterna logo printed on the front (and now the spine and back too!) is also available to purchase in the add-on section.

 

 

Gallery
