story:
84 pages of pure awesome.

From the creative team of writer/creator Cal Jameson, artist Rob Willis, colorist Paul Bilick, and letterer Eric Weathers, Shinobi Sasquatch aims to continue to raise the bar on quality in indie comics. We're all giving our very best, pouring ourselves into this book to make it more than worth the cost.

Shinobi Sasquatch was conceived somewhat foolishly, but as I fleshed out the world and its inhabitants, I realized there was a lot more story potential than I expected. I have since grown to truly love the concept, characters, and setting, and Shino (as some call him) has grown to hold a special place in my heart along with my most favorite characters.

This campaign will be a milestone in all our careers. While we've all done paid work in the industry, this will be the first book to be exclusively our own. If we fund this one, we fully plan to keep releasing more of Shino's stories any way we can. 

Speaking of funding...

We have a ton of awesome perks to choose from, which you can peruse at your leisure, but first, a few notes:

The Double Trouble tier is designed so you can join us in making some money. Grab the two books for $40 then sell one on eBay after the campaign closes, and you're likely to make your money back and then some.

The Bag o' SQUAG tier features two DIFFERENT posters; one is an 11x17 fold-out poster of the cover, and one is an 8.5x11 print of one of the book's most amazing splash pages. Trust me when I say, you're going to be tempted to just cut out one of the splash pages to hang on your wall. Let us save you the pain. Just get the Bag o' SQUAG and you're all set.

This tier also gets you a pack of three trading cards which we're calling sketch cards. Don't get confused by the name. These are not original sketches by Rob, That would make this tier a lot more pricey. No, these are beautiful trading cards, with the cover art on the back, and black & white sketches of the three main characters on the front.

Lastly, the Drawn-In tiers are both great choices for fans, but they may also be great gag gifts for fans with deep pockets and a friend, enemy, or frienemy they would like to see eviscerated, decapitated, or otherwise mutilated within the pages of Shinobi Sasquatch.

With that out of the way, please, go check out the tiers for yourself!

  • The stated monetary goal is calculated to pay Rob and Paul a portion of what they're worth, and cover printing and other costs (ISBN, mailers, barcodes, bags & boards). It does not include paying me (Cal), so we'll have a stretch goal that features both a paycheck for Cal and a reward for backers. 
  • We have put together perk packages based on feedback from fans and fellow creators, so we're confident there'll be something for everyone, whether you want just a book for yourself, an extra for your friend/enemy/frenemy, or if you want to sport a Shino t-shirt or stare longingly at a poster for hours on end.
  • This is all or nothing, folks. If we don't hit $12k, all backers will be refunded and we'll sulk away in defeat. We need this to succeed, and we think it will, but we need your help. To that end, we hope you'll share us with your social media followers, actual followers (like, if you're a celebrity or cult leader), family, friends, pets, and anyone else who crosses your path.

We're throwing caution (and shame) to the wind and laying it all out. Some of these dollar amounts might seem ridiculous, unreal, cocky even, but we believe in Shinobi Sasquatch. We want you to believe with us.

$14k - We hire Eric Weathers, letterer extraordinaire! --- UNLOCKED!!!
$15k - We'll upgrade to perfect binding! --- UNLOCKED!!!
$20k - Upgrade interior paper! --- UNLOCKED!!!
$30k - Added pages! From 52 to 68 pages! --- UNLOCKED!!!
$35k - Exclusive Donal DeLay print! --- UNLOCKED!!!


$40k - Team up with Monster MD! Whaaaat?! Yeah, you heard us right. If we hit this goal, we'll add a 20-page comic written by Von Klaus and illustrated by Marco Maccagni (of Monster MD), in which Shinobi Sasquatch teams up with Monster MD! --- UNLOCKED!!!
$45k - The cover goes FANCY! --- UNLOCKED!!!
$50k - I mean, really...the odds aren't in our favor, but if we do make it, we'll add 16 more pages to get you, our awesome backers, an 84-page book! - - - U N L O C K E D ! ! ! ! ! ! !
story_txt:
84 pages of pure awesome.From the creative team of writer/creator Cal Jameson, artist Rob Willis, colorist Paul Bilick, and letterer Eric Weathers, Shinobi Sasquatch aims to continue to raise the bar on quality in indie comics. We're all giving our very best, pouring ourselves into this book to make it more than worth the cost.Shinobi Sasquatch was conceived somewhat foolishly, but as I fleshed out the world and its inhabitants, I realized there was a lot more story potential than I expected. I have since grown to truly love the concept, characters, and setting, and Shino (as some call him) has grown to hold a special place in my heart along with my most favorite characters.This campaign will be a milestone in all our careers. While we've all done paid work in the industry, this will be the first book to be exclusively our own. If we fund this one, we fully plan to keep releasing more of Shino's stories any way we can. Speaking of funding...We have a ton of awesome perks to choose from, which you can peruse at your leisure, but first, a few notes:The Double Trouble tier is designed so you can join us in making some money. Grab the two books for $40 then sell one on eBay after the campaign closes, and you're likely to make your money back and then some.The Bag o' SQUAG tier features two DIFFERENT posters; one is an 11x17 fold-out poster of the cover, and one is an 8.5x11 print of one of the book's most amazing splash pages. Trust me when I say, you're going to be tempted to just cut out one of the splash pages to hang on your wall. Let us save you the pain. Just get the Bag o' SQUAG and you're all set.This tier also gets you a pack of three trading cards which we're calling sketch cards. Don't get confused by the name. These are not original sketches by Rob, That would make this tier a lot more pricey. No, these are beautiful trading cards, with the cover art on the back, and black & white sketches of the three main characters on the front.Lastly, the Drawn-In tiers are both great choices for fans, but they may also be great gag gifts for fans with deep pockets and a friend, enemy, or frienemy they would like to see eviscerated, decapitated, or otherwise mutilated within the pages of Shinobi Sasquatch.With that out of the way, please, go check out the tiers for yourself!


The stated monetary goal is calculated to pay Rob and Paul a portion of what they're worth, and cover printing and other costs (ISBN, mailers, barcodes, bags & boards). It does not include paying me (Cal), so we'll have a stretch goal that features both a paycheck for Cal and a reward for backers. 
We have put together perk packages based on feedback from fans and fellow creators, so we're confident there'll be something for everyone, whether you want just a book for yourself, an extra for your friend/enemy/frenemy, or if you want to sport a Shino t-shirt or stare longingly at a poster for hours on end.
This is all or nothing, folks. If we don't hit $12k, all backers will be refunded and we'll sulk away in defeat. We need this to succeed, and we think it will, but we need your help. To that end, we hope you'll share us with your social media followers, actual followers (like, if you're a celebrity or cult leader), family, friends, pets, and anyone else who crosses your path.


We're throwing caution (and shame) to the wind and laying it all out. Some of these dollar amounts might seem ridiculous, unreal, cocky even, but we believe in Shinobi Sasquatch. We want you to believe with us.
$14k - We hire Eric Weathers, letterer extraordinaire! --- UNLOCKED!!!$15k - We'll upgrade to perfect binding! --- UNLOCKED!!!$20k - Upgrade interior paper! --- UNLOCKED!!!$30k - Added pages! From 52 to 68 pages! --- UNLOCKED!!!$35k - Exclusive Donal DeLay print! --- UNLOCKED!!!
$40k - Team up with Monster MD! Whaaaat?! Yeah, you heard us right. If we hit this goal, we'll add a 20-page comic written by Von Klaus and illustrated by Marco Maccagni (of Monster MD), in which Shinobi Sasquatch teams up with Monster MD! --- UNLOCKED!!!$45k - The cover goes FANCY! --- UNLOCKED!!!$50k - I mean, really...the odds aren't in our favor, but if we do make it, we'll add 16 more pages to get you, our awesome backers, an 84-page book! - - - U N L O C K E D ! ! ! ! ! ! !

story:
Plot

The sequel to the cult hit The Bogre. As a child Henry "Hank" Tate witnessed the murder of a man by the Klan, an incident that would haunt him into adulthood. Now, as the town sheriff, he is trying to catch the racist serial killer named Mr. Crow. After the arrival of a red-eyed creature in the swamp and the killings of prominent town citizens, Tate discovers that everything might be connected.

Collecting the original five-issue mini-series plus added scenes and material. Strongly suggested for mature readers.

Perks include a custom made figurine, coffee mugs, mini-posters, and other awesome things!

Stretch Goals!

$2000- One free mini comic with each purchase of The Bogre: Southern Gothik!

$3000- 11" x 17" print with each purchase of The Bogre: Southern Gothik!

 

About

In October of 1986, in the town of Greenville, South Carolina, an unholy abomination was brought into this world. Its name? Mitch Rogers.

He spent his childhood reading ghost stories, drawing monsters, and eating ungodly amounts of bacon. In high school he conjured up his most famous creation, The Bogre. The Bogre has since come to gain a (relatively) small, yet devoted, cult following. Aside from The Bogre, Mitch is also the creator of the now canceled Raw Nerve, and the still ongoing The Flesh & Blood Collection of short comic stories.

Mitch still resides in South Carolina, where he can be seen prowling around in the darkness during the Witching Hour. He also owns a vast collection of books on the paranormal, if you're in to that sort of thing.

story:
Save the Past. Rescue the Future.

On the cusp of a discovery that would rewrite history, world-renowned archeologist Jean Marc LaPointe finds himself in the crosshairs of dark and dangerous conspirators that will go to any length to keep their secrets. LaPointe, now an international fugitive with nowhere left to run, is recruited by The Saints, a covert society guarding secrets too terrible to be known and tasked with saving the world from an ancient menace.

***

New from Allegiance Arts!

52+ pages of pulse-pounding new adventure from the creators of The Red Rooster, The Futurists, and Norah's Saga.

This exclusive, debut edition of The Saints features a thrilling script from Eisner Award winning writer, Mike Baron, eye-popping illustrations from breakout talent Christian Rosado, and world-class lettering by Eric Weathers. Created by Patrick Stiles and Mitch Breitweiser. All of the comic book craftsmanship that readers have come to expect from Allegiance Arts in an exciting new package!

The script for The Saints is complete, and over half for the art is already finished. Backers will receive regular progress reports via campaign updates!

***

Stretch Goals!

$50,000 - Gold Foil covers!

$80,000 - SAINTS Sigil Sticker!

$100,000 - Custom SAINTS shipping box!

***

Exclusive Perks and Collectible Items!

Your premiere edition of The Saints can be packaged with a number of collectable items. The Saints Bookmark and Allegiance Arts Sticker are your gift. Customize your order by choosing the perk with the items you want. You can further customize your order by selecting add-on items like posters, trading cards, and extra books at the checkout screen. Our collectible bundles make great gifts for family, friends and colleagues!

***

THE SAINTS / KILL CLIFF Cross-Promotion!

In THE SAINTS, the adventures of Jean Marc LaPointe are powered by Kill Cliff Clean Energy Drinks. We are thrilled to announce that Kill Cliff has signed Jean Marc as a brand ambassador in the prestigious Kill Cliff Cult Club, both in the book and in real life! Kill Cliff is offering our backers the opportunity to try a 12-pack of their new Flaming Joe: Ignite energy drink. Imbibe in LaPointe's drink of choice while enjoying THE SAINTS!

*Kill Cliff perk only available in the lower 48 states.

About KILL CLIFF:
Founded and created by a Navy SEAL with the spirit of giving back to the community, Kill Cliff® makes the world’s best and first clean energy drink. Headquartered in Atlanta, the Kill Cliff team includes civilians and accomplished military veterans and is absolutely committed to serving and supporting the Navy SEAL community. Kill Cliff honors the dedication and sacrifice made by these warriors and their families by donating a portion of the proceeds through their Official Partnership with the Navy SEAL Foundation. Visit KillCliff.com and follow KILL CLIFF on Facebook, Twitter, YouTube, and Instagram @killcliff.

***

Preview THE SAINTS!

Thank you!

Adventures are always better with friends, so be sure to share THE SAINTS with your social media networks. It’s your enthusiasm and word-of-mouth that helps us grow & we greatly appreciate it. Sharing tools can be found at the bottom of the page.

***

About Allegiance Arts:

Allegiance Arts & Entertainment combines world class illustration with powerful, character-driven narratives for comic book, graphic novel, and entertainment markets. At AAE, our driving passion is creating and delivering unparalleled, genre-spanning content for fans of all ages from our ever-expanding catalog.

Our debut titles, Norah's Saga, Bass Reeves, The Futurists, and Red Rooster can be found on the shelves of US Walmarts, Walmart.com, and in digital editions on AllegianceArts.com. With episodes arriving regularly and new titles being created, adventure is always on the horizon.

AAE is an Arkansas-based company founded by comic industry veterans Mitch and Elizabeth Breitweiser. Follow Allegiance Arts on Facebook, Twitter, and Instagram @AllegianceArts!

For more information about Allegiance Arts visit allegiancearts.com.

 

***

Questions?

See our FAQ section below, or contact info@allegiancearts.com

 

 

THE SAINTS is copyright 2021 Allegiance Arts & Entertainment, LLC. All rights reserved.

story:
Nephilim Squadron Volume 1, is an 80-page, action-packed science fantasy epic. This will be a perfect bound, offset printed, high-quality graphic novel that includes chapters 1-3 in color.

The Standard Cover With Artwork From Me -- HexAllen! (Final Colors Pending)

The "Macross - Do You Remember Love - The Motion Picture"  Homage Variant Cover (Final Colors Pending)The Glorious Dan Plegel Variant, Friend! (Final Colors Pending)"IF U LIKE STAR WARS & TOP GUN GET IN HERE & BACK THIS BOOK"
--Matt Burke - Creator Of BUTCH CLEAVER 2 on Indiegogo!HERE'S ONE OF THE SPECTACULAR DOUBLE PAGE SPREADS OF NEPHILIM SQUADRON 1!OUTSTANDINGLY HIGH PRAISE! From Industry "Brofessionals" - ART THIBERT and TODD MULROONEY:
"Anything with 'Squadron'...I'm all about that"
 --ART THIBERT Creator of BLACK&WHITE, CHRONOMECHANICS; X-MEN artist

"I really don't know him personally...(but) the layouts, the compositions are great!"
 --TODD MULROONEY - Artist of PARADICE and FLORIDA MAN

Watch The Frequency Gang Here:

Global Frequency Studios On - YouTube

AND BACK

MAVRICS: Origins Vol 1

AND PLEASE SUPPORT MY VARIANT COVER ARTIST, DAN PLEGEL!

BACK HIS PROJECT, THE GOBLIN GIRL!!!

CHECK OUT MY YOUTUBE CHANNEL, TOO!

HEXALLEN COMICS

FOR FUN AND UPDATES, SUB, LIKE AND SHARE!

Who Is HexAllen?

I'm a long time professional illustrator, amateur writer, and lover of genres. With over 20 years as an artist and designer, and several years as an animator at smaller studios in Los Angeles, I've gained some experience in print publishing for educational books and comics along the way.

Why Should I Contribute?

Your contribution to this project is integral to your becoming part of something rare and exclusive that will engender envy in others.

The paramount goal of this campaign is to leave you more than satisfied with owning these finely crafted pieces, as well as to include you in the process.

Unable To Contribute Today?

There're always ways to give this campaign a lift, using this new invention called the World Wide Web!​
Remember to shout out Nephilim Squadron on all the platforms you use. Twitter, YouTube, Facebook, Instagram, Telegraph, Facsimile, Smoke!
Thanks For Your Support, and use those Indiegogo share tools!

https://igg.me/at/NSV1

story:
• 55K _  BOOKMARK

  • 60K _  STICKERS

  • 65K _  TRADING CARD

  • 70K _  TBA

 

 

ENTER THE DOOMKICKER!

Hi, my name is Elliot Fernandez, but you might know me as the Invincible JERKMONGER on social media. I am an American/Puerto Rican illustrator, designer and comic book artist with over 20 years experience. I've spent most of my professional career working on other peoples dreams from Harley-Davidson to MARVEL ANIMATION to DC Comics and much, much more. But now I get to work on one of my own dreams.

 

THE STORY

DOOMKICKER is about Hank, a frustrated small town security guard who wants to live up to his fathers legacy as the town Sheriff but finds himself stuck. He stumbles on a local conspiracy that will turn his world upside down. What if doing the right thing cost you your soul?

My partner on DOOMKICKER is 'Dangerous' Doug TenNapel (creator of Earth Worm Jim) and we've teamed up to bring you a supernatural suspense adventure that will shake the Halls of Valhalla.

But... Beware!

This comic is NOT for the faint of heart!!! This thing is packed to the gills with breakneck adventure, chilling mystery and, oh yeah (my favorite), creepy things that go bump in the night!

This is where you come in! Doug and I have a dream to bring back that classic comic goodness that seems to be missing on bookshelves across this mortal plane. This is the story of the every-man in all of us versus the darkness of the great unknown. The story of good versus evil with all the grey in between. With your help we can fire up this bad boy and help Hank save his town and maybe... even the world...  Are you ready?

LET'S GO KICK SOME DOOM!

 

Variant Cover Line Art by Mike S. Miller

 

LEMONS won't cut it on this one!

Guys, I need your help!

Last year I successfully funded and fulfilled a smaller project called "BLACK and RED". The response was fantastic and I am so grateful for the support then. But making a book like this is gonna take a little more cheddar.

This project will start as a perfect bound 96 page soft cover spectacular with the opportunity for a couple of surprises via future stretch goals. But to get there, I'm gonna need you guys to get the word out and make some noise about DOOMKICKER to all your friends (even if you can't give at this moment).

Right now the funds we raise will go to the print run, my letterer, 'Electric' Eric Weathers, an as of yet announced colorist and myself, your ever lovin' brown eyed JERKMONGER, for the bulk of the work. This book is scheduled to ship in February 2020 but I want to beat that deadline by a couple of months so your support is critical. The more we raise, the more I can do and sooner to get this sequential Tyranosaur into your collection.

Some of my perks will include:

  • Exclusive Prints
  • Original 9x12 Headshots of Hank and 'The Evil'
  • Get yourself drawn in the comic
  • and a few more surprises coming soon!

I also want to include some of the 'Art Of' material in the back of the book.

 

As Doug says, you are my marketing plan...

I need you guys to back this project!

I need you guys to share this campaign with your friends!

I need you guys to brace yourselves....

DOOMKICKER IS HERE!!!!!

story:
Tadhya is EXPANDING

Hey Guys,It’s Quinn. We are back with another update on the campaign. Now, as you may know, we had a setback last month when our colorist's hard drive crashed. He lost almost all of the colorwork he had done. We announced then that we would not be putting the book out in December, which was an ambitious release date to start with. That was several weeks ago and thankfully 50 pages have now been fully drawn and colored!

Now onto the next part! We realized some time ago that 48 pages would not be sufficient to tell the entire story of this first volume of Tadhya. We have decided to add 20-30 more pages to the book in order to fully breathe life into the world we have created. Now because we have decided to add more pages, this means the book will require more time to produce. At this point, we are looking at a release around March!

We truly believe this is our best option in order to present you guys with a product of premium artistic and physical quality. Check out our BRAND NEW Tadhya Trailer, featuring art by the Amazing Matthew Weldon and Colors done by the Phenomenal Jean-Francois Beaulieu.

 

 

The Campaign for Tadhya Exordium has completed but a few perks will be available indemand! 

 

Beneath the mother's sphere, deep within the forests of Myrath, Hecate's witches work their strange magic under the cover of night. 

EPIC HORROR FANTASY GRAPHIC NOVEL ON WITCHES

Tadhya Exordium is a 48 Page Graphic Novel, the first of three in a series. Tadhya is the story of a young girl born into a noble family... but also into the hands of a manipulative coven. With darkness as their cover, the witches conjured their dark works and brought forth Tadhya-but will Tadhya be theirs to bend to their will? Or have they unknowingly, through their own hubris, unleashed something upon the world which will finally fracture the delicate balance they have tried desperately for centuries to maintain.

The lore for Tadhya was created by taking various bits of mythology from around the world and weaving them together. The Celtic mythology surrounding Balor, his "Evil Eye", and the Fomori of the Otherworld were adapted to form the fantasy backdrop of this story. Both, Nordic, and African mythology were also used to create other fantasy elements present in the story. 

 

Matthew's JAWDROPPING Tadhya Wrap-around cover!

 

Plus Two Variant Covers!

We are offering this book in three variant covers. Veteran comic book artists: Caanan White & Mike Miller have both alongside Matthew Weldon, created STUNNING covers for Tadhya! Matthew's Version includes a gorgeous wrap-around cover! These covers have all been colored by Jean-Francois as we speak! You can choose between the three when you select either a paperback or hardcover copy! 

All of our goals were met!

​

Experience TADHYA in Digital, Paperback, & Hardcover!

Neil Gaiman: Long have I been a fan of Gaiman's work in both graphic and contemporary novels. The work Gaiman did in Sandman was highly inspirational for Tadhya. Neil Gaiman's highly symbolic narrative style and metaphorical form of storytelling is endlessly compelling. 

Stephen King: Steven King has been well known as the "King" of horror for decades now. Stephen King has been able to, through his stories and books, tap into the deep primal fears that we have all have. 

George RR Martin: It is arguable that Martin changed the course of modern fantasy. In his acclaimed A Song of Ice and Fire series, there is no black and white, no pure good and evil. The characters themselves seem grounded in reality while simultaneously existing within a seamless fantasy backdrop.

H.P. Lovecraft: Without Lovecraft, there would be no Stephen King and certainly Martin's world may look a bit different. Lovecraft defined the genre of "Cosmic Horror" his stories suggested that there were deep terrors awaiting in the blackness of space or beneath the earth, hidden, but waiting. The sense of unease and dark things to come that Lovecraft's stories evoke was something I had fun recreating for Tadhya.

Marion Zimmer Bradley: Bradley's "The Mists of Avalon" which was a retelling of Arthurian Myths from the perspective of the women in the story, mainly Morgan Le Fay who in Bradley's book is called Morgaine. The Women of Avalon were a key influence on the Daughter of Hecate in Tadhya. 

L. Frank Baum & Lewis Caroll: It all goes back to the childhood, as they say. Baum, who wrote "The Wonderful Wizard of Oz" and Caroll who wrote, "Alice's Adventure in Wonderland" & "Through the Looking Glass" both had a tremendous impact on me and on TADHYA. Both stories are about a young girl who finds herself lost in a magical realm and slowly realizes that things are almost never what they appear to be.

Frank Herbert: I would be remiss if I did not mention Frank Herbert. The Bene Gesserit, which appears in his Dune Science Fiction Series, is a matriarchal order of women who secretly manipulate the citizens of the universe they inhabit. The Daughters of Hecate who appear in Tadhya are similar to the Bene Gesserit in a number of ways as you will discover as the series continues.

 

CHECK OUT THE COLORED CAANAN WHITE COVER

Colored by Jean-Francois Beaulieu

CHECK OUT THE COLORED MIKE MILLER COVER

Colored by Jean-Francois Beaulieu

CHECK OUT THE COLORED MATTHEW WELDON WRAP-AROUND COVER

Colored by Jean-Francois Beaulieu

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you can't afford to help fund the campaign you can still help by sharing the link on social media! Thanks guys!
story_txt:
Tadhya is EXPANDING
Hey Guys,It’s Quinn. We are back with another update on the campaign. Now, as you may know, we had a setback last month when our colorist's hard drive crashed. He lost almost all of the colorwork he had done. We announced then that we would not be putting the book out in December, which was an ambitious release date to start with. That was several weeks ago and thankfully 50 pages have now been fully drawn and colored!
Now onto the next part! We realized some time ago that 48 pages would not be sufficient to tell the entire story of this first volume of Tadhya. We have decided to add 20-30 more pages to the book in order to fully breathe life into the world we have created. Now because we have decided to add more pages, this means the book will require more time to produce. At this point, we are looking at a release around March!
We truly believe this is our best option in order to present you guys with a product of premium artistic and physical quality. Check out our BRAND NEW Tadhya Trailer, featuring art by the Amazing Matthew Weldon and Colors done by the Phenomenal Jean-Francois Beaulieu.
 

 
The Campaign for Tadhya Exordium has completed but a few perks will be available indemand! 
 


Beneath the mother's sphere, deep within the forests of Myrath, Hecate's witches work their strange magic under the cover of night. 

EPIC HORROR FANTASY GRAPHIC NOVEL ON WITCHES
Tadhya Exordium is a 48 Page Graphic Novel, the first of three in a series. Tadhya is the story of a young girl born into a noble family... but also into the hands of a manipulative coven. With darkness as their cover, the witches conjured their dark works and brought forth Tadhya-but will Tadhya be theirs to bend to their will? Or have they unknowingly, through their own hubris, unleashed something upon the world which will finally fracture the delicate balance they have tried desperately for centuries to maintain.
The lore for Tadhya was created by taking various bits of mythology from around the world and weaving them together. The Celtic mythology surrounding Balor, his "Evil Eye", and the Fomori of the Otherworld were adapted to form the fantasy backdrop of this story. Both, Nordic, and African mythology were also used to create other fantasy elements present in the story. 
 

Matthew's JAWDROPPING Tadhya Wrap-around cover!

 
Plus Two Variant Covers!

We are offering this book in three variant covers. Veteran comic book artists: Caanan White & Mike Miller have both alongside Matthew Weldon, created STUNNING covers for Tadhya! Matthew's Version includes a gorgeous wrap-around cover! These covers have all been colored by Jean-Francois as we speak! You can choose between the three when you select either a paperback or hardcover copy! 


All of our goals were met!
​
Experience TADHYA in Digital, Paperback, & Hardcover!



Neil Gaiman: Long have I been a fan of Gaiman's work in both graphic and contemporary novels. The work Gaiman did in Sandman was highly inspirational for Tadhya. Neil Gaiman's highly symbolic narrative style and metaphorical form of storytelling is endlessly compelling.

Lovecraft defined the genre of "Cosmic Horror" his stories suggested that there were deep terrors awaiting in the blackness of space or beneath the earth, hidden, but waiting. The sense of unease and dark things to come that Lovecraft's stories evoke was something I had fun recreating for Tadhya.
Marion Zimmer Bradley: Bradley's "The Mists of Avalon" which was a retelling of Arthurian Myths from the perspective of the women in the story, mainly Morgan Le Fay who in Bradley's book is called Morgaine. The Women of Avalon were a key influence on the Daughter of Hecate in Tadhya. 
L. Frank Baum & Lewis Caroll: It all goes back to the childhood, as they say. Baum, who wrote "The Wonderful Wizard of Oz" and Caroll who wrote, "Alice's Adventure in Wonderland" & "Through the Looking Glass" both had a tremendous impact on me and on TADHYA. Both stories are about a young girl who finds herself lost in a magical realm and slowly realizes that things are almost never what they appear to be.
Frank Herbert: I would be remiss if I did not mention Frank Herbert. The Bene Gesserit, which appears in his Dune Science Fiction Series, is a matriarchal order of women who secretly manipulate the citizens of the universe they inhabit. The Daughters of Hecate who appear in Tadhya are similar to the Bene Gesserit in a number of ways as you will discover as the series continues.
 

CHECK OUT THE COLORED CAANAN WHITE COVER
Colored by Jean-Francois Beaulieu

CHECK OUT THE COLORED MIKE MILLER COVER
Colored by Jean-Francois Beaulieu

CHECK OUT THE COLORED MATTHEW WELDON WRAP-AROUND COVER
Colored by Jean-Francois Beaulieu


Other Ways You Can Help
Even if you can't afford to help fund the campaign you can still help by sharing the link on social media! Thanks guys!

story:
Adventure lies in your hands!

 

Evil lurks in the darkest corners of outer space! Galactic police stand no chance against the super villain threat! The fate of the galaxy lies in the balance!

Have no fear adventurer... Introducing the 6 foot tall, spandex clad, intergalactic vigilante known as Tail-less!

Join Tail-less, his side kick Jet, and his fiery love interest Adelaide as they answer the call to defend the galaxy

Does Tail-less have what it takes to save the day? Find out in the Adventures of Tail-less in Outer Space!

 

Tail-less Collected Edition

For the first time ever you can get your hands on all things Tail-less in one beautiful collected edition! This book collects: Tail-less Mini Comics #1 - 5

If you're a fan of classic Saturday morning cartoons, like Transformers, Thundercats or TMNT, then you will love the episodic format of Tail-less. Each mini comic is a short, self contained adventure that gives you a glimpse into the wider Tail-less universe.

In each new adventure Tail-less faces off against new and ever more dangerous villains. Tail-less has no superpowers, instead relying on his quick wits, and courage to save the day. 

 

The Tail-less collected edition also includes: The Tail-less / Not Daredevil Ashcan. 

A hilarious 4 page adventure written by Commi3Mark and Illustrated by Aria Black. Featuring; Tail-less and Not Daredevil in an epic CGUK cross over you do not want to miss out on!

 

The 7th Mini Comic Unlocked!

One final goodie for you all! We smashed through our first goal of £2k in just 16 hours which means we have unlocked the Awesome 7th Mini Comic! This comic is special for two reasons. Firstly, the addition of this mini comic will take us to a page count of 50 pages of story content alone! Secondly, this is a prequel comic to the first full sized Tail-less issue. So get ready to see what lies in store for the future of Tail-less! Check below for further stretch goals!

 

Discover the origins of Tail-less in the Bonus Material Section.

An expansive deep dive into the characters creation featuring every single image, story, and fan art of Tail-less ever created. No other CG book offers you an insight into a characters creation as in depth as the Tail-less Collected Edition.

________________________________________________________________________________________

 

Keshi Tail-less

Introducing Keshi Tail-less! The two-inch-tall defender of the Galaxy! Designed in collaboration with Grafight Toys, Keshi Tail-less is the perfect addition to your collection. 

Inspired by classic M.U.S.C.L.E figures, at two inches tall, he stands perfectly in scale with any other Keshi figure. His bright blue colour makes him stand out on a shelf and he looks great along side other collectable figures. 

Keshi Tail-less will come packaged in a poly bag with header card. Featuring a Japanese esc design, just like authentic M.U.S.C.L.E figures! Along with the figure, backers will also receive an exclusive Keshi Tail-less trading card! This trading card is only available to backers who back the 'Keshi Tail-less' or the 'Featured' tiers.

Make sure you check out the Keshi Tail-less trailer at the top of the campaign to find out more!

________________________________________________________________________________________

PUMPKIN SPICED TAIL-LESS! A SPOOKY SUCCESS! 

CG'S FIRST SCENTED FIGURE! Pumpkin Spiced Tail-less was a super limited variant of Keshi Tail-less. Not only is he a special spooky orange colour, he is also pumpkin spice scented! 

Pumpkin Spiced Tail-less was Available through the last 10 days of October 2021 and completely sold out! Thank you to all Pumpkin Spiced Tail-less backers, and Happy Halloween!

________________________________________________________________________________________

TAIL-LESS APPAREL

T-shirts, Hoodies, and Patches!

The Bravest of Adventurers require the coolest outfits... Now you can take to the stars in some AWESOME Tail-less Apparel! For the last 10 days of the campaign we have added T-shirts, Hoodies, and a new Exclusive Patch, all decked out with some beautiful Tail-less art!

All Tail-less apparel is available to purchase as individual tiers, and as add-ons to most other tiers on this campaign. We have also kept the price of the product and the shipping as low as possible to ensure you can get as much Tail-less apparel as you would like. Just £1 additional postage for every T-shirt or Hoodie you add to your order!

We have separate tiers for Men's and Women's T-shirts. They are very high quality and super comfortable to wear. Both Men's and Women's T-shirts come in 8 different colour options, available in sizes: S, M, L, XL, 2XL. (Contact Aria for men's 3XL)

The Unisex Hoodies are also super comfortable, and made with high quality materials. This product features the Tail-less logo, rather than the pin up featured on the T-shirts. Again, the Hoodies come in 6 different colour options, sizes: S, M, L, XL, 2XL. (Contact Aria for 3XL)

We also have a New Exclusive Sew on Patch! Only available with the 'T-shirt & Patch' tier. This tier is available individually, or as an add on. You will have your choice of Men's or Women's T-shirt, Colour, and Size. Plus you will receive an 8cm Sew on Patch featuring the Tail-less Logo, no Tail-less collection is complete without this Exclusive Patch!

________________________________________________________________________________________

 

Trading Cards and Posters

There are a total of 5 awesome trading cards featured in this campaign! Featuring art work by some of CG's best artists, including: CHUBB (Mary Boys), Preston Acevedo (Doc Salem), Max Headshroom (Rokan), and Mike Jimmy de Bruin (Life on Cora). 

Make sure you check which tiers feature each trading card! Each trading card also has a corresponding A3 (11x17) poster so you can enjoy the beautiful art work on a larger scale.

 

Life on Cora/ Tail-less Collaboration

The Creators of Life on Cora have teamed up with Tail-less to bring you this awesome trading card and poster. Backers who back both campaigns will unlock an exclusive Life on Cora/Tail-less trading card and poster, featuring artwork my Mike Jimmy de Bruin.

Backers will receive the trading card included in their Tail-less package, and the poster included in their Life on Cora package. 

Find Life on Cora here https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/life-on-cora...

 

Initial Backers Exclusive Trading Card

Here's a little something extra for those who have supported me... All backers who support Tail-less during the initial 60 day campaign will receive a Bonus Exclusive Trading Card! Art work yet to be revealed. I appreciate you all!

________________________________________________________________________________________

 

Original Art Work

There is so much original art for sale on this campaign! We have over 40 pages of interior art from the Tail-less mini comics up for grabs, get yourself an authentic piece of Tail-less history! Backers will be able to select which page they would like, this will be run on a first come first serve basis. Splash pages and mini comic cover art will also be available for selection at no extra cost. All artwork will be signed by Aria Black.

We also have the wrap around cover art available for the Tail-less Collected Edition, and the Tail-less/Not Daredevil Ashcan for sale. 

Finally we have the artwork featured on the trading cards for sale. You can get yourself an original piece by any of the talented artists that worked on the trading cards.

________________________________________________________________________________________

 

Stretch Goals

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Thank you for taking the time to check out The Adventures of Tail-less in Outer Space! I hope you like what you see and will support the book by backing any of the tiers available.

You can also support the project by sharing this page with your friends on social media.

I appreciate every single person who takes time out of their day to help me pursue this dream! Thank you! - Aria Black

story:
CLAPTRAP  is a hardcover, full color collection of twelve movie parodies by two longtime members of MAD Magazine's "Usual Gang of Idiots": Desmond Devlin and Tom Richmond. Plus other film related features and surprises!

We're talking some of the most watched, beloved and popular films of all time:

  • Star Wars: The Rise of Skywalker
  • The Shawshank Redemption
  • Psycho
  • Goodfellas
  • The Big Lebowski
  • Toy Story 4
  • Unforgiven
  • Blade Runner
  • The Blues Brothers (*BACKERS' PICK!)
  • The Princess Bride (*BACKERS' PICK!)
  • Citizen Kane  (*BACKERS' PICK!)
  • Die Hard

 

CLAPTRAP is more than 100% funded and is guaranteed to be published! You can preorder a copy (or a copy plus some additional goodies) right here on this page!

Read on below for more details and sneak peeks of the book!

 

The Story

For sixty years, MAD Magazine’s illustrated movie and TV parodies provided smart and silly laughs in an appealing format that was widely imitated elsewhere, but never matched.  

As time passed, those same parodies became valuable cultural snapshots that were enjoyed anew by nostalgic fans, who finally got all the jokes and references they missed as kids. And thanks to reprints, the classic humor was also experienced through the fresh eyes of new readers.  

For many fans, part of the fun of watching a hot television show or an iconic movie was anticipating when and how their favorite artists and writers would give it the parody treatment! But circumstances have changed.

Unfortunately, MAD has published its last original parody. The magazine has switched its focus to reprinted material, and it will no longer create the defining full-length spoofs they made famous. This made us sad because these parodies are an enduring, one-of-a-kind form of American culture. This made us sad because we all grew up on those parodies. And mostly, it made us sad because they weren’t going to pay us anymore!

Who can ever forget all those classic parodies like “The Oddfather,” “Clod-umbo” or “201 Minutes of a Space Idiocy”? Well, we hope YOU’LL forget them, because we didn’t do those!  

However, all the movies that we really DID parody have combined to sell over $21 billion in tickets. So just think: when you support our book project, you are guaranteed another $21 billion of entertainment. (Guarantee not guaranteed.)

 

Who Are We?

Artist Tom Richmond debuted in MAD in 2000, becoming its signature caricaturist in the years that followed, and is the winner of the National Cartoonists Society's prestigious 2011 Reuben Award for the year’s outstanding cartoonist. 

Writer Desmond Devlin wrote his first MAD article in 1984 when he was a teenager, became its most prolific writer during his 36-year tenure, and knows the winner of the prestigious 2011 Reuben Award.

Over the years, these are just some of the many films and shows Desmond and Tom have teamed up to satirize:

  • “Harry Potter” 
  • “Breaking Bad” 
  • “Stranger Things” 
  • “Star Wars” 
  • “The Hunger Games” 
  • “The Dark Knight” 
  • “The Hobbit” 
  • The James Bond series
  • “Toy Story”
  • “The Big Bang Theory”
  • “The Sopranos” 
  • “The Avengers” 
  • Plus “The Wizard of Oz” and “A Christmas Story”!  

 

And after twenty years, some felt we were THIS close to finally getting it right.  

 

The Plan!

We’re going to keep making parodies because we want to keep reading them, too! In fact, we’re going to make enough new movie parodies to fill a book. Our book! And if you contribute, your book!  The book is called CLAPTRAP !

Every book has to begin somewhere. And so, the FIRST movie we’re going to parody is… 

“Star Wars: The Rise of Skywalker.”  

After four decades of “Star Wars” parodies, it would be a crime against humor for the last “Star Wars” movie to be the ONLY “Star Wars” movie not to get its own spoof. There’s a comedy hole at the end of the saga, and we’re going to fill it!

Want to see what it’s called? Want to see how it starts?

That's just a sneak peek of the splash page... there's 7 more story pages after that! How about another one?

MAD never spoofed "The Shawshank Redemption"?!? Nope. But now we have! Want to see another splash page sneak peek, mother?...

What?!? Youse wanna see another sneak peek? Fuhgeddaboudit!

You think we're funny? Funny how, exactly? Do we amuse you?

Here's the full, wraparound cover!

Hey, you’re ALREADY reading our book! And you haven’t pledged yet? What does this website look like, you cheap crumb bums, a public library? (Unless you’re from a public library that wants to buy a copy of our book, in which case God bless you for the selfless service you provide each and every day.)

 

What Comes Next?

The first volume of CLAPTRAP (how’s THAT for unwarranted confidence?) will contain twelve original, full, never-before-published movie parodies. On slightly larger paper! It will also include additional comedic material from Tom and Des! Over 100 color pages, sturdy hardcover format, decent spelling — you’re getting the whole shebang!

For various reasons, many beloved films were never satirized when they originally came out. One of the best parodies we did together in MAD was of “A Christmas Story”… a mere 35 years after it appeared in theaters. It wasn’t a big hit then, but everybody knows it now. So we’re definitely going to stick it to a bunch of your favorite classic/cult movies that MAD missed at the time.

 

Untied We Stand!

By pledging, you are supporting every stage of this book’s creation, including upgraded spellchecking.  The corporate infrastructure that made these kinds of parodies possible is no longer available, so we have to do it ourselves. Which means we need help from yourselves!

Just as importantly, you’re helping to keep the glorious parody format going, at a tough time for this kind of printed comedy.  Either way, you’re stuck with us— we’re the only game in town! Nobody is doing this anymore, except the two sentimental dummies who are talking to you now.

Seriously, we’ve figured out how we can design and ship a really nice book to you. The two of us have already planned the project in detail, while leaving room for personal input from you, our sponsors.  We’ve received quotes from our printer. And we’ve set a schedule. Our nearly dozens of fans know that we’ve both spent decades meeting strict deadlines on these kinds of features for MAD.  You can back us with confidence.

This will work!

Your contribution says that keeping this unique tradition alive means as much to you as it does to us. We’ll be grateful for your support. 

 

Let's Hear from the Creators 

Desmond Devlin says: 

“Ours is a collaboration in the truest sense. I deliver page after astonishing page of incendiary satire, and Todd’s garish drawings make a serviceable distraction for the illiterate.”

Tom Richmond says:  

“I’m excited to return to this unique art form, where I attempt to fit my eye-catching art and razor-sharp caricatures within the small amount of space left in each panel after three-quarters of it is filled with a lot of unnecessary words. Writer Darren Delvin never uses one word when three will do."

__________________________________________________

UNLOCKED STRETCH GOALS:

Our STRETCH MARKS...uh... GOALS, ALL UNLOCKED!!

Stretch Goal #1: UNLOCKED!!

THANKS EVERYBODY! Now ALL BACKERS from the "Clod" level up will receive a specialty CLAPTRAP  bookmark, designed in the Richmond style. Stick it in page 4 and think ahead to how much comedy lies ahead of you. Stick in in page 88, and think back on all the laughs you’ve had. Or stick it in your ear. It’s your bookmark, it’s your decision. Just don’t put it back in the book after it’s been in your ear. Yecch!

Stretch Goal #2: UNLOCKED!!!

WOW! Another furshlugginer stretch goal reached!!! THANKS EVERYBODY! Backers who’ve supported our top five tiers will be getting a unique sketch drawn into their books from Tom. Before YOU unlocked this stretch goal, it was Tom's choice of which character to draw. If Tom drew Chewbacca, but a Wookiee murdered your father, you'd just have to deal with the painful reminder. However, now that this goal is unlocked, all sketch backers will now get to choose exactly WHICH movie parody they want Tom to draw a character from!

Stretch Goal #3: UNLOCKED!!!!

YOU DID IT!! THANK YOU BACKERS!! Des and Tom will NOW write and draw an eleventh FULL movie parody for the book! Just for fun, Tom will write it and Des will draw it! On second thought...maybe that's not such a good idea. We'll announce WHICH movie it will be after the nomination and voting process on our 9th and 10th parody targets by our "Doofus" and higher backers. Thanks again, everybody!

Stretch Goal #4: UNLOCKED!!!  Thank you backers! We are now going to ADD SIX PARODY MOVIE POSTERS to the book! These will NOT be posters for any of the movies we’re already spoofing, like “Psycho” or “Blade Runner” or “Toy Story 4.” They will be standalone productions in their own right.

Stretch Goal #5: UNLOCKED!!!  That's IT! Our incredible furshlugginer backers have done it! Des and Tom will be adding a  12th AND FINAL EXTRA MOVIE PARODY in the book! AND our voting supporters will get their THIRD and LAST chance to choose which movie we do! Potrzebie!
story_txt:
CLAPTRAP  is a hardcover, full color collection of twelve movie parodies by two longtime members of MAD Magazine's "Usual Gang of Idiots": Desmond Devlin and Tom Richmond. Plus other film related features and surprises!We're talking some of the most watched, beloved and popular films of all time:
Star Wars: The Rise of Skywalker
The Shawshank Redemption
Psycho
Goodfellas
The Big Lebowski
Toy Story 4
Unforgiven
Blade Runner
The Blues Brothers (*BACKERS' PICK!)
The Princess Bride (*BACKERS' PICK!)
Citizen Kane  (*BACKERS' PICK!)
Die Hard
 CLAPTRAP is more than 100% funded and is guaranteed to be published! You can preorder a copy (or a copy plus some additional goodies) right here on this page!Read on below for more details and sneak peeks of the book! The StoryFor sixty years, MAD Magazine’s illustrated movie and TV parodies provided smart and silly laughs in an appealing format that was widely imitated elsewhere, but never matched.  As time passed, those same parodies became valuable cultural snapshots that were enjoyed anew by nostalgic fans, who finally got all the jokes and references they missed as kids. And thanks to reprints, the classic humor was also experienced through the fresh eyes of new readers.  For many fans, part of the fun of watching a hot television show or an iconic movie was anticipating when and how their favorite artists and writers would give it the parody treatment! But circumstances have changed.Unfortunately, MAD has published its last original parody. The magazine has switched its focus to reprinted material, and it will no longer create the defining full-length spoofs they made famous. This made us sad because these parodies are an enduring, one-of-a-kind form of American culture. This made us sad because we all grew up on those parodies. And mostly, it made us sad because they weren’t going to pay us anymore!Who can ever forget all those classic parodies like “The Oddfather,” “Clod-umbo” or “201 Minutes of a Space Idiocy”? Well, we hope YOU’LL forget them, because we didn’t do those!  However, all the movies that we really DID parody have combined to sell over $21 billion in tickets. So just think: when you support our book project, you are guaranteed another $21 billion of entertainment. (Guarantee not guaranteed.) Who Are We?Artist Tom Richmond debuted in MAD in 2000, becoming its signature caricaturist in the years that followed, and is the winner of the National Cartoonists Society's prestigious 2011 Reuben Award for the year’s outstanding cartoonist. Writer Desmond Devlin wrote his first MAD article in 1984 when he was a teenager, became its most prolific writer during his 36-year tenure, and knows the winner of the prestigious 2011 Reuben Award.Over the years, these are just some of the many films and shows Desmond and Tom have teamed up to satirize:
“Harry Potter” 
“Breaking Bad” 
“Stranger Things” 
“Star Wars” 
“The Hunger Games” 
“The Dark Knight” 
“The Hobbit” 
The James Bond series
“Toy Story”
“The Big Bang Theory”
“The Sopranos” 
“The Avengers” 
Plus “The Wizard of Oz” and “A Christmas Story”!  
 And after twenty years, some felt we were THIS close to finally getting it right.   The Plan!We’re going to keep making parodies because we want to keep reading them, too! In fact, we’re going to make enough new movie parodies to fill a book. Our book! And if you contribute, your book!  The book is called CLAPTRAP !Every book has to begin somewhere. And so, the FIRST movie we’re going to parody is… “Star Wars: The Rise of Skywalker.”  After four decades of “Star Wars” parodies, it would be a crime against humor for the last “Star Wars” movie to be the ONLY “Star Wars” movie not to get its own spoof. There’s a comedy hole at the end of the saga, and we’re going to fill it!Want to see what it’s called? Want to see how it starts?That's just a sneak peek of the splash page... there's 7 more story pages after that! How about another one?MAD never spoofed "The Shawshank Redemption"?!? Nope. But now we have! Want to see another splash page sneak peek, mother?...What?!? Youse wanna see another sneak peek? Fuhgeddaboudit!You think we're funny? Funny how, exactly? Do we amuse you?Here's the full, wraparound cover!Hey, you’re ALREADY reading our book! And you haven’t pledged yet? What does this website look like, you cheap crumb bums, a public library? (Unless you’re from a public library that wants to buy a copy of our book, in which case God bless you for the selfless service you provide each and every day.) What Comes Next?The first volume of CLAPTRAP (how’s THAT for unwarranted confidence?) will contain twelve original, full, never-before-published movie parodies. On slightly larger paper! It will also include additional comedic material from Tom and Des! Over 100 color pages, sturdy hardcover format, decent spelling — you’re getting the whole shebang!For various reasons, many beloved films were never satirized when they originally came out. One of the best parodies we did together in MAD was of “A Christmas Story”… a mere 35 years after it appeared in theaters. It wasn’t a big hit then, but everybody knows it now. So we’re definitely going to stick it to a bunch of your favorite classic/cult movies that MAD missed at the time. Untied We Stand!By pledging, you are supporting every stage of this book’s creation, including upgraded spellchecking.  The corporate infrastructure that made these kinds of parodies possible is no longer available, so we have to do it ourselves. Which means we need help from yourselves!Just as importantly, you’re helping to keep the glorious parody format going, at a tough time for this kind of printed comedy.  Either way, you’re stuck with us— we’re the only game in town! Nobody is doing this anymore, except the two sentimental dummies who are talking to you now.Seriously, we’ve figured out how we can design and ship a really nice book to you. The two of us have already planned the project in detail, while leaving room for personal input from you, our sponsors.  We’ve received quotes from our printer. And we’ve set a schedule. Our nearly dozens of fans know that we’ve both spent decades meeting strict deadlines on these kinds of features for MAD.  You can back us with confidence.This will work!Your contribution says that keeping this unique tradition alive means as much to you as it does to us. We’ll be grateful for your support.  Let's Hear from the Creators Desmond Devlin says: “Ours is a collaboration in the truest sense. I deliver page after astonishing page of incendiary satire, and Todd’s garish drawings make a serviceable distraction for the illiterate.”Tom Richmond says:  “I’m excited to return to this unique art form, where I attempt to fit my eye-catching art and razor-sharp caricatures within the small amount of space left in each panel after three-quarters of it is filled with a lot of unnecessary words. Writer Darren Delvin never uses one word when three will do."__________________________________________________UNLOCKED STRETCH GOALS:Our STRETCH MARKS...uh... GOALS, ALL UNLOCKED!!Stretch Goal #1: UNLOCKED!!THANKS EVERYBODY! Now ALL BACKERS from the "Clod" level up will receive a specialty CLAPTRAP  bookmark, designed in the Richmond style. Stick it in page 4 and think ahead to how much comedy lies ahead of you. Stick in in page 88, and think back on all the laughs you’ve had. Or stick it in your ear. It’s your bookmark, it’s your decision. Just don’t put it back in the book after it’s been in your ear. Yecch!Stretch Goal #2: UNLOCKED!!!WOW! Another furshlugginer stretch goal reached!!! THANKS EVERYBODY! Backers who’ve supported our top five tiers will be getting a unique sketch drawn into their books from Tom. Before YOU unlocked this stretch goal, it was Tom's choice of which character to draw. If Tom drew Chewbacca, but a Wookiee murdered your father, you'd just have to deal with the painful reminder. However, now that this goal is unlocked, all sketch backers will now get to choose exactly WHICH movie parody they want Tom to draw a character from!Stretch Goal #3: UNLOCKED!!!!YOU DID IT!! THANK YOU BACKERS!! Des and Tom will NOW write and draw an eleventh FULL movie parody for the book! Just for fun, Tom will write it and Des will draw it! On second thought...maybe that's not such a good idea. We'll announce WHICH movie it will be after the nomination and voting process on our 9th and 10th parody targets by our "Doofus" and higher backers. Thanks again, everybody!Stretch Goal #4: UNLOCKED!!!  Thank you backers! We are now going to ADD SIX PARODY MOVIE POSTERS to the book! These will NOT be posters for any of the movies we’re already spoofing, like “Psycho” or “Blade Runner” or “Toy Story 4.” They will be standalone productions in their own right.Stretch Goal #5: UNLOCKED!!!  That's IT! Our incredible furshlugginer backers have done it! Des and Tom will be adding a  12th AND FINAL EXTRA MOVIE PARODY in the book! AND our voting supporters will get their THIRD and LAST chance to choose which movie we do! Potrzebie!

story:
TEAM & SUMMARY

RED EYES 2 is a dark fantasy, full color graphic novel, 56 pages, perfect bound (square bound). Written by David Feed, interior art by Christian Culicelli. The monster bestiary (60 pages, full color) includes art by several artist.

The story of Red Eyes follows Faerin Fair, son of the General, who's on a mortal quest to save his land and maybe the entire planet. For him, it's a simple mission of redemption but when he gets a hold of the legendary RED ICON, all hell breaks loose as every faction on the planet will stop at nothing to attain this, world ending weapon.

COVER & ALTERNATIVE COVER

PAGE SAMPLES

PRINTING & SHIPPING

Episode 1 was printed in the US by Mixam (mixam.com) and shipped by Secret Door (Secret Door Fulfilment). Can recommend both services wholeheartedly 10/10. Episode 2 will be printed by Mixam and fulfilled by Critical Blast Logistics (critical blast logistic).

RISKS & REWARDS

RED EYES is rated R for mature. It's not meant for kids. It contains violence, blood and mild nudity. Nothing crazy or vulgar, but certainly not for kids.

Fulfillment has been delayed to November 2021, unfortunately, if you want the whole gossip about it, you can check out the updates section. I'm posting news every single week.

Because we're a small team with no big studio behind, we have no financial backing other than the fans and ourselves. We are creating this awesome comic with our own sweat, blood and love for the fans. You dear backers and fans are making this dream come true. Thank you very much.

story:
Who is Rainy Road?

Beginning in 2013, while living in China, I decided to try one more shot at getting into the comic book biz. So I started the Rainy Road Comics/Media imprint and hired artists from around the world to help bring my various ideas to life.

The books were first published digitally with the hope of creating a supportive fanbase and with the intention of ultimately having print versions one day.

Fast-forward to today and I currently have three physical books thanks to some tax return money and a few generous backers via Kickstarter. I still have a small amount of copies of each book available and have decided to offer the Indiegogo audience the chance to catch up on what they've been missing and to prepare for what's about to come.

Since the books are printed and ready to be shipped, they will be packed and shipped out the next business day. After your pledge is locked in, your book(s) will be mailed to you in a mylar bag inside of a Gemini mailer. (Unless you order a bunch of stuff that won't fit inside a Gemini mailer. In that case, your order will come in other suitably sturdy packaging.)

NOTE: The campaign must first reach the minimum goal of $500 before any items can start to be shipped out. 

 

What does "a la carte" mean?

It means you can pick and choose from 3 awesome books (and some cool extras) that are already printed and have them shipped out to you as soon as your pledge has been locked. Get 1, 2 or the whole shebang! Get multiple copies! But note that quantities are very limited and once they're gone, they're gone.

 

All physical perks will include this special 6-page ashcan preview of Rainy Road's next big project, "GunEngine Zero", which will launch in spring, 2022.

 

 

THE BOOKS

PDFs of each book (except for Agents of S.H.H.) are available for backers that prefer digital or for international backers, since we'll only be shipping physical books to USA addresses.

Each book is also available as an add-on with a base physical perk.

 

 

NEOTHERIC - First printing limited to 100 copies!

This is a 96-page graphic novel collecting the first 4 issues of what is intended to be an on-going series.

Dinosaurs did NOT go extinct. They have been used by their alien slave-masters -- at the direction of a powerful, cosmic being -- as biological terraformers. But they have evolved and some of them yearn to live free. So a small group of audacious dinos escapes and makes their way to a former homeworld: modern-day Earth. Their actions cause widespread panic and chaos and they're besieged by enemies from all corners of the cosmos who are trying to reestablish the status quo.

It's an absurd, irreverent, violent satire of the modern world pitting man versus beast versus aliens versus a god! This graphic novel has remastered lettering and extras not seen in the original, digital issues.

NOTE: This book contains graphic violence, foul language, dinosaur boobies and is for MATURE READERS.

 

 

 

 

six:eight - First printing limited to 80 copies!

A 40-page horror story about a random act of violence with supernatural consequences.

On his way home late from work one night, Anthony Leon is attacked and critically injured by two street thugs looking to score some cash to buy drugs. But when they discover that his wallet is empty, they decide to head to his home to continue their rampage. With his last breaths, Anthony pleads for salvation for his unsuspecting family and, surprisingly, his prayer is answered. But who could have the power to grant vengeance to a dead man?

This was originally intended to be a self-contained, one-shot story but I've since developed it into additional future chapters, each with multiple issues. Chapter 2 will most likely have 4 issues.

This print version contains an exclusive epilogue, not in the original digital version, that hints at the true nightmare that is boiling under the surface.

In 2018, Charlie Adlard (The Walking Dead artist) chose it as the Horror Comic of the Year from the books on the ComixCentral website.

NOTE: This book contains graphic violence, foul language and is for MATURE READERS.

 

 

BOOK OF LEGEND - First printing limited to 75 copies!

This is a 52-page anthology of 9 short stories that were originally published digitally as "Ashcan Anthology #1: Future Imperfect" and "Ashcan Anthology #2: Hero's Journey".  While those were all in black and white, this print version is in full-color.

The first 4 stories are sci-fi tales with an ironic twist in the tradition of 2000 AD's "Future Shocks". The remaining 5 stories were my attempt to create unique characters that explored the concept of the heroic myth through different eras or genres. There are golden-age heroes and villains, pulp crimebusters, a orphaned ninja assassin, a degenerate vampire slayer, greedy sentient mechs and a soldier fighting aliens from a parallel dimension.

Some, if not all, of these characters could see their adventures continue in a future anthology or their own series.

 

 

Agents of S.H.H. #1  and #2 mini-comics with trading cards - $5.00

My 9-year-old daughter created, wrote and drew these 12-page mini-comics (with a little help from dear, old dad) that is in the tradition of children's adventure/humor books like Captain Underpants and Geronimo Stilton. It comes with 1 Pokemon-style trading card per book. The 2 cards in each picture is just to show the front and back of the card.

As I've done in the past, we will match the total number of books sold and donate them to Comicbooks For Kids, which sends comics and other cool stuff to kids in hospitals and cancer centers. So, if you pledge for 2 copies, we will also send 2 copies to CB4K. You can also tell us if you'd rather have some or all of your pledged books sent to the charity instead. For example, you can pledge for 2 books and tell us to send you 1 copy and the other copy to the charity.

BOOK 1 - The Flower of Power

 

BOOK 2 - The Wheel of Light

 

 

ADD-ONS

We have a few extras you can add-on to your book order and, just like the books, quantities are very limited so get them while you can.

 

Neotheric holofoil trading cards (set of 5) - $12

Art on front is by "Skooba" Steve Myers and back art is by Dave Mims. LIMITED QUANTITY!

 

NEOTHERIC b&w character cards (set of 6) - $9

4 x 6 cards printed with Dave Mims' character art in black and white. Images are on front and back of each card. Great for coloring with crayons, color pencils or highlighters. (Don't use markers or they'll bleed through.) LIMITED QUANTITY!

 

Neotheric Rob Willis 11 x 17 print - $5

Note that this will be folded twice to fit inside a Gemini mailer. LIMITED QUANTITY!

 

six:eight JC Grande METAL print - $20

6" x 10". LIMITED QUANTITY!

 

six:eight METAL bookmark - $5

2" x 6". LIMITED QUANTITY!

 

Rainy Road all covers METAL cards (set of 9) - $20

Get the cover for every single-issue comic we've produced so far as a shiny, metal trading card. 2.5" X 3.5" LIMITED QUANTITY!

 

Book of Legend character stickers (set of 8) - $12

Each sticker is about 3" tall and 2" wide. LIMITED QUANTITY!

 

 

 

REVIEWS

In case you need more convincing, here are a few reviews about each book. (Spoiler alert! They're all positive!):

  • Critical Blast Neotheric review HERE
  • Weaver Press Studios Neotheric review HERE
  • Comical Opinions six:eight review HERE
  • Super Serious Comics Book of Legend review HERE
  • Comical Opinions Book of Legend review HERE

 

Risks & Challenges

The only risk is that you sleep on this and miss out because quantities are very limited!

 

The Bigger Picture

As a true indie publisher, every dollar, every share, every follow, every recommendation matters! These first few books were meant to build a supportive fanbase that would make future projects possible since I can no longer self-fund them. So your support is essential.

The only risk is that you sleep on this and miss out because quantities are very limited!

 
The Bigger Picture
As a true indie publisher, every dollar, every share, every follow, every recommendation matters! These first few books were meant to build a supportive fanbase that would make future projects possible since I can no longer self-fund them. So your support is essential.

story:
SUMMARY

Mother, Father and Child.  They are on the run from their former tribe. The Ancient Natives want their homeland back. The Atlantians rebuild in a new and wild place.  Ultimately, they all want to control the same planet.  They all want war. They all want Death!

Death Death Death is a Sci-fi, fantasy story about the strength of the family, surviving another day, and the war for planetary dominance. The natives bring brute force, the tribes bring a savage ferocity of Bohemoth and the Atlantians bring the future to these creatures of the past.

300+ story, interior pages.

Gallery art with Graphics and color by JaRo @___JaRo___ on twitter.

 

All interior and splash art, line, color, writing and letters by John Joseph Ball.  Letters also by Steve Dye

With a few select artist featured in the Gallery portion as well. 

 

Finally, I am bringing my talent to you through a story all my own. Death Death Death. A sci-fi, fantasy adventure about the family unit struggling to survive in a wild, war torn, environment.  I have been working on this between paid gigs for sometime now.  It is a large story with a huge page count of around 300 pages. Since I have been working ahead I'm already at the halfway point on the artwork.

King Toad Inc.

While you have seen my work in The Lost Pages, Lost Pages Supplemental (Cover), Graveyard Shift 3 Supplemental Nightwalker, Super Harem, Mavrics (Cover), S.O.S supplemental, Testament (Cover), Nat the Merc (Print), Doom Fate (Print),  More Lethal  (Cover), Bullet Maker, Mothman (Print) and more. During that time I partnered with Shane Mess and Sean Sweeney to create King Toad Inc. Since then we have published Mothman Issue .1 and More Lethal through the Creator and King Toad writer, Aaron Calimeri.  This will be our biggest project to date and very important to me personally.

This Graphic novel/manga will be presented in the most classy way possible. Hardback for the (7x10) size with Color or Line art options.  Softback digest (5x7.5) size for the manga with a color cover and grey scale interiors.  It is an expensive undertaking and every backer counts! I want to give the consumer the absolute best I have to offer as a creator and enough content to be excited about what the future holds in the Death Death Death Universe.

Other Ways You Can Help

Spread the word far and wide and let people know to support this book in groups and on social media.  You can follow me on Twitter Joe Ball King Toad Inc @Comicartmaster1 and on Youtube at, Joe Ball King Toad Inc.

story:
Hello potential Indiegogo backer!

From the mind of Tanner Eddleman and the art of Juan Pablo Cartasso comes CARDINAL: CULT AND PUNISHMENT is an 84 page graphic novel with Noir style coloring for teens and adults that follows an old school super hero's return to society. After a retirement at the end of the 80’s, our hero THE CARDINAL fell into a self destructive spiral, society changed around him and his city he swore to protect fell into ruin! His oldest nemesis RYAN STARR has risen to power and a mysterious, MURDEROUS CULT has formed, led by the Cross Killer himself, the DISCIPLE.

Now the urge to make right with his city, and to prove to them, and himself, that the age of HEROES is not lost, CARDINAL, now nearly sixty years old, must once more dawn his cape and set forth to stop the villains that are tearing his city apart!

With every copy of CARDINAL: CULT AND PUNISHMENT also comes an 8 page short, part one of THE OFFWORLD OUTLAW! story, written by myself, and drawn by the great NARWHAL!

The main book is 84 pages of content with Noir style coloring, with a beautiful ROB WILLIS cover and an 8 page black and white story drawn by NARWHAL. The poster with every BOOK SET tier will be an UV Gloss, one sided 8” x 10” fold out poster containing the naked cover art.  The trading card with every BOOK SET tier will be the UV Gloss CARDINAL C1 card with art taken from our very own JUAN PABLO CARTASSO’S art from the book, colored by Nodsaibot. 

C1 Cardinal Trading Card

Get in on the ground level of this campaign and the massive story that will be the CARDINAL universe. An old hero embracing the changing world around him in a redemptive attempt to do what’s right. A crazed murderer leading a legion of followers to slaughter those they deem unworthy of life! And a powerful businessman with influence over every aspect of the city, and some nefarious experiments inside the walls of his concrete fortress.

Back CARDINAL: CULT AND PUNISHMENT today!

 

 

NEED A PREVIEW? HERE ARE THE FIRST TEN SEQUENTIAL PAGES!

STRETCH GOALS!

$3500 - DIE CUT STICKER SET FREE FOR ALL BACKERS!

$4000 - FOLD OUT POSTER BY NARWHAL FREE FOR ALL BACKERS!

$5000 - DISCIPLE TRADING CARD!

 

RISKS AND CHALLENGES

This is my first campaign, my first time working with Indiegogo, and my first time doing fulfillment. This is why I have the book over 90% completed by the time this campaign launched, and set to be complete by the time it closes, giving me plenty of time to work on fulfillment. I don’t know the ropes yet, but I’m willing to learn to make sure each and every one of you gets your books on time!

story:
DIG TWO GRAVES, full-color trade paperback, combines book 1 and 2 bringing you over 80 pages of story.  Every backer also receives one 8.25"x11.5" (A4) full-color glossy print.

Dig Two Graves, a comic book series created by Jim Tanner, is an action-adventure-drama throwback to classic revenge movies of the 70's and 80's with a modern twist. The series—planned for 12 issues of 40 full-color pages—follows Miranda Stone, a soldier who returns home from deployment, only to witness her husband and son gunned down in cold blood. In the wake of her tragedy, Miranda must put the pieces back together to find out who killed her family…and try not to get killed herself along the way.

Dig Two Graves #2 picks up with the aftermath of the first issue's climactic shootout, diving deeper into the story of Arturo. With his biggest hurdle out of the way, he; along with his son, Max, and brother, Gonzalo—prepare to do everything necessary to see his plans come to fruition, even if it means further increasing the body count.

 

WHAT ARE YOU BACKING?

  1. This is a 84 full full-color trade paperback
  2. Dark and gritty, revenge, action Noir.  Fans of Quentin Tarantino movies/Garth Ennis books or fans of gritty dark stories. 
  3. Mature Readers

 

After a successful campaign for Dig Two Graves #2 on Kickstarter,  I had people reach out asking for a way to get a copy. We decided to try Indiegogo for people who missed out. We also decided to go with a graphic novel this time around, combining both Dig Two Graves #1 and #2 since this is our first time on Indiegogo.  That's over 80 pages of dark and gritty story telling. 

Funds raised will go towards printing and fulfilment of Dig Two Graves graphic novel, as well as paying artists to collaborate on future projects.

 

More preview pages

 

Every backer of the DIG TWO GRAVES full-color trade paperback, will also receives one full-color glossy print by Aaron Bartling.

 

 

Poster Sets

We are offering lots of mini prints and 11x17 Poster options. We have something for everyone. 

Limited Hard Bound Edition

We are offering a limited amount of the Dig Two Graves graphic novel in hard bound edition. Main cover by Os Pietro

Indiegogo exclusive Variant Hard Bound

We wanted to do something special for the Indiegogo crowd so we are doing a Indiegogo exclusive hard bound Wilton Santos variant Driver inspired cover.

 

Cameo in a future Dig Two Graves book

 

Did you want to be featured in a comic book? You can choose between a speaking or non-speaking role in an upcoming issue of Dig Two Graves. Along with the full-color trade paperback we will also toss in the mini or 11x17 poster set. 

 

 

Hard Bound Plus 11x17 black and white commission by Von Randal

 

Stretch Goals! 

 

Jim Tanner (Writer/Creator) is based out of Colorado. A film and comic nerd, his love of comics started back in the 80s when he got his first comic, Spectacular Spider-Man #136. In 2008, he founded SNComics as a place to bring his and other independent creators' stories to life.

https://linktr.ee/Sncomics

Von Randal (Penciler/Inker) is an artist from the Philippines. He started as a freelancer in 2010, working with Upperdeck as a sketch card artist and doing mixed media commissions for overseas clients.  His comic book career as a penciler and inker started when he was chosen to do a miniseries, Sellsword by Colby Pryor, in 2016 followed by a second miniseries, Dragons by Stephen Kok. After Dragons’ success, Kok recommended Randal to Shaun Keenan to do another miniseries, Dragon's Graveyard, as part of their project called Extreme Champion Tournament. Shortly after, he was given an opportunity to do a five-part comic book called Street Clothes by Travis Holyfield as well as Kok's Terralympus. His current titles include Dig Two Graves and Torian Tarrant's Catalyst. Aside from comic books, Randal is commissioned for blank covers whenever he visits Singapore. His art is hugely influenced by incredible artists such as Leinil Yu, Jerome Opeña, and his mentor, Harvey Tolibao.

 

Kevin Anthony De Castro aka Tevan (Colorist) he formerly worked with HMT Studios, IDW, Valiant, Legendary comics. He is a fulltime freelance artist as a colorist for comic, digital painted covers as well as card Illustration for the game Industry. Most of his recent works are from Independent Comics community such as Coffin Comics and Mount Olympus Comics. With titles like, Lady Death, La Muerta, Patriotika and other several well known titles in the indie community.

 

Robin Jones (Letterer) is a writer and letterer of comics. He has worked for publishers such as Image, DC Thomson, Humanoids, BHP Comics, Comichaus, and Markosia. He is often found spewing idiocy into the void on twitter.

 Twitter: @RobJonesWrites

 

Other Ways You Can Help

We understand that some of you are not able to support by contributing money. That’s OK! One of the most important ways you can support this project is sharing this campaign with your friends and other passionate comic book fans! Show your support by sharing on Twitter, Instagram, Reddit, Facebook, or any other social media platforms that can help us get the word out.

 

#DTG #comicbooks #comics #revenge #girlswithguns #indiegogo #kickstarter #support #action #sundayfunday #art #crowdfunding #graphicnovel #sncomics #indiecomics

With titles like, Lady Death, La Muerta, Patriotika and other several well known titles in the indie community. Robin Jones (Letterer) is a writer and letterer of comics. He has worked for publishers such as Image, DC Thomson, Humanoids, BHP Comics, Comichaus, and Markosia. He is often found spewing idiocy into the void on twitter.
