story:
For some it’s a sound effect, for me it’s a way of life! Comic books have been a part of my DNA since before I can remember. My favorite ones are those that embrace all of the things that make them uniquely COMICS: over-the-top action, beautiful idealized heroes, exaggerated situations, and really, really LOUD artwork. This is why I am insanely excited to be relaunching BLACK FLAG as a 48 page graphic novel! BLACK FLAG: PINEAPPLE PERCEPTION will be part one of a four part ODYSSEY that will take you into worlds, unimaginable.

My 30 year creative journey has brought me many opportunities as a comic book artist for MARVEL, DC, and IMAGE, as a storyboard artist for Blockbuster movies and TV shows, and as a director on THE RICKY GERVAIS SHOW, MONSTER HIGH, HOT WHEELS, and MAX STEEL. These  awesome experiences have helped build my artistic and storytelling  skill-sets to a place where I’m able to literally pull what’s in my head out and put it on paper for you to see! This brings me so much joy to be able to do this for you.


I created BLACK FLAG in 1994. It was my way to draw all of the things that make me happy: Absurdly large gun toting soldiers, sexy anime influenced ladies, magical multi-dimensional wizards, mega contorting aliens, super powered kids, and a giant Purple Gorilla! Who could ask for more?!


It’s been 25 years since this eclectic team has been in comics. Now more than ever, it’s time to bring the FragaBoom! back into comics.

The 48 Page color comic will be part one of a four part story that will blow your lid off!

The 1994 Archive ashcan is a replica of the ashcan offered at the 1994 San Diego Comic-con and features the black and white artwork and story featured in the Black Flag Preview Edition.

WE HAVE STRETCH GOALS!!!!

50K WE WILL MAKE THE BOOK PERFECT BOUND!

75K A NEW RE-COLOR OF THE ORIGINAL VOL 1. #1 ISSUE COVER WILL BE MADE AS A FOLDED POSTER AND ADDED TO EVERY ORDER!!

100K STICKERS WILL BE ADDED TO EVERY ORDER

125K MORE TRADING CARDS WILL BE ADDED TO THE CARD ADD-ON

150K A SPECIAL REUNION BLACK FLAG #0.5 ISSUE WILL BE CREATED AND ADDED TO EVERY ORDER!!!

175K A digital download of the FragaBoom! Mixtape

200K A lucky backer will be randomly selected to receive the Bedazzled Pink Bunny Suit and we'll add a folded remastered version of the very rare 1994 Black Flag Promo poster!!

 

 

The creative Team: Dan Fraga (Creator, Story and Art), Will Perdomo (story), Shelby Robertson (inks), and Matt Yackey (colors). This comic is soaked in Mt. Dew and that milk we love!

 

The Color Cover to Black Flag: Pineapple Perception

Art By Dan Fraga, Todd McFarlane, Shelby Robertson, and Matt Yackey!!!

New Limited cover by Superstar Rob Willis!!!

 

A Double Page Spread of the team!!!

 EPIC Double Page Spread!!!

 

Rascal

Colored By DRE

UPDATE! LOOK AT PAT LEE'S AMAZING BLACK FLAG ART!!

Guerilla by Shane Davis!

Be sure to check out the Trading Card Add-ons at checkout!!!

A massive THANK YOU for your support. Let's build this thing together!

Remember: Be and Do your BEST!!

 

 

Book Info

 

When your streets are overrun with cybernetic ninja gangsters and mutated beasts, when a cosmic brigade of Savage Aliens surrounds your planet, and when the supernatural underworld begins to take over the earth, there’s only one team you can call to help save the world: Black Flag. A band of unlikely heroes dedicated to stop all threats of evil, seen and unseen. A career soldier, a beautiful hardware tycoon, a shape- shifting refugee alien, a genius monster, an ancient mystic, and a magical 12-year-old boy.

Black Flag:
Saving the earth, one world at a time.

Heroes
Sniper: The Soldier. Little is known about Dalton Snipes, AKA Sniper. Even to his closest allies and team mates, he remains a mystery.

Geisha: The Tycoon. The daughter of the late Yoshi Imoto, former CEO of Imoto Tech. As heiress to her father’s estate, she uses her tremendous wealth to fund the Black Flag team and their hi-tech gear and headquarters.

Raiden: The Ancient. A master of the mystical arts, Raiden channels inter-dimensional pathways, harnessing the power of the Gem Pool of Granakata to witness events of the past present and future.

Guerrilla: The Monster Genius. The product of a series of shocking genetic experiments, Guerrilla was groomed to become a weapon of war by the vile E-Max laboratories before escaping and finding solace as a member of the Black Flag team. Able to recall everything read, seen, or heard, Guerrilla’s memory rivals that of the most sophisticated computer on the planet.

Spot: The Kid. Gifted with the uncanny ability to unlock the doorways separating imagination from reality, Spot materializes objects from his dreams and thoughts with a mere snap of the fingers. Innocently oblivious of his potential, Spot carries on with the freedom granted a twelve- year-old.

Bubble: The little Lady. She has the ability to make impenetrable bubbles around herself or others as a form of flight and protection. 

Rascal: The Alien. A shape-shifting revolutionary Refugee Alien seeking solace from the evil Grimalkin empire who has conquered and enslaved the people of his planet.

Shrine: The Sensei. Master of the martial arts and teacher to Sniper.

Lucky: The Wildcard. Inter-Dimensional Repairman.

 

 

Villains

Black Rain: Dark Creator. A cosmic entity whose power has yet to reach its limits.


E-Max: The Corporation. Experimenters in genetically modified species “for the good of mankind”.

Dojo Yama Clan: The Goons. A global “street level” band of cybernetic enhanced ninjas lead by the infamous Dojo Yama.

Dojo Yama: The Kingpin. Japanese lord of crime whose sole goal is global domination.

Grimalkin Aliens: The Savages. A species of Aliens who’s savagery knows no bounds.

Gillz: The Monster. An E-Max experiment gone wrong. Gillz lives and kills in the sewers of Dagger City.

Hellfyre: Pure Evil. The ruler of the underworld. If this world has a devil, Hellfyre is his name.

Taglines:

Rag Tag, they’re it.

Unlikely? Likely.

High or low, they’ll go.

It’s about time.

Unruly.

Here to save our world. All of them.

Mythical, Mystical, Magical.

 

 

Here is some extra FRGABOOM LOVE:

 

Here’s some Fragaboom Love:

1. The original 1995 Black Flag series as a PDF

https://www.dropbox.com/s/k1h61gig0vqcnq9/Black...

2. The original 1994 FRAGABOOM! Mixtape!

https://www.dropbox.com/s/weelwrnjgtp8fqq/Fraga...

3. As an additional thank you, here is a link to a song I wrote about motivating yourself to BE and DO your BEST! It's called N!KE THAT! I hope you dig it. (Turn it up!)

https://www.dropbox.com/s/3ias9fqe866r7fd/N%21K...

4. It’s still Free Comicbook day at the ICU. Here’s the 2000 Gearstation Series for you, for free!

https://www.dropbox.com/s/qm7eoqxqkri0s44/Compl...

175K A digital download of the FragaBoom! Mixtape
200K A lucky backer will be randomly selected to receive the Bedazzled Pink Bunny Suit and we'll add a folded remastered version of the very rare 1994 Black Flag Promo poster!!

 

 
The creative Team: Dan Fraga (Creator, Story and Art), Will Perdomo (story), Shelby Robertson (inks), and Matt Yackey (colors). This comic is soaked in Mt. Dew and that milk we love!
 
The Color Cover to Black Flag: Pineapple Perception
Art By Dan Fraga, Todd McFarlane, Shelby Robertson, and Matt Yackey!!!
New Limited cover by Superstar Rob Willis!!! A Double Page Spread of the team!!! EPIC Double Page Spread!!!  RascalColored By DREUPDATE! LOOK AT PAT LEE'S AMAZING BLACK FLAG ART!!Guerilla by Shane Davis!Be sure to check out the Trading Card Add-ons at checkout!!!A massive THANK YOU for your support. Let's build this thing together!Remember: Be and Do your BEST!!  Book Info When your streets are overrun with cybernetic ninja gangsters and mutated beasts, when a cosmic brigade of Savage Aliens surrounds your planet, and when the supernatural underworld begins to take over the earth, there’s only one team you can call to help save the world: Black Flag. A band of unlikely heroes dedicated to stop all threats of evil, seen and unseen. A career soldier, a beautiful hardware tycoon, a shape- shifting refugee alien, a genius monster, an ancient mystic, and a magical 12-year-old boy.Black Flag:Saving the earth, one world at a time.HeroesSniper: The Soldier. Little is known about Dalton Snipes, AKA Sniper. Even to his closest allies and team mates, he remains a mystery.Geisha: The Tycoon. The daughter of the late Yoshi Imoto, former CEO of Imoto Tech. As heiress to her father’s estate, she uses her tremendous wealth to fund the Black Flag team and their hi-tech gear and headquarters.Raiden: The Ancient. A master of the mystical arts, Raiden channels inter-dimensional pathways, harnessing the power of the Gem Pool of Granakata to witness events of the past present and future.Guerrilla: The Monster Genius. The product of a series of shocking genetic experiments, Guerrilla was groomed to become a weapon of war by the vile E-Max laboratories before escaping and finding solace as a member of the Black Flag team. Able to recall everything read, seen, or heard, Guerrilla’s memory rivals that of the most sophisticated computer on the planet.Spot: The Kid. Gifted with the uncanny ability to unlock the doorways separating imagination from reality, Spot materializes objects from his dreams and thoughts with a mere snap of the fingers. Innocently oblivious of his potential, Spot carries on with the freedom granted a twelve- year-old.Bubble: The little Lady. She has the ability to make impenetrable bubbles around herself or others as a form of flight and protection. Rascal: The Alien. A shape-shifting revolutionary Refugee Alien seeking solace from the evil Grimalkin empire who has conquered and enslaved the people of his planet.Shrine: The Sensei. Master of the martial arts and teacher to Sniper.Lucky: The Wildcard. Inter-Dimensional Repairman.  VillainsBlack Rain: Dark Creator. A cosmic entity whose power has yet to reach its limits.E-Max: The Corporation. Experimenters in genetically modified species “for the good of mankind”.Dojo Yama Clan: The Goons. A global “street level” band of cybernetic enhanced ninjas lead by the infamous Dojo Yama.Dojo Yama: The Kingpin. Japanese lord of crime whose sole goal is global domination.Grimalkin Aliens: The Savages. A species of Aliens who’s savagery knows no bounds.Gillz: The Monster. An E-Max experiment gone wrong. Gillz lives and kills in the sewers of Dagger City.Hellfyre: Pure Evil. The ruler of the underworld. If this world has a devil, Hellfyre is his name.Taglines:Rag Tag, they’re it.Unlikely? Likely.High or low, they’ll go.It’s about time.Unruly.Here to save our world. All of them.Mythical, Mystical, Magical.  Here is some extra FRGABOOM LOVE: Here’s some Fragaboom Love:1. The original 1995 Black Flag series as a PDF https://www.dropbox.com/s/k1h61gig0vqcnq9/Black...2. The original 1994 FRAGABOOM! Mixtape!https://www.dropbox.com/s/weelwrnjgtp8fqq/Fraga...3. As an additional thank you, here is a link to a song I wrote about motivating yourself to BE and DO your BEST! It's called N!KE THAT! I hope you dig it. (Turn it up!)https://www.dropbox.com/s/3ias9fqe866r7fd/N%21K...4. It’s still Free Comicbook day at the ICU. Here’s the 2000 Gearstation Series for you, for free!https://www.dropbox.com/s/qm7eoqxqkri0s44/Compl...

story:
Earth becomes the final battleground for an age-old conflict in this giant robot epic.

  • 64 pages, B&W
  • Rated Teen+

 

ETERNAL ARMOR COVER A

Artwork by Caanan White
 

RETRO VHS COVER

Artwork by Preston Asevedo


Interior Pages

 

The Story

Two decades ago, a fisherman and his son discovered the mysterious robot while on the lake. Scientists recovered the colossus and a pilot used the robot to save the world a decade later. Now, dark forces return to Earth, where the secrets of an age-old conflict will be revealed on the final battleground.

KAITO

As a teenager, Kaito watched his brother pilot the mighty robot, both of which fell in the aftermath of the final attack. Now, the enemy has returned, and Kaito must find his place at the forefront of an ancient conflict that will be decided on Earth.

MIKA
Mika's uncle was one of the scientists tasked with researching the mighty robot discovered decades earlier. As a skilled fighter pilot, she has been recruited to helm a new mecha constructed using secrets discerned from the original.

 

Stretch Goals!

$5,000 (UNLOCKED!) - All backers will receive an exclusive Eternal Armor trading card by Mandy Summers (Wart the Wizard, Super Dead, Pirate Queen)!


Swag Pack

Includes: 2 prints, set of 4 stickers, carded and punchable set of 6 Armor Caps (pogs), Trading Cards Series 1 (set of 5), Campaign-Exclusive T-Shirt (you choose the size), fitting as much of it as possible inside the exclusive Eternal Armor retro lunchbox.
Some images are mock-ups representative of final design. 
Details and updates to be added as they are available.

 

Previous Campaigns

As a crowdfunding comic book creator, this is my fourth campaign. Previous campaigns include Ardanna #0, Rocket Gal and the Mole Men of Mars, and the Ardanna #0 Legendary Edition, all of which were funded and fulfilled. Eternal Armor is created and written by Wyatt Holliday (Ardanna, Rocket Gal), with art by Joaquin Zapata. Covers by Caanan White and Preston Asevedo.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't back us right now, you can also help by following and sharing this campaign on your social media!

story:
Justice City Chronicles is an 80 page knock down, drag out,  butt-kicking adrenaline ride that is rooted in the action adventure cartoons of the 1980's.


Volume one begins in the heart of the Etoran Republic, Justice City. We find our hero, Nero a prideful young cadet who is upon the precipice of graduating and becoming a member of the legendary Praetorian's like his father before him. The Praetorian's are an elite class of warriors tasked with keeping the peace throughout the realms. Nero's first mission as a Praetorian, to babysit a group of elite dignitaries on a routine diplomatic tour of the out-land regions quickly becomes a struggle of life and death when their Transport ship is attacked and shot down. What was once a routine mission now threatens to become the catalyst that will throw the world back into bloody war and at the center of it all is the Praetorian's  newest recruit Nero!

 

 

COVERS

PRAETORIAN STANDARD EDITION COVER

NERO INDIEGOGO EXCLUSIVE COVER

BLOOD RED EDITION VARIANT COVER

TRADING CARD SET

 

NEW PAGES !!!

 BOOKMARKS

T-Shirts

We believe Strongly in Supporting the Men and Women who have fought and Given All for this Country and for the Freedoms we enjoy and benefit from. That's why we are donating $5 for every Wolfpack t-shirt we sell to the Wounded Warriors Project.  

STRETCH GOALS -

UNLOCK EXCLUSIVE TRADING CARDS                                                                                   

$7,000 - NEW TRADING CARD INCLUDED WITH EVERY ORDER.  - UNLOCKED

$10,000- 10 EXTRA PAGES ADDED TO THE BOOK! - UNLOCKED

$12,000- TWO NEW TRADING CARDS INCLUDED WITH EVERY ORDER. - UNLOCKED

$13,000- UPGRADED TRADING CARDS TO 3.5" X 5.5". - UNLOCKED

$14,000- EXCLUSIVE METAL BOOKMARK ADDED TO EVERY ORDER. - UNLOCKED

$15,000- NERO GHOST PRINT ADDED TO EVERY ORDER. - UNLOCKED

$16,000 -​EXCLUSIVE VOL 2 CHARACTER TRADING CARD - UNLOCKED

$20,000- ADDITIONAL 10 PAGES ADDED TO THE BOOK !

Thanks to the Fans

Anthony and Myself have really put a lot of time and effort into this book and into this campaign so we really appreciate everyone stopping in and helping us bring this project to life because after all we would not be here without the love and support from our Fans, Our family and Our friends. Thank You 


Printing

We will be using the same printers that printed GODS HAND. Mixam did such a phenomenal job on Gods Hand that it was a no brainer to go back with them for this 80pg Square bound edition. We feel their appreciation and attention to detail  produces such a superior product that we can feel confident that this book will meet the standards we Demand for you, the fans supporting this campaign.

 

Make an Impact! Build the FUTURE!

Helping us Fund this project will aid in the building of the entire Wolfpack Comics Universe, a Grand endeavor that is destined to challenge the current comic book Industry and will change how we make comics for decades to come, an you will help build that future by helping us Fund this Campaign.

Other Ways You Can Help

We understand that some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help!

If you believe in this campaign, then please do whatever you can to spread the good news about what we're doing here today!

Indiegogo has 'share' tools for all your social media platforms, please hit those buttons and help bring this project and future projects to life, and help change the future of comics!!!

 

EXCLUSIVE PRINCE KALOS VOL 2 TRADING CARD

​​​

story:
1stMAN Volume 2: Learning Curve  

A 64-page full-color graphic novel continuing the story of Luke Henry's adventures as 1stMAN!

Welcome to my new campaign! This is my third campaign and the second one following the adventures of 1stMAN! I want to build my own universe and with your continued support, I'll be able to do just that! 

Thank you all for your support of my books. You make this possible!

Andy

1stMAN Volume 2! 

When The Fourth World Foundation creates a being of enormous power they need 1stMAN's help to rein in and contain the being known as Adonis! 

But things might not be as simple as 1stMAN is led to believe!

Who is 1stMAN!

They say with great power comes great responsibility... and a good time!!!

Let’s face it— Luke Henry is loving being a superhero! Having inherited the powers of galactic champion A’pollo, hero of Kr’Atomm and imbued with the 10 Essences of Creation, Luke is hands down one of the most powerful men in the galaxy.

A super-hero story that’s a little bit Spiderman, a little bit Captain Marvel (all of them, dude!), and a whole lot of wild-eyed, high-flying, epic outer space craziness, 1stMAN will remind you what it felt like to read a comic book printed on cheap newsprint, chewing on a wad of Topps baseball card bubble gum, and wondering what Penumbra looks like in a bikini! It’s that much fun!

The Story

Luke Henry is the 1stMAN!

Uniting with the galactic champion, A’pollo, and imbued with the 10 Essences, Luke was granted the power to help defeat the Dark One, Monarch and prevent the universe from falling under his evil dominion.

Now Luke has decided to use his powers for the good of the earth, becoming its champion and protector, The 1stMAN!

But his efforts have drawn the attention of The Fourth World Foundation, a team of scientists who are eager to understand Luke’s newfound powers and see if they can be applied to some of their own interests. But are they friend or foe, and who is the mysterious being, Adonis, who seems to understand Luke’s powers better than Luke does himself?

Despite his great powers, Luke is still young and inexperienced. Let’s hope he keeps his guard up!

At the end of 1stMAN volume 1, it was revealed that A’pollo survived the battle against the evil Monarch by merging his soul with the Dark One, and he and his love Penumbra returned to their home in the High Science City on Kr’Atomm’s second moon, Delphis, to resume their lives as Kr’Atomm’s top scientists and heroes.

But it’s beginning to appear that Penumbra hasn’t fully resigned herself to her husband’s new appearance, riding shotgun in Monarch’s physical aspect. And what are these strange sensations stirring within A’pollo’s being? Could it be that the dark one Monarch was not completely destroyed after all? Does A’pollo still harbor vestiges of the evil being within him?

The second volume of 1stMAN continues the adventures of Earth’s newest and greatest hero! Reserve your copy today!

Preview art!

Characters

Bart Sears variant cover!

 

The Parody Ad is back!

In every book I've created I like to include one of my favorite aspects of the comics I enjoyed reading as I grew up, the ads featuring super-heroes from the comic books hocking tasty treats!

So continuing in that tradition here is the parody ad that will be featured in this new 1stMAN volume!

 

Pledge $100 and get a copy of the comic book and a head sketch, 7"x10"!

 

Pledge $200 and get a copy of the comic book and a single figure sketch, 7"x10"!

 

The 1stMAN Program Book!

This is an extra 40-page book that contains pin-ups of 1stMAN by some of today's top superstar talents like Adam Hughes, Alan Davis, Bart Sears, J. Scott Campbell, and more! A making-of 1stMan showing unused layouts, model sheets, sketches, and more!

New original art!

Get yourself this original sketch cover done on a Superman Doomed comic book!

I drew my version of the classic 1978 Superman facing off against the classic Lou Ferrigno version of the Hulk!

White Queen Sketch Cover!

Parody Ad Original art! 

Own a piece of history!

This piece is drawn larger than normal comic book art and measures 14" x 21" 1/2"!

Creators

Andy Smith has been working as a professional artist since 1991. Mostly working in comic books for major publishers such as Marvel, DC, Image, Acclaim, and Cross Gen Ent.  1stMan is my dream project and I'm thrilled to be able to bring it to life with your support!

Rob Snyder began a professional career as a newspaper cartoonist in 1988, and his political cartoons and illustrations have been distributed throughout the U.S. and Canada. His cartoons and comics have been published by Image Comics and DC’s Paradox Press imprint.

Ilaria Fella is a comic book colorist from Italy. She has been working as a colorist since 2014. The series' she has worked on include Atlantide: Terre Engloutie, Zinnober, and Midnight Sky. She’s currently working on the series “ Maiden” published in Heavy Metal Magazine.

Steve Dutro is an Eisner-nominated funny book letterer.  Working on titles from Marvel, DC, Milestone, Image, Dark Horse, and Viz. He currently applies his skills to titles like Plants vs. Zombies, The Witcher, Fullmetal Alchemist, Dr. Stone, Twin Star Exorcists, and Andy Smith's 1st Man

Stretch Goals

All backers will receive these stretch goals once they are unlocked!

  • $10,000-4x6 over-sized trading card/ double-sided UNLOCKED!
  • $15,000-Metal bookmark UNLOCKED!
  • $20,000- 7"x 10" mini-print UNLOCKED!
  • $25,000- Four more story pages! UNLOCKED!
  • $30,000- Four more story pages! UNLOCKED!
  • $40,000- 1stMAN die-cut sticker! 
  • $50,000- I will do 20 head sketch cards, 2" 1/2" x 3" 1/2", and insert them randomly when I do fulfillment!  Check out these examples!

story:
What is the Tribulation Taskforce about?

THE END OF DAYS ARE UPON US   
​
The soon to come world dictator  Apollyon is on a mission to bring forth the last days before the appointed time. Under a platform of world peace, he uses his position in the United Nations to assemble a team of Super powered warriors to help him achieve his true goal, the destruction of mankind.

The hero  GROK, along with The Apostle John (who is still alive), search out the globe's greatest heroes to combat the oncoming threat!

 

TRIBULATION TASKFORCE: PARABLES SERIES

The Parables series presents origin and single character focused stories of the members of The Tribulation Taskforce!

ISSUE ONE (Previously available) Introduces the Thief In The Night!

Eli "Royalty" Caldwell had it all. A successful Mixed martial arts career, money and girls, but when tragedy strikes his family, he is forced to re-evaluate what is important in life. Out of the chaos, a Hero is born!

Written by: Bill Raupp  Art: Rully Akbar and Luis Rivera

The backup story introduces The Silent Knights! Written by Star Cross Comics founder Joe Spicer, the story follows the most fierce mercenary force in the Tribulation TaskForce universe! Featuring stunning artwork by Brian Dawson!!

ISSUE 2: Grok is the leader of the Tribulation Taskforce! He has motivated, encouraged and in some cases provided powers for the team members. But what do they really know about him? This issue all of his secrets are revealed. But when they are, what will that mean for the team going forward?

Written by Bill Raupp Art" Carlos Rodrigo

Side 2 is the origin of The Watcher's member, JEZEBEL. Find out what drives a simple single mother to become on of the most wicked women alive!

 

 

 

Who will like this series?

This is a classic superhero story! The heroes who triumphs over adversity! Full on superhero action of the classic Marvel and DC books! We are building a universe of Mature yet fun heroes!

Great for fans of:

Superhero Fun

Action Movies

Legion of Superheroes

Dragon Ball Z/My Hero Academia

X-Men

TR

 

PARABLES #0

Special Limited edition comic book. There will be a strict limit of 50 of these printed! So make sure to get yours before they're gone!

THE DETAILS..............

Hello! Just to clear up some things people generally ask:

1. You can pledge knowing that you will get your product! We have fulfilled over 12 successful campaigns on Indiegogo and Kickstarter!

2. The books are 100% complete and ready to go to the printer when the campaign ends!

3. Yes, there are Christian themes in the book, but it is a Superhero comic book, not  a preachy book!

THE REWARDS

 

LOOK AT THE ART:
story_txt:
What is the Tribulation Taskforce about?
THE END OF DAYS ARE UPON US   ​The soon to come world dictator  Apollyon is on a mission to bring forth the last days before the appointed time. Under a platform of world peace, he uses his position in the United Nations to assemble a team of Super powered warriors to help him achieve his true goal, the destruction of mankind.The hero  GROK, along with The Apostle John (who is still alive), search out the globe's greatest heroes to combat the oncoming threat!

 
TRIBULATION TASKFORCE: PARABLES SERIES
The Parables series presents origin and single character focused stories of the members of The Tribulation Taskforce!
ISSUE ONE (Previously available) Introduces the Thief In The Night!
Eli "Royalty" Caldwell had it all. A successful Mixed martial arts career, money and girls, but when tragedy strikes his family, he is forced to re-evaluate what is important in life. Out of the chaos, a Hero is born!
Written by: Bill Raupp  Art: Rully Akbar and Luis Rivera
The backup story introduces The Silent Knights! Written by Star Cross Comics founder Joe Spicer, the story follows the most fierce mercenary force in the Tribulation TaskForce universe! Featuring stunning artwork by Brian Dawson!!

ISSUE 2: Grok is the leader of the Tribulation Taskforce! He has motivated, encouraged and in some cases provided powers for the team members. But what do they really know about him? This issue all of his secrets are revealed. But when they are, what will that mean for the team going forward?
Written by Bill Raupp Art" Carlos Rodrigo
Side 2 is the origin of The Watcher's member, JEZEBEL. Find out what drives a simple single mother to become on of the most wicked women alive!

 
 
 
Who will like this series?
This is a classic superhero story! The heroes who triumphs over adversity! Full on superhero action of the classic Marvel and DC books! We are building a universe of Mature yet fun heroes!
Great for fans of:
Superhero Fun
Action Movies
Legion of Superheroes
Dragon Ball Z/My Hero Academia
X-Men





TR

 
PARABLES #0
Special Limited edition comic book. There will be a strict limit of 50 of these printed! So make sure to get yours before they're gone!

THE DETAILS..............
Hello! Just to clear up some things people generally ask:
1. You can pledge knowing that you will get your product! We have fulfilled over 12 successful campaigns on Indiegogo and Kickstarter!
2. The books are 100% complete and ready to go to the printer when the campaign ends!
3. Yes, there are Christian themes in the book, but it is a Superhero comic book, not  a preachy book!
THE REWARDS




 
LOOK AT THE ART:

story:
The Story 

After joining the Superhero Exchange Program, Sporkman journeys to the Land of the Rising Sun, where it turns out that Japan is exactly how all us Western anime and manga fans imagine it being!

Strong Female Characters? Check!

Massive Monsters? Check!

Giant Robots? Check!

Anthropomorphic Characters, Speed Lines & Super-villains??? Check!

Teaming up with Natsume Wubi, Sporkman will face off against a bevy of baddies, including Robo Ninjas, humongous Mechas, and the ever-elusive Shogun Z! How will Sporkman be able to handle everything thrown at him? Find out in this massive 91-page trade paperback guaranteed to keep you giggling for days!!

Every perk from 15 dollars and up comes with Free Poster drawn by Kill Box and a Sporkman Decal!

Sporkman Trade Paperback also includes over 10 pages of additional art! Like these two  commissioned from Ginger Foxy and Dankoo!

 

 

 

Exclusive Trade Paperback Cover drawn by Brad Ashworth

Poster drawn by Kill Box

Single Issue Covers

Color In Progress

More Sample Pages from Issue 2 before coloring

More Sample Pages for Issue 3 before coloring

  • Letters will be done by Josh Finney

story:
Tricks and Treats Volume 1 - what is it?

Tricks and Treats Volume 1 is a horror anthology that collects 6 stories previously published across 3 issues.

From the pages of issue 1

  • Land of Dagon

An ordinary cruise ship is met with an unusual storm that tosses the ship into chaos. At the end of it, the ship and its' crew find themselves in a strange land. The Captain and a few crew members set out to search for help, but whet they find instead horrifies them.

Writer/Artist: Ben Soto

 

 

  • THE TREE OF LIFE

A professor believes he has found the key to immortality. He hires a two man security team to accompany him in his search for the tree of life. Their adventure takes a dark turn when their plane is forced down in a mysterious jungle. The team finds they are not alone and worse yet, deathly wrong about the treasure they hoped to find.

Writer/artist: Justin Soto

 

 

From the pages of issue 2

  • MORE THAN THEY CAN CHEW

A young group of friends are lost in the background of Oklahoma and being hunted by cannibal psycho hillbillies who in turn are being hunted by a Bigfoot because their matriarch is the manifestation of pure evil.

Writer: Tommy Brownell

Artists: Johnnie Johnson and Jason Coody

Colors: Ben Soto

 

 

  • THE UNKNOWN INCIDENT AT KECKSBURG

Otis Knapp is a retired Pri-operative who is called back into action, to help the government communicate and assess the intentions of a Bigfoot and Gray Alien that were found at the crash site of what is known as the Kecksburg incident.

Writer/colorist: Ben Soto

Artists: Justin Soto and Michael Garrett

 

From the pages of issue 3

  • MULROONY

Clara travels to her great uncles castle to help him manage the property for a season. The castles' dark past is revealed and her very presence invokes the things that once resided in the old manor.

Writer: Manda Owens

Artist: Justin Soto

Colors: Ben Soto

 

  • MINE

A single mother struggles against her verbally abusive father for her son's devotion. After her father passes away, things don't improve as she had hoped, and her son begins having conversation with her dead father over a tin can phone her father had made for him. She soon learns that those conversations were not a coping mechanism and fights to save her son before it's too late. 

Writer/Artist: Ben Soto

  • WHERE DREAMS ARE BORN

Never before published story, made new just for this collected edition.

Where dreams are born explores the origins of dreams and aspirations, and asks, "where do they com from?"

C0-Writer: Matt Hudson

C0-Writer/Artist: Ben Soto

 

Halloween Head Comics started the summer of 2018 when brothers, Ben and Justin Soto set out to create  the kind of horror comics they wanted to see. Along the way they invited friends to join in on the fun. Writers: Tommy Brownell, Manda Owens, and Matt Hudson as well as artists: Johnnie Johnson, Jason Coody, and Michael Garrett.

The purpose of this campaign is two fold. First: With 97 pages of story published across three issues We felt it was a good time to bind the first three issues into a single volume and we need your help to get this done.  Secondly, we really enjoy creating these books and working with each other, but we want others to see what we have done and join in on the fun as well. As a creator, there's no better feeling than sharing what you've created with others who are like minded. So if you are a fan of monsters and all things Halloween, we invite you to join our little family of Halloween heads. 

 

  • 97 pages, 6 stories.
  • Remastered version of the first 2 stories.
  • Plus a bonus story.
  • Bonus material inside

Every book ordered comes with a free bookmark featuring Lil' Jack, The Halloween Head Comics Mascot.

Pencils and inks: Justin Soto

Colors: Ben Soto

 

Every order also comes with this 1" x 1" button/pin.

 

Like the cover and wish you could hang it on your wall? Well Add it on!

11 x 17 print of the cover art.

 

 

 

The First Stretch Goal is set to be unlocked @ $750.

Once unlocked every one will receive an 11 x 17 poster of Rob Geronimo's Wire Head!

08/07 UPDATE: STRETCH GOAL UNLOCKED!!!!!!

Art by Ben Soto

STICKERS: 5 PACK - STRETCH GOAL UNLOCKED!

 

An example of what you get when you order a sketch from one of these artists:

Sketches will be 6.5" x 10"

story:
A 60-page story 76 page Graphic Novel, with 4 chapters! Published in Graphic Novel over sized format. Published in Portuguese and English!

"The Midnight Witch" is about Mádika Leona, a witch who belongs to the "Temporum Era", a coven responsible for the protection of time in her own dimension, Lux Magicae.

 

The goal of this project is to introduce you to"The Midnight Witch" and in 2021-2022 publish the full story of Leona's graduation and the cataclysmic event that broke the timeline!

 

STRETCH GOALS unlocking! Scroll all the way down!!! Cards, Coasters and Prints!!! 

You can choose between 2 covers, but choose your material (paper, foil or metal):

Cover 1 - Yonami + Mikko Kauto

Cover 2 - David Gunawan

Choose your favorite cover in FOIL.

Choose your favorite cover in METAL.

PS this is REAL METAL !!!

Background/Histórico

From the mouth of creator Yonami himself: I created Leona for a comic I drew back in the  90s, in my teen ages - The Sun Kids - she was originally an antagonist  for that story as one of the apocalypse knights - the Chaos Death Witch,  who was responsible for bad omens in the ages of time. But, after some time, a friend told me "Man, that girl you draw is different from the other characters. 'She has your passion", and that was true, I created Leona in a time that I was kinda depressed, and did put all my feelings in drawings. That's impressive, every time I work on a new story of her I am living some sort of intense moment of my life, or some kind of transition. After that, I decided to study about the culture of  Witches, Celtics, Vikings, Ancient Egypt/Greece, Tarot, Myths from Eastern Europe, the history itself since the Victorian ages until the Industrial Revolution, etc. For years, the classic horror books were my favorite readings, such as Dracula, Frankenstein, and Lovecraft. All of those references gave me the basis for Leona's tales, (the name being a direct reference for Leon - The Professional, that's why Leona has a lil' zombie girl apprentice - Karmen) and then created the "Midnight  Witch" series.

 

LEONA STARTS HERE / LEONA COMEÇA AQUI

After a cataclysm event that happened during the initiation ritual of young Leona - a ceremony where she graduated from apprentice to witch - the timeline was broken thanks to a massive discharge of time energy. That cataclysm happened due to the presence of an anomaly that brought a great disturbance to Lux Magicae. That anomaly happened to be Leona herself. 

While her dimension's inhabitants turned into stone, time has stopped in her own reality and Leona is forced to travel through space and time, not staying in any dimension for more than a day. At midnight, she is always transported to a new place. 

According to old tales told by the Temporum Era, the first cataclysm was stopped thanks to the huge power of the first Time Lady. Because of that, the First Time Lady decides to transmit her knowledge to a group of women chosen by her in every dimension she visits. Those women's mission is to avoid a new cataclysm, contain the Time Flow and redirect it to it's original destination. 

 

After the second cataclysm in Lux Magicae, only two women survived (i.e. weren't turned into stone): Leona and her mother, Nastia. Both are absorbed by time and space, being the only ones capable of restoring the timeline in their own dimension. The problem is, they're separated, travelling randomly through the multiverse and they have to find each other before finding a way to return home and fix things there. 

 

"The Midnight Witch" follows the journey of Leona while she tries to find her mother.

Below stories will be compiled in this collection! 

 

“The Midnight Witch – Neverending Nights - Noites sem Fim”

Script/Roteiro: Carol Peace

Art/Arte: Yonami

Colors/Cores: Dal Bello

In this tale, the Midnight Witch spends a whole cycle at her home world –Lux Magicae. Without a single clue of her mother’s whereabouts, Leona comes from a lifetime search between different timelines. Her faith betrays her beliefs, and she’s definitely ready to leave all her hopes behind. But in the middle of this storm, the Midnight Witch seems to finally have a glimpse of the sunlight in the halls of Lux Triumphans.

 

 “The Midnight Witch – Trust and Betrayal (Confiança e Traição) – Parts I and II”

Script/Roteiro: Rodrigo Monteiro

Art/Arte: Edu Vienna + Edson Novaes

Inks/Tintas: Emanuel Braga

Colors/Cores: Emanuel Braga + Vincenzo Salvo

 

Leona continues her quest to find her mother. This time the Time Flow takes her to a new land that looks like somewhere in Eastern Europe, albeit belonging to another dimension. Thinking the reason she was taken there was to gather Intel regarding the whereabouts of her mother, she ends up finding way more than she had expected.

 

 

“The Midnight Witch – Epitaph”

Script/Roteiro: Yonami

Cover Art/Cobrir: Arthur Medeiros

Art/Arte: Yonami

Colors/Cores: Mikaella Fusco

Lettering/Letras: Yonami

 

This story happens right after "Neverending Nights",  Leona happens to arrive at a steampunk London and walking over the  Whitechapel streets, Leona faces the ghastly Jack the Ripper.

Choose COVER A or COVER B... it is that simple!!

But we can also get you the book with a FOIL or METAL cover :) 

Oh and we have Prints... and Postcards... and FREEBOOKMARKS with all packages send!!


 Postcards

Prints

 

You can choose PRINTS and POSTCARDS :) on your way out! This is a new feature from Kickstarter and lets you choose some extra's after you choose a regular pledge!

Postcard set... just choose your pledge and once there you are able to add this to your pledge!! >>>> Conjunto de postais ... basta escolher a sua promessa e, uma vez lá, poderá adicioná-la à sua promessa !!

PRINT per piece (A, B or C) or per set... just choose your pledge and once there you are able to add this to your pledge!! >>>> IMPRIMIR por peça (A, B ou C) ou por conjunto ... basta escolher a sua promessa e quando estiver lá você poderá adicioná-la à sua promessa !!

FREE ASHCAN with CROSSOVER PROMOTION

For folks that have paid attention, they can also see a crossover with Sisterhood being launched as well! If you want that story as well, then just go to that kickstarter page and just back it there.

"But how about double shipping costs? " you might ask.

Well, we have planned a very amazing freebie ashcan, which will showcase a unique story. And you will get this for FREE!!

More info via this YouTube video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=374v8d_FpBY

 

click here to go visit that page and get that crossover!!

Yonami - Paulo Teles (AKA Yonami) is a Graphic Designer by  graduation and comic book artist for passion, works as manager for House137 Studio and along with his team has provided stories for publishers such as Stone Arch Books, Glyph Productions, Galaxy Graphix,  Dynamite, Zenescope, Marvel, and DC through the years. Today, the  House137 Studio got a partnership with the accessibility company All Geek and  created the All Geek Comics brand for publishing their books in Brazil.

 

Rodrigo "Rod" Monteiro is a Brazilian writer who has been working in the comic business for the past nine years, being part of the Brazilian House137 Studio since its foundation in 2015. Among his published  material is "The Midnight Witch", "The Fairy Tales Unit", and "Undead Nightmare". All of them are currently available (in English) at the  Webtoons website.

 

Carol Peace - Carol Medeiros (AKA Peacermaker) Artist. Writer. Architect. Scientist. Indie Book Writer, addicted to Science (and fiction). LEGO and toy collector.

 

Emanuel  Braga - AKA EBraga graduated in history but always has been working related to art and illustration as a freelancer, creating caricatures, characters, and institutional books. Moved to Manaus to study Design, finally graduating as a designer, then illustrated for video game arts  from the Mathematicians and the game Swords & Tequila. After sign up to House137 Studio, Braga has worked for STAN LEE'S CHAKRA - THE  INVINCIBLE, MARVEL ANT-MAN SKETCH CARDS, BLOODWORKS, and ELKA THE  BARBARIAN.

 

Thiago Vale - he has begun working for Brazilian's Sherlock Holmes - The Christie Question. After that, Thiago worked for publishers such as Dynamite (Lil' Vampi Holiday Special), Survive Series (Graphic Planet),  Stan Lee's Chakra the Invincible and Dragonfly and the Global Guardians (Graphic India).

 

Walmir Archanjo - Illustrator, colorist, character designer for comics and animations. Walmir is a modest guy and a very committed professional with many published works such as the kid's book, the Whispering Peppers.

 

Mikaella Fusco - Colorist and indie self-publishing co-author of the webcomic Children of the Moon.




 

Risks and challenges

Actually I have SIX books all done like this self published without Kicsktarter... so I am not without xperience About this particular project: Shipping will be done worldwide I am failry new at this Kickstarter-game obviously, with MIDNIGHT WITCH being my "official" debut. Although the complete team are well versed in the industry, we do understand that there are possible unforeseen issues such as:

* Manufacture Delays

* Shipping Delays

* Story Editing Corrections

* Over-Robust Stretch Goal Fulfillment

 

Given this, I am very dedicated and committed to bring you an excellent comic book with quality products to ensure that the first impression of this new book to you, beloved backers, will be a great one.

click here to go visit that page and get that crossover!!Yonami - Paulo Teles (AKA Yonami) is a Graphic Designer by  graduation and comic book artist for passion, works as manager for House137 Studio and along with his team has provided stories for publishers such as Stone Arch Books, Glyph Productions, Galaxy Graphix,  Dynamite, Zenescope, Marvel, and DC through the years. Today, the  House137 Studio got a partnership with the accessibility company All Geek and  created the All Geek Comics brand for publishing their books in Brazil. Rodrigo "Rod" Monteiro is a Brazilian writer who has been working in the comic business for the past nine years, being part of the Brazilian House137 Studio since its foundation in 2015. Among his published  material is "The Midnight Witch", "The Fairy Tales Unit", and "Undead Nightmare". All of them are currently available (in English) at the  Webtoons website. Carol Peace - Carol Medeiros (AKA Peacermaker) Artist. Writer. Architect. Scientist. Indie Book Writer, addicted to Science (and fiction). LEGO and toy collector. Emanuel  Braga - AKA EBraga graduated in history but always has been working related to art and illustration as a freelancer, creating caricatures, characters, and institutional books. Moved to Manaus to study Design, finally graduating as a designer, then illustrated for video game arts  from the Mathematicians and the game Swords & Tequila. After sign up to House137 Studio, Braga has worked for STAN LEE'S CHAKRA - THE  INVINCIBLE, MARVEL ANT-MAN SKETCH CARDS, BLOODWORKS, and ELKA THE  BARBARIAN. Thiago Vale - he has begun working for Brazilian's Sherlock Holmes - The Christie Question. After that, Thiago worked for publishers such as Dynamite (Lil' Vampi Holiday Special), Survive Series (Graphic Planet),  Stan Lee's Chakra the Invincible and Dragonfly and the Global Guardians (Graphic India). Walmir Archanjo - Illustrator, colorist, character designer for comics and animations. Walmir is a modest guy and a very committed professional with many published works such as the kid's book, the Whispering Peppers. Mikaella Fusco - Colorist and indie self-publishing co-author of the webcomic Children of the Moon. Risks and challengesActually I have SIX books all done like this self published without Kicsktarter... so I am not without xperience About this particular project: Shipping will be done worldwide I am failry new at this Kickstarter-game obviously, with MIDNIGHT WITCH being my "official" debut. Although the complete team are well versed in the industry, we do understand that there are possible unforeseen issues such as:* Manufacture Delays* Shipping Delays* Story Editing Corrections* Over-Robust Stretch Goal Fulfillment Given this, I am very dedicated and committed to bring you an excellent comic book with quality products to ensure that the first impression of this new book to you, beloved backers, will be a great one.

story:
Here's a big blast of High-T Sunshine for ya!

 

Meet REIGNBOW.  He's a Brute.  The last real man in Fairyland.  

 

REIGNBOW THE BRUTE is a hard fightin', hard drinkin' Fairy Barbarian, who battles the Thundercloud Men and maintains order Under the Rainbow.  It isn't easy, with unicorn pests, thumb sucking Apes, Commie Elves,  and Onion Grove Children requiring constant vigilance.  

But Reignbow's worst day ever happens when after a series of Honeysuckle shots, he quarrels with one of the UNBEARABLES, a clan of miserable emotionally manipulative grizzlies, and they steal something precious to him.

Not only that, but PAULA POKKIT, a former...girlfriend whom he hasn't seen in 15 years, finds him to let him know that he has a son, and that boy needs a father!

Mount up on Reignbow's Girthy Stallion NEIGHPALM for the adventure of a lifetime, to retrieve his sword and perhaps, along the way,  teach young SHIRO POKKIT what it means to be a man! 

REIGNBOW THE BRUTE is a parody/satire that will take a lot of your memories of the 80's, and blend them with high testosterone and fun!  

It will be 48 pages, and hopefully we'll be able to afford some specialty covers with your support!

 

 

Regular cover!

24 Hour Variant Cover!  

KYLE RITTER VARIANT cover!

BONUS COMIC! MY GIRTHY STALLION: BARNSTORM

 

MY GIRTHY STALLION: BARNSTORM will be a spin off book, in which the baddest and beefiest Stallions, GHOSTGALLOP, SADDLEAXE, BLOODREINS, UNSTABLE 1, RIOTSPUR, STORMHOOF and of course, Reignbow's own steed and best pal, NEIGHPALM saddle up to ride hard against STALLIN and TROTSKIE!  Tons of fun, art and story by ETHAN VAN SCIVER!  

Take a ride with MY GIRTHY STALLION!  48 pages in full color!  You'll have a great time!

 

COOL STORY, BRO: Toxic Fairytales for Masculine Men

I'd like to make a storybook!  A beautiful, leather bound volume of future classics, featuring High-T parodies of Fairytales reworked and illustrated with a "toxically masculine" agenda!  

I'm going to do my spin on SNOW WHITE!  Jon Malin would like to do LITTLE RED RIDING HOOD!  And I'll invite more of the best creators to join us in filling this book with kick ass fun!  This will be the perfect gift for the dude in your life!  Don't miss it!

 

EXECUTIVE BRIEFCASE EDITION!

 

This is a subscription to the campaign! It is the ULTIMATE way to enjoy REIGNBOW THE BRUTE!

 If you back at this level, you will receive one of every perk, plus some exclusives only available at this tier, from here until we fulfill!

When I say "briefcase", I should actually say "lunchbox."  This will be packaged in a beautiful oversized lunchbox, reminiscent of the ones you took to school as a kid!  Like this: 

(Actual mock up soon!)

...but with awesome REIGNBOW THE BRUTE art all over it!  The perfect way to store your REIGNBOW THE BRUTE perks!  Limited to 4000 pieces, these will only be available for this campaign!

At the start of the campaign, you will receive:

1. One copy of the REGULAR edition of REIGNBOW THE BRUTE

2. One copy of the 24 hour VARIANT edition!  (We're changing the rules and adding this to your Subscription box!  Even after the 24 hours is up, you'll still receive this variant with your order!)

3. One copy of the KYLE RITTER VARIANT edition

4. One copy of the EXCLUSIVE STRAWBERRY LUV VARIANT edition

5. One copy of MY GIRTHY STALLION: BARNSTORM

6. One copy of COOL STORY, BRO: TOXIC FAIRYTALES FOR MASCULINE MEN

7. One of EVERY ADDITIONAL regular perk and achievement that this campaign sees from here!  You won't miss any of the ashcans, cards, stickers, whatever, it'll all be found in your EXECUTIVE BRIEFCASE! 

 

ORIGINAL ART!

 

You can purchase a page of original hand drawn art from either REIGNBOW THE BRUTE or MY GIRTHY STALLION!  There are 48 pages available for each!  They will be given out in the order of backers, first come, first choice!  There are no bad pages!  These are all rock and roll!

 

STRETCH GOALS!

 

At $100,000: all versions of REIGNBOW THE BRUTE will have beautiful prismatic covers!

 

At $150,000: MY GIRTHY STALLION will have a CHROMIUM COVER!

 

At $200,000: All EXECUTIVE BRIEFCASE backers will receive a BONUS black and white line art edition ashcan of REIGNBOW THE BRUTE!

 

At $250,000: All backers will receive 4 UNBEARABLES scratch and sniff stickers!  All EXECUTIVE BRIEFCASE backers will receive a BONUS REIGNBOW THE BRUTE DAZZLING STICKER!

 

At $300,000, all EXECUTIVE BRIEFCASE backers are getting a REIGNBOW THE BRUTE THERMOS!

 

And we'll take it from there!  That's pretty optimistic!  If we meet these goals, I'd like to add more fun stuff to everyone's orders!  And if we do REALLLLLY well, we'll talk about STALLIONS PVC toys!

 

THANK YOU ALL for your endless support and enthusiasm!  This is so much fun because of you!  I hope ALL CAPS COMICS remains your family's Indie Comics company for years to come!  

 

Now let's get this project funded! 

-Ethan Van Sciver

story:
Hi! Thanks for checking out the page! If you'd like to pre-order the book, you can do so over on witchcreeroad.com. Sorry to be sending you elsewhere - I tried using Indiegogo and find it counter-intuitive. Plus, Indiegogo reps made a few assurances that, while I don't want to say were lies, were definitely untrue.

When I have time, I'll jump through whatever hoops are required for me to stop this, but in the meantime I've made the perks unavailable.

 

 

Okay, first order of business: the project video above wasn't made by me. It was made by the fine and talented folks over at Webtoons. But it's an awesome trailer, and with me being the introverted, camera shy guy that I am, it felt like a crime not to use it. A crime, I tell you!

And with that said...

Welcome to the project!

Witch Creek Road follows a group of high school seniors who, after taking a wrong turn, find themselves in the midst of a summoning-gone-wrong. At its core, it's survival horror, but it's also a story about love, acceptance, death and revenge. And sexy, flesh-eating demons. Because every story needs sexy, flesh-eating demons.

Still not sold? You can actually read the entire story for free over on Webtoons. So don't be shy: head on over there and read away. If it turns out this story isn't for you, that's cool. Thanks for checking us out. But if you enjoyed it, you might consider grabbing one of the the hardcover books. They're going to be awesome - but I'm also pretty biased :)

Garth Matthams (writer/creator) lives on an island in Canada, with 2 rabbits, his beautiful wife, and the occasional spider that his previously-mentioned wife refuses to let him kill. He loves horror movies, comic books and visiting "haunted" locations, and one day hopes to be killed by an angry spirit.

Kenan Halilović (artist) is a freelance comic book artist from Bosnia who spends his free time hanging out with his friends and family, drawing circles for summoning spawns of darkness from the depths of hell and supporting his local football team.

colorsfactory (colorist, main story) is a colorist from Italy. She's a mystery, and that's part of her charm :)

Ania Jarmołowska (colorist, additional pages) is a 2D graphic designer, illustrator, and colorist. She's been working for around 8 years in game development and creating illustrations for RPGs and card games. Anna has always loved drawing and creating characters, and has always wanted to be a part of creating comic books.

 

WITCH CREEK ROAD the yearbook edition

Ever since Kenan and I started Witch Creek Road, the end goal has been to print physical copies. As such, everything was produced as traditional sequential art, which was then converted into the vertical scroll of the Webtoons format. In other words, there's no messy "format conversions" required.

WHY A YEARBOOK EDITION?

To me, it fit the theme. This is a story about high school seniors. Also, there was already a yearbook motif present within the original Witch Creek Road comics, in the form of the "In Memory Of" pages - and so I figured, Why not take this one step further? Why not design this edition with the aesthetic of a yearbook in mind?

Plus, I just find yearbooks fascinating. 

Full disclosure: I hope to one day see this story published by a publisher, distributed by Diamond Distribution, and available in comic shops. But whatever version that ends up being won't be this version. Because I have a hard time believing the publisher is going to say, "Oh, sure, let's pay to add a bunch of unnecessary pages simply to perpetuate the yearbook aesthetic. Yeah, let's make the cover the school logo, instead of anything recognizable from the comic. Oh, and let's make it hardcover. That's super cost effective!"

So, no: I'm taking advantage of my creative freedoms here to create the version of the book I want.

THE SPECS:

  • Case bound (hardcover) binding with gloss lamination and 105lb interior page weight (glossy), to give the book a nice "yearbook" feel
  • 163 pages of sequential art, including some pages never included in the Webtoons version
  • "In Memory Of" pages previously unpublished on Webtoons
  • Covers, including 3 alternate "retro" variant covers
  • Pinups
  • A credits page in the form of a yearbook "Faculty" page
  • A "Letter from the Principal" foreword
  • Yearbook divider pages to appear between issues and epilogues

The end product will be a beautiful 220-page, full color, hardcover collected trade paperback.

DISCLAIMER (please read): US and International fulfillment is being handled by a company located in the United States. There are advantages and disadvantages to this. The advantage is that shipping (for US backers) will be significantly cheaper, reducing shipping costs from about $30-35 down to $13.

The disadvantage is that there will be no physical add-ons, and books will be unsigned. I mean, at best it would have only been me (the writer) signing them anyway, as everyone else involved lives overseas. And I'd much rather save backers some money than to pretend my signature is worth $20.

DIGITAL: Here's the thing: you can pretty much read the entire story for free over on Webtoons. Here's the link. So backing at the digital level is only worthwhile for a few reasons: (1) You prefer traditional sequential comic pages over the vertical scroll of Webtoons. (2) You want to read the additional pages not included in the Webtoons version. (3) You prefer having the PDF because it means you can read it even when offline. And (4) You just want to support the project, regardless.

PHYSICAL: This is it! The version I've wanted since Kenan and I began this story back in 2017! And, yes, it will likely exist in other formats in the future. And, yes, some of those formats will be cheaper, like softcover editions. But you know what? Those versions are for chumps! This version - the YEARBOOK EDITION - is where it's at! And when you're watching some crappy, low budget movie version of this story - or, dare I dream, a Witch Creek Road Netflix series - you can congratulate yourself on getting in on the ground floor.

story:
Racconti del Poeta: una selezione di tredici racconti dell'orrore e del grottesco, scritti dal maesto Edgar Allan Poe ed illustrati da talentuosi artisti italiani.

In copertina: "Il gatto nero", di Lisa Pagnutti

Il progetto nasce dalla passione dei curatori Anita Zaramella e studiopazzia per l’opera di Poe e il media fumetto, creandone un punto d’incontro, e riunisce disegnatori con i più diversi background, dai veterani dell'indie a professionisti affermati. 

Da sinistra: "La maschera della morte rossa", di Silvia Schiavon; "Ligeia", di Matteo Batetta; "Il genio della perversione", di Giacomo Taddeo Traini; "I delitti della Rue Morgue", di Marco Rocchi.

Il volume conta 124 pagine in bianco e nero, in cui i nostri artisti si sono cimentati in adattamenti fedeli di racconti di Edgar Allan Poe, dall'horror al grottesco, passando per i più sperimentali. All'interno trovate il lavoro di: Anita Zaramella, studiopazzia, Ada Visser, Antonio de Fabris, Federica Perin, Giacomo Traini, Lisa Pagnutti, Marco Rocchi, Matteo Batetta, Mattia Modde, Nas Kirchmayr e Gianluca Girelli, Riccardo Pieruccini, Silvia Schiavon. 

Con introduzione di Angela Viola Borzacchiello.

"Hop-Frog", di Riccardo Pieruccini

"Il dialogo di Eiros e Charmion", di Federica Perin

 

"Una discesa nel Maelstorm", di Antonio de Fabris

 

"Berenice", di Anita Zaramella

Inoltre, in occasione della campagna, abbiamo l'occasione di offrirvi delle stampe in edizione limitata realizzati da artisti d'eccezione: Stefano Zattera, sarabaun, Beatrice Bogoni e Fabio Babich!

Leggete i perks fino in fondo per una sorpresa ;)

"Il barile di Amontillado", di Stefano Zattera

"Il Corvo", di sarabaun

"Metzengerstein", di Beatrice Bogoni

"La caduta della casa degli Usher", di Fabio Babich


Il fumetto italiano ha una lunga tradizione di adattamenti letterari a fumetti, sia per ragazzi che per adulti, che da sempre hanno l’obiettivo di legare due mondi: rendere la letteratura accessibile, sfondando il preconcetto della noia, e sfruttare le variegate potenzialità del media. In questo senso, riteniamo che l’opera di Poe sia un soggetto perfetto, e che possa guadagnare in intensità dall’apporto artistico che intendiamo aggiungere.

I racconti che troverete in Racconti del Poeta sono: Berenice, Ligeia, Il Ritratto Ovale, Hop-Frog, Il Diavolo nel Campanile, Re Peste, Il genio della perversione, Una discesa nel Maelstorm, Il dialogo tra Eiros e Charmion, Il silenzio (a fumetti, o in forma di racconto illustrato); La Maschera della Morte Rossa, I delitti della Rue Morgue, Il Cuore Rivelatore, e Il gatto nero (come illustrazioni singole all'interno del libro).
Le stampe raccontano invece: Il Corvo, Il barile di Amontillado, La caduta della casa degli Usher, e Metzengerstein. 

"Re Peste", di Gianluca Girelli e Nas Kirchmayr

Tutti gli artwork sono già stati completati, ma abbiamo bisogno di voi per poterli portare in stampa!

I perks

Tutti gli artwork sono stati completati, e sono pronti per andare in stampa. I fondi raccolti ci serviranno quindi per produrre fisicamente i volumi e le stampe, e (speriamo) per retribuire gli autori per il loro lavoro. Come potete contribuire?


Formato digitale
Se volete supportare il progetto con una spesa minore, potete accedere ai perks digitali.

Anzitutto, il libro in versione PDF, con gli stessi contenuti del libro cartaceo 


Le illustrazioni, anch'esse in versione PDF, realizzate da Beatrice Bogoni, Stefano Zattera, Fabio Babich, e sarabaun.


I wallpaper per i vostri device digitali, con il terrificante "Cuore rivelatore" di Ada Visser.


Formato cartaceo
Se invece siete dei tradizionalisti, potete supportarci acquistando i perks fisici.


Primo fra tutti, naturalmente, il libro: 124 pagine in bianco e nero stampate su carta 140g, copertina con alette


Le stampe, dimensione A4 (21x29,7cm). Per i lavori di Stefano Zattera e Fabio Babich, realizzati con tecnica digitale, stamperemo su carta patinata opaca da 250g, mentre per il lavoro di Beatrice Bogoni e sarabaun, realizzati con tecnica tradizionale, andremo a stampare su carta Fedrigoni Watercolor Ivory da 240g per una resa più precisa. 


I segnalibri e gli stickers, con i lavori di Ada Visser e Mattia Modde

Da sinistra: "Il cuore rivelatore", di Ada Visser; Edgar Allan Poe, ritratto da Mattia Modde

Per i perks più alti, usciamo dal cartaceo per andare in 3D, con la stampa in resina ispirata allo Scarabeo d'Oro (dimensioni 10x7x5cm circa). I portapenne, rifiniti a mano, sono in tiratura limitata ed acquistabili solo durante la campagna, quindi non fateveli sfuggire! Potete scegliere il solo Scarabeo, o il pacchetto completo di tutti i perks fisici che include libro, stampe, stickers, segnalibri e il portapenne.

I fondi

La campagna per Racconti del Poeta è in flexible funding, il che significa che è praticamente una prevendita: avendo già realizzato il libro e gli artworks, pensiamo che sia più soddisfacente per tutti sapere che se supportate il progetto, sicuramente vi portate a casa quanto promesso.


I fondi ci consentiranno anzitutto di poter stampare il libro, le stampe e i portapenne. Parte dei fondi andranno nell'imballaggio e spedizione, oltre che nelle tasse e oneri vari di Indiegogo. Inoltre, se dovessimo raggiungere il goal, potremo retribuire gli autori per il loro lavoro. E' un aspetto della creazione artistica in cui crediamo molto (lo facciamo per passione, ma è sempre un gran lavoro), e che speriamo ci aiuterete a raggiungere!


 

Stretch goals

Se il vostro supporto dovesse superare le vostre aspettative, vi diamo un assaggio degli stretch goal che abbiamo pensato:

A 7.000€, il libro cresce! Se dovessimo raggiungere questa cifra, Racconti del Poeta si arricchirà di una sezione sketch e work in progress, di circa 20 pagine, per un approfondimento sul lavoro dei nostri autori;

a 8.000€, gli autori riceveranno un pay rise. Il vostro supporto è infinitamente apprezzato, e siamo certi che sarete felici di sapere che i nostri autori sono adeguatamente retribuiti.

E se dovessimo eccedere anche qui...beh, ad essere sinceri sarebbe un supporto incredibile che difficilmente pensiamo di raggiungere. Comunque, ci penseremo a tempo debito ;)

Come supportarci al di fuori della campagna

Se siete intrigati, ma non avete la disponibilità per supportarci direttamente, vi invitiamo a condividere la campagna! Ogni nuovo paio d'occhi è un nuovo potenziale lettore, quindi condividete la campagna sui social e parlatene con amici, nemici, vicini di casa, colleghi.

Ci trovate su:

Facebook facebook.com/raccontidelpoeta

Instagram @raccontidelpoeta
story_txt:
Racconti del Poeta: una selezione di tredici racconti dell'orrore e del grottesco, scritti dal maesto Edgar Allan Poe ed illustrati da talentuosi artisti italiani.

In copertina: "Il gatto nero", di Lisa Pagnutti
Il progetto nasce dalla passione dei curatori Anita Zaramella e studiopazzia per l’opera di Poe e il media fumetto, creandone un punto d’incontro, e riunisce disegnatori con i più diversi background, dai veterani dell'indie a professionisti affermati. 

Da sinistra: "La maschera della morte rossa", di Silvia Schiavon; "Ligeia", di Matteo Batetta; "Il genio della perversione", di Giacomo Taddeo Traini; "I delitti della Rue Morgue", di Marco Rocchi.
Il volume conta 124 pagine in bianco e nero, in cui i nostri artisti si sono cimentati in adattamenti fedeli di racconti di Edgar Allan Poe, dall'horror al grottesco, passando per i più sperimentali. All'interno trovate il lavoro di: Anita Zaramella, studiopazzia, Ada Visser, Antonio de Fabris, Federica Perin, Giacomo Traini, Lisa Pagnutti, Marco Rocchi, Matteo Batetta, Mattia Modde, Nas Kirchmayr e Gianluca Girelli, Riccardo Pieruccini, Silvia Schiavon. 
Con introduzione di Angela Viola Borzacchiello.

"Hop-Frog", di Riccardo Pieruccini

"Il dialogo di Eiros e Charmion", di Federica Perin
 

"Una discesa nel Maelstorm", di Antonio de Fabris
 

"Berenice", di Anita Zaramella
Inoltre, in occasione della campagna, abbiamo l'occasione di offrirvi delle stampe in edizione limitata realizzati da artisti d'eccezione: Stefano Zattera, sarabaun, Beatrice Bogoni e Fabio Babich!
Leggete i perks fino in fondo per una sorpresa ;)
"Il barile di Amontillado", di Stefano Zattera

"Il Corvo", di sarabaun

"Metzengerstein", di Beatrice Bogoni

"La caduta della casa degli Usher", di Fabio Babich
Il fumetto italiano ha una lunga tradizione di adattamenti letterari a fumetti, sia per ragazzi che per adulti, che da sempre hanno l’obiettivo di legare due mondi: rendere la letteratura accessibile, sfondando il preconcetto della noia, e sfruttare le variegate potenzialità del media. In questo senso, riteniamo che l’opera di Poe sia un soggetto perfetto, e che possa guadagnare in intensità dall’apporto artistico che intendiamo aggiungere.
I racconti che troverete in Racconti del Poeta sono: Berenice, Ligeia, Il Ritratto Ovale, Hop-Frog, Il Diavolo nel Campanile, Re Peste, Il genio della perversione, Una discesa nel Maelstorm, Il dialogo tra Eiros e Charmion, Il silenzio (a fumetti, o in forma di racconto illustrato); La Maschera della Morte Rossa, I delitti della Rue Morgue, Il Cuore Rivelatore, e Il gatto nero (come illustrazioni singole all'interno del libro).Le stampe raccontano invece: Il Corvo, Il barile di Amontillado, La caduta della casa degli Usher, e Metzengerstein. 
"Re Peste", di Gianluca Girelli e Nas Kirchmayr
Tutti gli artwork sono già stati completati, ma abbiamo bisogno di voi per poterli portare in stampa!

I perks
Tutti gli artwork sono stati completati, e sono pronti per andare in stampa. I fondi raccolti ci serviranno quindi per produrre fisicamente i volumi e le stampe, e (speriamo) per retribuire gli autori per il loro lavoro. Come potete contribuire?
Formato digitaleSe volete supportare il progetto con una spesa minore, potete accedere ai perks digitali.
Anzitutto, il libro in versione PDF, con gli stessi contenuti del libro cartaceo 

Le illustrazioni, anch'esse in versione PDF, realizzate da Beatrice Bogoni, Stefano Zattera, Fabio Babich, e sarabaun.

I wallpaper per i vostri device digitali, con il terrificante "Cuore rivelatore" di Ada Visser.

Formato cartaceoSe invece siete dei tradizionalisti, potete supportarci acquistando i perks fisici.
Primo fra tutti, naturalmente, il libro: 124 pagine in bianco e nero stampate su carta 140g, copertina con alette



Le stampe, dimensione A4 (21x29,7cm). Per i lavori di Stefano Zattera e Fabio Babich, realizzati con tecnica digitale, stamperemo su carta patinata opaca da 250g, mentre per il lavoro di Beatrice Bogoni e sarabaun, realizzati con tecnica tradizionale, andremo a stampare su carta Fedrigoni Watercolor Ivory da 240g per una resa più precisa. 

I segnalibri e gli stickers, con i lavori di Ada Visser e Mattia Modde

Da sinistra: "Il cuore rivelatore", di Ada Visser; Edgar Allan Poe, ritratto da Mattia Modde

E' un aspetto della creazione artistica in cui crediamo molto (lo facciamo per passione, ma è sempre un gran lavoro), e che speriamo ci aiuterete a raggiungere!

Se il vostro supporto dovesse superare le vostre aspettative, vi diamo un assaggio degli stretch goal che abbiamo pensato:
A 7.000€, il libro cresce! Se dovessimo raggiungere questa cifra, Racconti del Poeta si arricchirà di una sezione sketch e work in progress, di circa 20 pagine, per un approfondimento sul lavoro dei nostri autori;

story:
Hello, Future Indiegogo Backers!!!

This is the official Indiegogo campaign for Project Olympus: The Crimson Order Book One, a 30-page all-in-color superhero graphic novel part of ComicsGate.

We have hired some of the best artists out there and are confident they can deliver a product worthy of Marvel and DC. Here at IronClad Comics, we promise the utmost quality of both art and story, but most of all we promise an entertaining read. 

Book Overview

After a five years split, The Liberators, the world's greatest superhero team, is forced back together by a string of mysterious terrorist attacks. Join Vitruvian, Valor, Liberty, and Blueeagle as they uncover a villainous plot that could mean the end of the world as they know it!

Written by David Timm Jr.

Drawn, colored, and lettered by Brycedius Sam (DATA JACKSON)

Main Cover by Caanan White (DEATHSHROUD), Jesse Heagy (TRANSFORMERS v. TERMINATOR), and Bryan Dekay

Cover 2 by Bryndon Everett (HALFBREEDS) and Bryan Dekay

Cover 3 (in progress) by Brycedius Sam (DATA JACKSON) and Bryan Dekay

Editing by Cody Karamol

Stretch Goals

$10,000 STRETCH GOAL *LOCKED* - 5 extras pages of concept story art by Bryndon Everett

$15,000 STRETCH GOAL *LOCKED* - Exclusive IronClad Comics logo sticker

$17,500 STRETCH GOAL *LOCKED* - Exclusive Project Olympus: The Crimson Order logo sticker

$20,000 STRETCH GOAL *LOCKED* - Exclusive Project Olympus Bookmark

$25,000 STRETCH GOAL *LOCKED* - The full 24-page SECOND ISSUE of Olympus Project: The Crimson Order

$27,500 STRETCH GOAL *LOCKED* - One random Project Olympus trading card, ONE in FOUR chance to get your favorite HERO!

$30,000 STRETCH GOAL *LOCKED* - Exclusive LARGE sticker of all FOUR HEROES

$35,000 STRETCH GOAL *LOCKED* - A SECOND random Project Olympus trading card

$40,000 STRETCH GOAL *LOCKED* - A THIRD random Project Olympus trading card

$50,000 STRETCH GOAL *LOCKED* - A FOURTH random Project Olympus trading card

$80,000 STRETCH GOAL *LOCKED* - The full 28-page THIRD ISSUE of Project Olympus: The Crimson Order

About IronClad Comics

IronClad Comics is a company founded by David Timm Jr. and Cody Karamol. Project Olympus: The Crimson Order Book One, is the first of many campaigns set to release for our company. As a company, we are set on bringing a great story with great art.  If you are interested in what we are doing contact us. Don't forget to check out our Instagram, Twitter and stop by the website while you are at it.

ICCpublic@outlook.com

https://www.ironcladcomics.net/

story:
We have published the SCP Foundation Artbooks!

 

...and will start selling them on Amazon in October! Follow our IndieGoGo updates and social media for the most recent news and links. 

 

Having a hard time understanding what's that all about? Read more detailed information below!

 

Our Books

The SCP Foundation is a fictional secret organization that seeks supernatural entities and phenomena, studies them and shields humanity from their impact. Hundreds of people from all around the world put their talent into the web-project so ingenious it beats the hell out of contemporary Hollywood. SCP is undoubtedly breaking new ground in the area of horror and science fiction.

With your help, we have published 3 books full of articles and secret files describing the most notable, creepy and intriguing anomalous objects the Foundation contains.

Our designer truly outdid himself making these volumes look less like some boring artbooks and more like authentic research journals. What's that if not the very embodiment of the SCP Foundation spirit? Inside, you'll find detailed reports imitating the real Foundation documents, complemented by additional materials and illustrated by professional artists from all around the world. We purchased the rights for existing artworks and commissioned many new – just to put them in our books!

The journals contain 192 pages each and are released in oversized hardbound (8.5 x 11" or 21.6 x 27.9 cm). The leather-imitating cases are wrapped in dust jackets.

 

Details on the Limited Edition

Especially for our IndieGoGo campaign, we have also published a limited print run of the artbooks wrapped in dust jackets with support for augmented reality.  There is a special app allowing to animate the covers!

 

We believe that ardent collectors were also pleased with a slipcase shaped like the Foundation personnel suitcase. 

===

However, right now this edition is NO LONGER AVAILABLE for pre-order or purchase! These features were exclusive for our IndieGoGo backers who contributed while the crowdfunding campaign still lasted. But don't lose hope, there's still a small chance to get these special volumes along with the slipcase, even if you are late! See below:

 

Special Perk for a Book Store 

If you represent a chain of book stores, comic stores or supermarkets (Barnes and Noble, MidtownComics, Target, Walmart, etc.), and you want to get 2000 sets of 3 volumes with limited-edition AR dust jackets and a slipcase at a good price, this is your one and only chance. Since our crowdfunding campaign is already over, your stores are going to be the only way to obtain these exclusives!

 

Stretch Goals with Bonuses 

We are very grateful to people who supported our first crowdfunding. That is why those who pre-ordered at least one book during our campaign have also got various free bonuses, everything that is marked as "achieved" in the picture below:

 

And there's More: a Giveaway!

And, as the icing on the cake, we held a giveaway of 30 vinyl toys based on SCP-035 (The Possessive Mask). The toys were made exclusively for this campaign and could have been obtained only by those who pre-ordered at least one book during the two months it lasted.

 

Check out the SCP Foundation Merch We Designed!

We also created some unique designs based on object classes and our most popular illustrations. Aren't they beautiful? The good news is... you can already buy all of them on Teespring and Amazon! Please note that Amazon is available only for Canada and the US. 

 

About Us

Each member of our team has many years of experience in comic book and artbook publishing. Now we gathered together to found Paranormal Activity Books –  a publishing house that is going to specialize in high quality books and comics about monsters, SCPs and other cool supernatural stuff.

We strictly follow the community rules. We put a name of the license on the back cover, and places a heartfelt thank-you note to the whole SCP project at the end of every book. Every article has author’s credits and a link to the original page. We used only those illustrations we have rights to. All of them were created by professional artists. For more information and our official position regarding the licensing emergency see our Instagram post.

We strive to create true works of art drawing more attention to one of the most original projects in the history of horror and science fiction. It is the best way to pay tribute to the incredible talent of SCP Foundation creators. We hope we achieved something with this campaign, and we are going to move forwards!

 

Other Ways to Support Us

Share our campaign on social media and spread the word!

  • Visit our website for the latest news about or current and upcoming projects. 
  • Subscribe to our YouTube channel.
  • Check out our Instagram account.
  • Buy our merch on Teespring and Amazon (apparel; pop sockets Safe, Keter, Euclid)
  • Join our Discord server

​
