story:
Ailsa Dark is back in the 64 page conclusion to Werewolves & Bampots!

Ailsa Dark is a Supernatural Heroine in the tradition of ‘Bronze Age’ horror characters from the pages of Vampirella, Werewolf by Night, Eerie and House of Hammer!

Two 36 page comics and one giant-sized 64 page conclusion bring you 136 pages of fear-filled fun!

Werewolves are killing their own kind and ghouls are devouring the remains!
The "Children of the Night" are staying in the shadows and keeping quiet... fearful of what's to come!

A mysterious antagonist is putting all the pieces into place for a deadly game that will culminate in the apocalyptic "Ceremony of the Wolf" and only Ailsa Dark can stop it!

Imagine a city and its people whose only hope for salvation lies within the darkness. This is Ailsa Dark's Glasgow... "no mean city"... and things are about to get biblical!

Hi, I'm William Hazle, the creator of Ailsa Dark. I've been publishing comics since 2015, starting with my anthology title Tales of Mystery and Imagination and culminating in Ailsa Dark: Werewolves & Bampots.  My professional background is in games development and I now lecture in Art & Animation when I'm not making comics.

I write, draw, colour, letter, design and edit every issue of Ailsa Dark. 

I know every campaign say this... but this truly is a labour of love.

 

 

 

 

 Everyone gets this awesome print from Statistical Zero (Statto) when the campaign reaches £4,000!  I think Statto's Ailsa Dark is pretty awesome!

 

Issues 1 & 2 were completed for the first campaign. I've begun work on the final issue and you can follow me on social media for all the updates and to see the work in progress.

This is a passion project for me and I've got a whole new world to build and share with you... let's do this! Become a part of Team Dark!

Help spread the word by sharing across social media!

Even if you can't contribute to the campaign, and I know how tight funds can be, you can still help by sharing this campaign and following me on social media.

All help is appreciated. Thanks!
story_txt: Ailsa Dark is back in the 64 page conclusion to Werewolves & Bampots!Ailsa Dark is a Supernatural Heroine in the tradition of ‘Bronze Age’ horror characters from the pages of Vampirella, Werewolf by Night, Eerie and House of Hammer!Two 36 page comics and one giant-sized 64 page conclusion bring you 136 pages of fear-filled fun!Werewolves are killing their own kind and ghouls are devouring the remains!The "Children of the Night" are staying in the shadows and keeping quiet... fearful of what's to come!A mysterious antagonist is putting all the pieces into place for a deadly game that will culminate in the apocalyptic "Ceremony of the Wolf" and only Ailsa Dark can stop it!Imagine a city and its people whose only hope for salvation lies within the darkness. This is Ailsa Dark's Glasgow... "no mean city"... and things are about to get biblical!Hi, I'm William Hazle, the creator of Ailsa Dark. I've been publishing comics since 2015, starting with my anthology title Tales of Mystery and Imagination and culminating in Ailsa Dark: Werewolves & Bampots.  My professional background is in games development and I now lecture in Art & Animation when I'm not making comics.I write, draw, colour, letter, design and edit every issue of Ailsa Dark. I know every campaign say this... but this truly is a labour of love.     Everyone gets this awesome print from Statistical Zero (Statto) when the campaign reaches £4,000!  I think Statto's Ailsa Dark is pretty awesome! Issues 1 & 2 were completed for the first campaign. I've begun work on the final issue and you can follow me on social media for all the updates and to see the work in progress.This is a passion project for me and I've got a whole new world to build and share with you... let's do this! Become a part of Team Dark!Help spread the word by sharing across social media!Even if you can't contribute to the campaign, and I know how tight funds can be, you can still help by sharing this campaign and following me on social media.All help is appreciated. Thanks!

story:
The first 150 backers receive a free 10-page ashcan. Art by Renzo Rodriguez.

 

Ashcan Page #1 art by Renzo Rodriguez, colors by Ryan Best

 

A powerful weapon in the hands of the world's newest Guardian. 

Guardians of Erloth: The Last Leopard King, Vol.3 Part I will be 30 pages in length, saddle-stiched, with a high-quality paper written by Chael Roberts (GOE. Vol.1 & 2), interior art and colors by Ryan Best (Judas Breed), a cover by Renzo Rodriguez (Impossible Stars), and lettered by Eric Weathers (Battle Brick Road).

Cover art by Renzo Rodriguez, colors by Ryan Best.

Guardians of Erloth: The Last Leopard King is a tale for all ages set in the magical world of Erloth.  Fresh from the battle with the Jade Sorceress (see Vol. 2), the companions travel towards the Marshes of Madness to find healing for a young prince, Caius. This healing will come at the cost of one of their own. Caius will move forward on his journey training to be a Guardian and reclaiming his homeland of Pardus.

In order to achieve victory, Caius sets out on a mission to reclaim the ancient halberd, Sun Reaver. Sun Reaver, formed from the metal of a fallen star, is one of Erloth's most powerful weapons. Wielded in the right hands, it uses the power of the sun to cut through almost everything. For Caius to become the strongest warrior, he must possess the strongest weapon. 

There is one catch. Caius must get past plant monsters, hordes of undead, and a monstrous Guardian to claim the ultimate prize. 

 

 

Stretch Goals

$4,500 all backers will receive a 4" x 4" magnet featuring art by Ryan Best

$6,000 all backers will receive one trading card featuring art by Ryan Best

 

Skirmish at Dawn by Ryan Best

Kaftar Incursion  by Renzo Rodriguez, colors by Ryan Best

This is the third volume in the Guardians of Erloth series. We have all past first print covers for all volumes, available as add-ons. These are only available in limited quantities. 

You can add them on when you check out. 

 

Here is a closer look at our products. Thanks for the reviews Nick and Blue Samurai!

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zY0zcGaRmkc

 

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gB0_jWoL5CY&amp...

 

 

Refunds will be given only for the duration of the campaign. Once we go to print the campaign will end and all funds will be allocated to printing.

Thank you for your support.

story:
Oi! TALES OF BARDIC FURY is a fantasy comic about a bard named Bryan who gets sent to Oi, a tiny village on the beach that never heard music before. Oi is a fantasy comic featuring hippy cult leader druids, Vandal fire giants, selkie sirens, trippy mushrooms, and all the bardic fury you can ask for.


THE BANSHEE VALE HORROR SHOW is the fourth book in the series Oi! Tales of Bardic Fury. The book is 72 pages and tells the story of Bryan the bard, Aideen the village hurling captain and her team travelling to a rival town in the haunted forest of Banshee Vale to compete in a high stakes hurling match. Needless to say, things don't go to plan and the bards of Banshee Vale have a message of their own to send. Who will survive this absolute horror show?

New to the world of Oi: Bardic Fury? Read the entire series for FREE on Tapas and Webtoons!

PREVIEW PAGES



Oi! 4: THE BANSHEE VALE HORROR SHOW is the sequel to Oi! BANSHEE VALE CALLING.  The book will be printed with black and white manga-style interior pages and will include 72 pages of story. Art, story, lettering and book design by me. Cover colors of the variant Candles hardcover edition are by Emett.
 

THE PERKS

72 pages of bardic fury and Banshee Vale horror, printed softcover and perfect-bound.


The hardcover collector's edition of THE BANSHEE VALE HORROR SHOW, featuring this beautifully creepy "Candles" Arianrhod textless variant cover, colored by Emett. (print version will not have the oi logo)

ORIGINAL ART

Original interior page art from THE BANSHEE VALE HORROR SHOW is available. Pages will be given out on first come, first serve basis.


'The Bards of Oi' 11"x14" on bristol board


'Aideen in the Rain' 11"x14" on bristol board

"Solstice" 11"x14" on bristol board

The DANAMANIA Value deal-three inked drawings of Banshee Vale's favorite skeleton girl.


ORIGINAL COVER ART-Original inked cover art featuring Arianrhod the spider siren. 11"x14" on bristol board.

'Candles' Original Art 11"x14" on bristol board.

Custom Watercolor Character Portrait 11"x 16" on watercolor paper. Get your RPG character, OC, friend or loved one painted in beautiful watercolor. You can also get your pet immortalized in paint!

 

 

STRETCH GOALS WILL BE ANNOUNCED AS THE CAMPAIGN PROGRESSES

story:
ROBERT is the 60 page full color graphic novel of the future...today!

HERE'S THE STORY:

Y3K, a catastrophic event that nearly wiped out the population and fried all of earths technology. But, what if the robots, rebooted? Without purpose, without guidance, without laws. These automatons emerge and create a new world of their own design, humans are just living in it. 
 

Almost 100 years since the devastating events of Y3K. Robert, Charles, and Eastwood are scavengers.  Gutting and dismantling is a part of the job, but after scraping the wrong bots, the crew find themselves on the wrong end of a gun. Ramón, leader of the Western Bot Gang, has set out a bounty with a high price and has the gears to pay, to bring back Robert and his crew for crossing him. Alive or in Parts.
 

Generations In The Making:

ROBERT is the adventure of a lifetime generations in the making. It's a sci-fi western loaded with action, robots, and a great story all culminated in this epic tale generations in the making.

Do you have a favorite Western Film? Or a favorite Robot? Chances are you'll love this book. Think A Fistful Of Dollars mixed with Robots and that's not even the half of it! It’s the Sci-fi, Steampunk, Western Adventure of the Future...Today!

 

 




 


 


 

 

--MEET THE CHARACTERS--

 


 

Where do we start?

  • The goal is to raise $3000 to get this amazing book into the hands of everyone wanting to enjoy this story and characters.
  • If we reach this goal stretch goals will be added with extra items thrown in for all backers as the campaign continues.
  • Every book will be signed no matter what perk. (Unless you don’t want it signed?)
  • This will be a straight forward campaign to make things easier and get these books in your hands faster!
     

 

--THE TEAM--

The Boogie-Bot:

  • Story
  • Penciler
  • Inker
  • Colorist
  • Letterer
  • Fulfillment 

Im a 23 year old indie comic artist/writer of the past 5 years working for Unearthly Comics creating and selling comic books at conventions

 

 

    WILL I GET MY BOOK?

    Absolutely! Having worked with an indie publisher for the past 5 years I understand what it takes to create a product and fulfilling that product. Being my own team this time around there's a benifit to being able to make the product I want to see happen, however time is a factor when it comes to campaigning. I am 40% complete with the interior pages and will continue to post new art here.

     

     

    Perks

    Perk 1:

    • (1) Robert- Graphic Novel/Signed 
    • (1) Robert- B&W Graphic Novel
    • (1) Robert #1 Original Single Issue 
    • Robert Sketch/Character sketch

    Perk 2:

    • (1) Robert-Graphic Novel/Signed

    Perk 3:

    • (2) Robert-Graphic Novels/Signed

    Perk 4: 

    • (1) Robert- Graphic Novel
    • (1) Robert- B&W Graphic Novel

    Perk 5:

    • Original Chapter. A Cover Art Page Signed/Will Be Revealed 

    Perk 6:

    • Original Chapter. B Cover Art Page Signed/Will Be Revealed

    Perk 7:

    • Original Chapter. C Cover Art Page Signed/ Will Be Revealed

    Internal covers will have the same quality as the cover inks


     

    ORIGINAL PRESTON ASEVEDO (DOC SALEM) SKETCH

     

    --STRETCH GOALS--

    These stretch goals will automatically come with your perk once reached for free!

    $3500 11X17 FOLDED POSTER! (UNLOCKED! ?)

    $4000 2nd 11X17 FOLDED POSTER!

    $4500 ROBERT PATCH!

     

     

    Risks & Challenges

    To ensure that this books meets the level of quality I hope to fulfill, I have given myself time to make sure the art is up to the highest standard possible, as well as the print quality of the book before it is sent out. Fulfillment is a little ways away however I am confident in my ability to have this book packaged and delivered to your home and in your hands by the promised fulfillment date.

    The dream is to make this book a reality, for an idea so many years in the making and so much time and patience that has been taken to bring this to you the backer. Anything and everything you can to do get the message out will be greatly appreciated.

    It all started with a robot.

story:
Stump's story continues in this second issue of what will hopefully be an ongoing series of comic books.  To do that I will need your help to get this book funded.  The reaction to Stump #1: Remastered was very positive and I can't wait for you to read Stump's next adventure!

Who is Stump?

Before we get too far into the details of Stump #2, I think it's important to explain what my vision is for Stump as a character.  The easiest way for me to describe him is that he's a working-class, "blue collar" superhero.  Which simply means that he works his butt off everyday to do the right thing and help others, without worrying about fame or glory.  This doesn't mean that he does not make mistakes or have personality shortcomings that might interfere with his goals, but his default attitude is to put the needs of others before any dreams or ambitions he might have.

A key event from Stump's past (parts of which were shown in flashback form, in Stump #1) will be the primary motivating factor for where Stump is going as a superhero (although he is not at all comfortable using that term to describe himself).

Most of the story in issues #1 and #2 takes place in a rural, "flyover country", small town environment.  For the foreseeable future, the town of Hillsboro, Illinois, will be Stump's primary base of operations.  I've never been happy with how small towns are traditionally depicted in entertainment and I hope to change that in some small way with my stories.

Anyway, back to Stump #2:

The first page of Stump #2 picks up only a few hours after the final page of Stump #1.  Loose plot threads from the first issue will be developed further and Stump will be forced to confront a new threat created by magical forces that he has never encountered before.

My goal is to create a book that can be picked up and read immediately after you finish Stump #1: Remastered, but also a comic book that presents a satisfying story for new readers as well.  Even if you've never read issue #1, I hope to create a story that you can still enjoy in Stump #2.

 

Unlike Stump #1: Remastered, this book will be more than an enhanced, colorized reprint of a comic that I finished years ago.  The majority of Stump #2 is being drawn out now and certain aspects of the story are being finalized.  The plan is currently for another 48-page book.

Here is a sketch of the Mangrell, Stump's primary opponent for this issue.  Loosely based on a statue of a Korean lion (foo dog) that I remember from my days stationed in South Korea, in the year 2000.  Stump's encounter with this creature will have long term ramifications for his character that will follow him for a while.

Some all new art from the comic. Here are three panels from two pages of the book:

 

Some more new artwork from the book, the transformation of the Mangrell:

Thanks for your time and consideration!

story:
Spiral Ink Comics presents...

Feathers Of Onyx! 

 A mythical action adventure tale following a powerful and deadly heroine discovering her path as a leader while battling through orcs,  demons, monsters...anyone or anything  that stands in the way of securing her homeland's safety and freedom.

Written by Cole Musick

Illustrated by Rob Hicks (Succubus, Hooded Cobra)

Colors by Federico Sioc Jr (Succubus)

**Suggested for Mature Readers. Contains Graphic Violence/Gore**

***Book production is complete! Just needs to be printed, packed, and shipped!***

 

 

 

The Perks

 

Premiere Standard Cover

20 pages of full color, fast paced action featuring Zura, leader of the Feathers Of Onyx!

20 page Digital Edition also available [PDF]

 

48 Hours Limited Edition Black & White Cover

Available only for the first 48 hours! Be sure to back it on Day 1 to secure a copy of this black and white line art cover by Rob Hicks!

 

Variant Cover A

 

Variant Cover B

 

Variant Cover C

*Actual cover is uncensored*

Variant Cover C Black & White Edition

*Actual cover is uncensored*

 

Variant Cover Pack

 

Retailer Pack

*Blank Cover Zura head sketch option also available*

 

 

Any questions or adjustments, please contact us at Spiralinkcomics.info@gmail.com. All refunds during the 30 day campaign are welcome and will be honored!

story:
IT'S BACK!

Imagine being so distraught by a movie that it ruins your life, only for your friends to make things worse, by kidnapping your favorite actor and remaking that movie in your basement. This is the story of Stealing Solo: A Captain's Parody

STRETCH GOAL UNLOCKED!

Stealing Solo is back, one last time, with an all new cover from Anna(ThatStarWarsGirl) featuring all of the classic Fandom Menace members! This 110 page graphic novel was written and illustrated by JEFF HICKS (WorldClassBullshitters) and features all new content created exclusively for this release!

(WCBs "Action Figures" created exclusively for this release)

For this release, I wanted something special, so I teamed up with Anna to create the definitive image of the Fandom Menace.

Our "Kidnappers"

Our "Hostage"

Filmmaking is easy

 

Caught in the act!

 

Quiet on the set!

The Trading Cards

The High Council Rides Again Cover By JEFF HICKS ! (Available for today only)

 

STRETCH GOALS

This campaign has multiple stretch goals and perks for everyone who backs the project.

*For every 100 backers, a new Fandom Menace magnet will be added for everyone*

More Stretch Goals!

$40K: Sticker (Holographic of Poster) - 140% COMPLETE! 

$53K: Stealing Solo Audio Drama - Produced by the cast of WCBs COMPLETE!

$150K: High Council Trading Card

$250K: Stealing Solo 2: The Sequel (out this year with another Fandom Menace Campaign)

$500K: A WCBs Short Film.

This 110 page graphic novel was written and illustrated by JEFF HICKS (WorldClassBullshitters) and features all new content created exclusively for this release!(WCBs "Action Figures" created exclusively for this release)For this release, I wanted something special, so I teamed up with Anna to create the definitive image of the Fandom Menace.Our "Kidnappers"Our "Hostage"Filmmaking is easy Caught in the act! Quiet on the set!The Trading CardsThe High Council Rides Again Cover By JEFF HICKS ! (Available for today only) STRETCH GOALSThis campaign has multiple stretch goals and perks for everyone who backs the project.*For every 100 backers, a new Fandom Menace magnet will be added for everyone*More Stretch Goals!$40K: Sticker (Holographic of Poster) - 140% COMPLETE! $53K: Stealing Solo Audio Drama - Produced by the cast of WCBs COMPLETE!$150K: High Council Trading Card$250K: Stealing Solo 2: The Sequel (out this year with another Fandom Menace Campaign)$500K: A WCBs Short Film.

story:
TALES FROM THE CLASSROOM: THE K. THULHU FILES is a hefty (50+ pages!) anthology book featuring several self-contained stories designed to be read in preparation for, or alongside, the upcoming and long-awaited sequel to the critically acclaimed TALES FROM THE CLASSROOM.

Showcasing some of indie comics’ most talented artists in Matt Crotts (KYRIE), Maxi Dallo (KILL JOURNAL) and Monika Maccagni (MONSTER M.D.) TALES FROM THE CLASSROOM: THE K.THULHU FILES will offer readers top-caliber, yet markedly different interpretations of TALES FROM THE CLASSROOM’s spooky universe through 3 thrilling, fun-filled, hair-raisingly good stories. 

 

 

Written by Von Klaus and with art by Monika Maccagni, the superstar writer-and-artist team behind last year's crowdfunding sensation, Monster M.D.⁣⁣, "The Tale of Kleotep" invites readers to explore the enigmatic past of K.Thulhu High's moonshine-guzzlin', banjo-playin', tobacco-chewin' Mummy schoolbus driver known only as Kletus.⁣⁣

 

                                                 

 

 

In "Quest for the Cosmic Dreidel", a field trip to a famous synagogue takes a turn to the surreal as TALES FROM THE CLASSROOM’s gentle giant, Joshua the Golem, breaks away from the tour group to embark on a reality-bending, mind-twisting adventure!

Written by Rob Muerto and featuring art by Matt Crotts, the genius creator behind acclaimed series "Kyrie".

 

                                               

​

 

 

Written by Rob Muerto and featuring art by one of Argentina’s most talented comic-book artists, Maxi Dallo (KILL JOURNAL), “Back in Romero…” tells the story of everyone’s favorite teenage Zombie back when he was cool, well before Drake turned him into his personal welcome mat. But were things really all that rosy back then? When are they ever...

 

 

                                                    

 

Production on TALES FROM THE CLASSROOM: THE K.THULHU FILES is nearly 100% done! We just need some time to push sales while taking care of the logistics surrounding printing and fulfillment. This book is guaranteed to get in your hands on time, and in as great a shape (or better!) as the first TALES FROM THE CLASSROOM.

story:
DAMEGANG is an original comic book about a group of giantess superheroes.

In the world of this comic book, DAMEGANG, some women grow to be around 9 feet in height; super tall, and extra thick. This happens in the same way, and at about the same frequency, as the way some people become dwarfs. This comes with some advantages, but with a lot more disadvantages than you might think.

In DAMEGANG #1: TALL TALES, we follow 3 of these giantesses; MAVEN, VANESS, and RIO. They gain super powers when they come in contact with an ANCIENT ARTIFACT and try to get answers from an ARCHAEOLOGIST.

 

The book is 80+ pages with 2 covers to choose from, and comes with 2 trading cards per book and the option of a poster. 

 

Cover A

 

Cover B

 

 

 

You can read the first 27 pages of this 80+ page book : On the web / Or download a PDF.

 

More art at DAMEGANG.com and DeviantArt.

 

This campaign is for book 1, which is part 1 of a of a 3-part story. At the time of the launch of this campaign, I would have outlined and roughly sketched all 3 books. It would take me about a year from the start of the campaign to have each book finished and shipped.

 

DAMEGANG.COM

story:
Indiegogo links:
*Dina Renon     *Jay Mooers     *Chris Olsen     *Michael Das     *Rusty Gilligan

Why crowdfund this project ?
In the small press market, a lot of releases aren't found in stores... retail or specialty. And with the small number of distributors and catalogs available today, we've found that crowdfunding (coupled with internet advertising) is the most productive and effective way of putting our products directly into the hands of collectors.
We consider the fans and collectors our 'partners' in these endeavors. Their direct contact and feedback is important to us, and through that, we can answer any questions and offer support in a more direct fashion. By dealing direct you avoid the often impersonal 'middle-men' and get to deal directly with the publishers and creators involved.


#dinosaur #dinosaurs #fossils #prehistoric#tradingcards #sketchcards #educational #cards #comics #comicbooks #cartoon #collectibles #crowdfunding #indiegogo #kickstarter #nonsportscards #thehobby

story:
As innovative as it was horrific, Norway’s contribution to the underground metal scene in the late 80s and early 90s left classic albums, charred churches and real corpses. While these sadistic Scandinavian stories have been told many times in documentaries and online blogs - Tales From the Black Circle is the first of its kind to tackle these tales in ghastly graphic fashion.

 

Paying homage to EC’s landmark line of horror comics - Tales From the Black Circle contains three tales of true life terror - all torn out of the pages of Norwegian Black Metal history. Rigorously researched using both primary and secondary sources (roughly 50% of written material is based upon direct quotes from the individuals and interviews we conducted for research purposes), these stories of frightful non fiction will educate as well as entertain the reader who has an interest in black metal, EC horror, music history, crime and comic books.

Written by Sam Hart (KEXP, Daily Dead, Beatdust.com).

And scratched out with real graveyard dirt ink by artist Trevor ‘Morbid’ Markwart, washed-up screenwriter, washed-up high school art teacher, washed-up washed-up.

 

The Stories:

Dawn of the Black Hearts

The opening tale focuses on Swedish vocalist Per ‘Dead’ Ohlin joining the premier Black Metal band Mayhem. It follows his obsession with death and his subsequent suicide that led to the grizzly treatment of the body by Euronymous, the lead guitarist of the band, and the most notorious album cover of all time. Told by horror host The Satanist from ‘Lucifer's Nightmare Pit’.

A Blaze in the Northern Sky

This story focuses on the infamous church burnings that brought the ‘Black Circle’ into the international media spotlight. It also highlights the tension between Black Circle members Euronymous & Varg Vikernes, aka Count Grishnackh. Horror host The Church Burner tells the tale from ‘The Boneyard of Ashes’.

Deathcrush

The trilogy of real life horror builds to a gruesome climax with the now legendary murder of Euronymous by rival Varg Vikernes, and the trial that followed. Told from the ‘Morgue of the Decayed’ by The Cadaver.

AND THERE'S MORE...

 

Tales From the Black Circle takes meticulous care in recreating the nostalgia of yesteryear print media - complete with a parody of the shameless comic book ads that rummaged the pocket money of countless children across the country - all with a black metal twist!

AND EVEN MORE!

The Hooded Fiend Presents… Cassette Tape


IF YOU DARE ... Tales from the Black Circle can come complete with a read-a-long cassette as one of the perks. Entitled ‘The Hooded Fiend Presents…’, the cassette features the intriguing, medieval sounding melodies of Dutch artist Tsjuster. Lo-fi, minimalist and macabre, the cassette gradually creates a state of listening that is one of trance-like enchantment. Each track corresponds with a different tale, setting the tone of the narrative perfectly and just as you are reaching a climactic point of the story, the music will correspond in tune. It's an experience that every comic fan should experience and it allows for an immersive good time.

If you're on the fence, how about reading this great independent review of the book:

http://horrornews.net/129749/comic-review-tales...

SO GO AHEAD AND SUPPORT THIS CAMPAIGN! WHAT ARE YOU SO SCARED OF? HELLFIRE? DAMNATION? CHURCH BURNER'S BEEN THERE, DONE THAT! AIN'T SO BAD!

story:
REPLICATOR #3 is a 32-PAGE FULL COLOUR comic book in the ongoing Replicator series.

REPLICATOR #1 and #2 are also available during this campaign combining for a total of 88 pages!

When a virus kills millions, one scientist (Sarah) discovers a potential cure however she goes missing in unusual circumstances and her husband (Ryker) is forced down a path that will change him forever.

But you'd do anything to save the ones you love, wouldn't you? Anything?

 

KYLE RITTER-ROB WILLIS COVER

 

HERE'S THE STORY: 

It's 2030, a virus "The Red Death" originating in England kills 10's of millions, fearing a global outbreak England is abandoned left to rot by the rest of the world.

Two corporations use the chaos to try and seize control of the country. One of these corporations (Globe) creates supes/mutants, the other (BlackGate) uses superior military technology/mechs.

What ensues is an all-out war between Mutants vs Machines, no one is safe.

 

 

--WHAT IS REPLICATOR?--

 

REPLICATOR is incredible. It is a fast-paced, action sci-fi comic, with Supes, Mechs and Super Soldiers set in a diseased ravaged England.

It's like The Boys mixed with Ghost in the Shell and Gundam, sprinkled with a little contagion and that doesn't even sum it all up.

Corporations are looking to take over...and human life is just an afterthought.

Replicator cuts out all the bullshit. There are no characters standing around a water fountain talking, there is tons of intense action, and characters who will make you love them because they are so deliciously evil.

 

CAANAN WHITE-CLAYTON BARTON COVER

 

DAN FRAGA-SHELBY-MATT YACKEY COVER

 

BLACK AND WHITE INTERIORS.

In this campaign, we're also offering an exclusive black and white line art only version which showcases the intense exterior and interior line art of Replicator.

This means a black and white cover and black and white interiors as well. 

 

--THE TEAM--

 

REPLICATOR 1

Clayton Barton (Cover)

Armin Ozdic (Interior Art) Ross A Campbell (Colours)  Marshall Dillion (Letters)

REPLICATOR 2

Aaron Alfeche (Covers) 

Aaron Alfeche (Interior Art) Dc Alonso (Colours) Marshall Dillion (Letters)

REPLICATOR 3

Dan Fraga, Rob Willis, Canaan White (Covers)

William War Reyes/Chis Arieswendha (Interior Art)  Korey Barton/Michael Bancroft (Colours) Eric Weathers. (Letters) Brandon Crowder(Editor)

--FAQ'S--

 

WILL I GET MY BOOK?

YES! This is the third Indiegogo campaign I've run, and sixth crowdfunding campaign overall, we have delivered on all.

WHAT'S THE DEAL WITH SHIPPING?

We are shipping all our comics in the Australian version of the Gemini mailer, it's double the weight of the previous mailer.

All comics will be bagged and boarded. All international packages will come with tracking.

We take as many precautions as possible to make sure your comics arrive in perfect condition. However, if there are books that arrive damaged, we will gladly replace them. I'm available for all questions and concerns at replicatorcontact@gmail.com

 

NEW ORIGINAL ART

- https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1qHAJaPPrUC0knkill_tlGdrIuzefxhff?usp=sharing

here is the link to the drive when you back just tell me which piece you want and it's yours. It's first come first serve.

--ADD ON'S--

NO ADDITIONAL SHIPPING COST.

*NEW* KYLE RITTER COLORED COVER

ROB WILLIS REPLICATOR #3 COVER

DAN FRAGA REPLICATOR #3 COVER

CAANAN WHITE REPLICATOR #3 COVER

ORIGINAL -REPLICATOR 1

Get the original 32-page issue of Replicator 1, it won't be reprinted and there are only a limited amount of copies left.

MISPRINT- REPLICATOR 2

Due to a printing error, there are a select number of misprinted issues of Replicator 2.  A double-page was split into two single pages. Apart from this, they are fine.

BATTLE DAMAGED REPLICATOR 1 AND 2

Due to a handling error, there are a select number of battle-damaged copies of Replicator 1 Remasted and Replicator 2.  The condition of these I would estimate to be 90-95% of perfect quality.

 

--STRETCH GOALS--

 

$4K-  Mini Prints. *UNLOCKED*

$8K-  Mini Prints. *UNLOCKED*

$12K- Mini Prints. *UNLOCKED*

$16K-  Mini Prints. *UNLOCKED*

Mini Prints. A5 (5.8 x 8.3 inch) full-colour virgin covers (No Text) 300gsm.

$20K- ART TEAM BONUS*/ REPLICATOR 4* *UNLOCKED*

ART TEAM BONUS* 

William Reyes, Chis Arieswendha and Korey Barton will receive a bonus of $250 USD each.

REPLICATOR 4*  

Will start IMMEDIATELY AFTER REPLICATOR 3 IS FINISHED. This will allow a quicker turnaround and less wait for you guys.

$25k- Goal Added.*UNLOCKED* Ghost, Black and White Print by Matthew Dalton. A4 (8-1/4 x 11-3/4 inch)

$30k- Goal Added. *UNLOCKED*Monster Ryker, Black and White Print by William War Reyes. A4 (8-1/4 x 11-3/4 inch)

$33k- Goal Added *UNLOCKED* Canaan White Black and White Print A4 (8-1/4 x 11-3/4 inch) Replicator 3 cover.

$36k- Goal Added *UNLOCKED* Canaan White Colour A4 (8-1/4 x 11-3/4 inch)Replicator 3 cover.

$40k- Goal Added *UNLOCKED*

2nd Art Team Bonus. William Reyes, Chis Arieswendha and Korey Barton will receive a bonus of $250 USD each.

story:
Seventh century Scotland. Henry Gunn leads his clan in a ferocious battle with Viking invaders led by the Savage Rathgar! Rathgar sees victory finally within his grasp. Gunn and his men, sensing that this may be their last stand, are saved by the approach of three unknown ships. The Vikings flee, not sure if the new uninvited "guests" are friend or foe.

Rathgar

Gunn and his men are saved by the fortuitous approach of Princess Sa' Ra of Alexandria. Sa' Ra has been sent on a mission to find a champion. One that she believes will aid her in her time of need. But the "Gods" have an even greater need for this man, Henry Gunn! And if he chooses to ally himself with Sa' Ra and these "Gods", he will be forever changed!

Will Gunn undergo the transformation to something other than human, and at what cost? The fate of civilization rests on the shoulders of a troubled warrior, husband, and father. What are you willing to sacrifice for all of humanity?

In the tradition of The Stars My Destination and The Silver Surfer, OFFWORLDER is a star-spanning science fiction saga that will keep you riveted from the first page to the very last.

Lizzarsin

 

OFFWORLDER is 25 pages of story.  The script is complete.  All 25 pages have been drawn.

 

Cover A by Jordi Armengol

 

Cover B by Massimiliano Veltri

 

Vintage Cover by Jordi Armengol

 

OFFWORLDER page 1

 

 

OFFWORLDER page 2

 

 

OFFWORLDER page 6

 

 

OFFWORLDER page 14

 

 

OFFWORLDER page 20

 

 

OFFWORLDER page 21

 

 

OFFWORLDER page 23

 

 

Mike Baron - 

Mike is a multi-faceted writer, most commonly known as the creator of Badger and the co-creator of Nexus with Steve Rude.  Some other titles he's written for include The Flash, Punisher, Action Comics and Batman... just to name a few.  He is also a novelist and has written Helmet Head, Whack Job, Biker, Skorpio and Florida Man.

Jordi Armengol - 

Jordi is an amazing artist.  He's been publishing graphic content since 1992.  He has worked at Norma Editorial and Amigo Comics. Some of his works include Rogues and the cover for Mike Baron's novel, Skorpio.  In addition to drawing the pages for OFFWORLDER, he's also doing the coloring and lettering.

Ben Henderson - 

Ben is the creator of the Gunn Family Saga. These titles include Ravage: Kill All Men, OFFWORLDER, The Wraith, and The Magus.

 

Fanatic Comics - 

Fanatic Comics is a family-run company. The Stewart family is very involved in the growth and prosperity of the company. Lee’s daughter and nieces help with Support. Lee and his wife, Kerry, run the day-to-day. Kerry does much of the programming and paperwork. Lee handles networking, promotion, writing, and logistics.

Fanatic Comics is truly a family business run by comic fans who love comics!  

 

$5 - Digital Copy Only

Become a member of the clan when you pledge $5 and receive a PDF of OFFWORLDER issue #1.

 

 

 


$8 - Duine Uasals - Your choice of cover

Over the main body of the clan were the 'Duine-Uasal', the 'nobles' of the clan.

Join the ranks of Duine-Uasal when you pledge $8 and receive a physical copy of OFFWORLDER Issue 1 - your choice of cover:  Cover A by Jordi Armengol; Cover B by Massimiliano Veltri or the Vintage Cover by Jordi Armengol

 




 

 

$28 Toiseach Reward Tier

The eldest of the Chieftains was called the ‘Toiseach’.

Become a Toiseach of the clan when you pledge $28 and receive your choice of cover and your choice of T-shirt:     

  • Design 1 features the cover artwork by Pat Broderick.
  • Design 2 features artwork as designed by Jordi Armengol.
  • Design 3 features the line art design of the Pat Broderick cover.
  • Design 4 features Jordi Armengol's cover artwork
  • Design 5 features the Vintage Cover by Jordi Armengol

T-Shirts are available in sizes S-3XL.

 

 

 

 

 

 

$34 - Chieftain Reward Tier

Chieftains were the heads of the individual houses which formed the Clan.

Become a Chieftain when you pledge $34 and receive:

  • OFFWORLDER Issue #1 — Your choice of cover 
  • Print of Sa'Ra drawn by Matt Wheldon, colored by Jordi Armengol.  Print will be 5.5" x 8.5"
  • Pat Broderick cover print colored by Jordi Armengol.  Print will be 5.5" x 8.5"
  • Coaster
  • Bookmark
  • Sticker



 



 

$70 Clan Chief Tier

Ruling over all the clan is the Clan Chief

Become Clan Chief when you pledge $70 and you will receive:

  • OFFWORLDER Issue #1 Cover A - Jordi Armengol
  • OFFWORLDER Issue #1 Cover B - Massimiliano Veltri
  • OFFWORLDER Issue #1 Vintage Cover - Jordi Armengol
  • T-shirt in your choice of design - Design #1 featuring cover artwork by Pat Broderick; Design #2 by Jordi Armengol; Design #3 is the line art design of the Pat Broderick cover; Design #4 featuring the cover artwork by Jordi Armengol; Design #5 featuring the Vintage Cover by Jordi Armengol
  • PDF of OFFWORLDER Issue #1
  • Sa'Ra Print drawn by Matt Weldon & colored by Jordi Armengol.  Print will be 5.5" x 8.5"
  • Pat Broderick cover print colored by Jordi Armengol.  Print will be 5.5" x 8.5"
  • Bookmark
  • Coaster
  • Sticker

 


 

Add-ons

The following add-ons are available during checkout:

  • $5 for a PDF of OFFWORLDER Issue #1
  • $8 for each additional copy of OFFWORLDER Issue #1
  • $26 for a swag pack — Pat Broderick print + Sa'Ra Print + sticker + coaster + bookmark
  • $20 for a T-shirt

 

 

If you have questions, contact us at fanatic_IGG@fanaticcomics.com

 


Every backer of a physical item will receive all unlocked stretch goals.

Every backer gets their name on our thank you page. If you wish not to have your name listed let us know on the survey.

Our goal is to create content that everyone can enjoy. Our team is made up of individuals with vast experience in their fields. Storytellers, artists, shippers, programmers, customer services. All of this experience coming together under one banner to bring you a high-quality book. Packaged and shipped under the supervision of a 30-year veteran in the industry. This is why we use Gemini mailers.

We will keep you abreast of all phases of this project as we move forward. Full transparency is important to us. So, let's start right now...

We will update you regularly. Even if that update is the same as the last. (No canned responses) Keeping you informed is important and vital for us to build trust with our backers.

Questions posted to the comments section or sent through the "ask a question" link will be answered in a judicious manner!

Currently, the script for OFFWORLDER is written. All 25 pages are penciled and inked. 8 pages have already been lettered and colored. This makes OFFWORLDER 77% complete overall!

 

SHIPPING

We ship with Gemini and only Gemini. Gemini today and Gemini tomorrow. Gemini all day.  Did we mention we only use Gemini mailers?

All books will be bagged/boarded and secured in Gemini mailers.

 

How can you help?

If you are able to contribute to our campaign, that is wonderful!  If you are not able to contribute by pledging, you can still help spread the word.  Please use the share links at the top of the page to help get the word out to others who may be interested in backing the campaign.

In either case, we greatly appreciate your support.

 

Risks and challenges

As with any project, there are always unforeseen circumstances that cause delays, especially in this time of the corona virus. All that's left is 18 pages to color and letter. So once the book is funded that will be finished and the book will go to print. We have taken into account possible printing & shipping delays and the three holidays that will occur during this period. That is why we've projected fulfillment to be February 2021.
story_txt:
Seventh century Scotland. Henry Gunn leads his clan in a ferocious battle with Viking invaders led by the Savage Rathgar! Rathgar sees victory finally within his grasp. Gunn and his men, sensing that this may be their last stand, are saved by the approach of three unknown ships. The Vikings flee, not sure if the new uninvited "guests" are friend or foe.RathgarGunn and his men are saved by the fortuitous approach of Princess Sa' Ra of Alexandria. Sa' Ra has been sent on a mission to find a champion. One that she believes will aid her in her time of need. But the "Gods" have an even greater need for this man, Henry Gunn! And if he chooses to ally himself with Sa' Ra and these "Gods", he will be forever changed!Will Gunn undergo the transformation to something other than human, and at what cost? The fate of civilization rests on the shoulders of a troubled warrior, husband, and father. What are you willing to sacrifice for all of humanity?In the tradition of The Stars My Destination and The Silver Surfer, OFFWORLDER is a star-spanning science fiction saga that will keep you riveted from the first page to the very last.Lizzarsin OFFWORLDER is 25 pages of story.  The script is complete.  All 25 pages have been drawn. Cover A by Jordi Armengol Cover B by Massimiliano Veltri Vintage Cover by Jordi Armengol OFFWORLDER page 1  OFFWORLDER page 2  OFFWORLDER page 6  OFFWORLDER page 14  OFFWORLDER page 20  OFFWORLDER page 21  OFFWORLDER page 23  Mike Baron - Mike is a multi-faceted writer, most commonly known as the creator of Badger and the co-creator of Nexus with Steve Rude.  Some other titles he's written for include The Flash, Punisher, Action Comics and Batman... just to name a few.  He is also a novelist and has written Helmet Head, Whack Job, Biker, Skorpio and Florida Man.Jordi Armengol - Jordi is an amazing artist.  He's been publishing graphic content since 1992.  He has worked at Norma Editorial and Amigo Comics. story:
Story

Hi, I'm Michael Finn and along with comic creators Ron Frenz and Barry Kitson (our pencilers), Mark Waid (our editor) and a host of other comic creators, we are making an original 100+ page graphic novel in full color featuring dozens of super-heroes and villains from Comic's Golden Age, the 1940s and 1950s.    

The story takes place in the middle of World War II.  Hitler, advised by Misery, the Claw and others, has hatched a plan to assassinate President Roosevelt using the combined power of some of the biggest villains of the past, including the Clown, Mastermind, the Rat, the Scarlet Skull and the saboteur, Frost.  The only thing standing in Hitler's way is The Liberty Brigade, a team comprised of the Blue Flame, Cat-Man, Kitten, the Mad Hatter, the Green Turtle and three brand new heroes:  Mr. Freedom, the Bill of Rights and the National Anthem. 

There are cameos by dozens of heroes from the 1940s, including well-known heroes such as The Black Terror and lesser-known stars such as TNT Todd, the Spark Man and Mirror Man.  The same for villains as you'll find Professor Fenton, the Green Ghoul, the Cobra and Veda the Cobra Woman.  

In addition to the 80+ page main story, we have over 20 one-page origins of various heroes and villains of the Golden Age by a host of comic book superstars including  George Perez, Alan Davis, Mark Buckingham, John Totleben,  Rick Veitch, Barry Kitson, Jim Calafiore, Chris Weston, Ken Lashley, Ron Wilson, Mark Morales, Al Milgrom, and many more.  

We are also offering The Liberty Brigade Sourcebook comic in conjunction with Temporal Comics -- this comic book contains encyclopedia entries on many of the key characters in The Liberty Brigade graphic novel.

The Liberty Brigade Graphic Novel - Regular Cover

The Liberty Brigade Graphic Novel - Steranko Cover

The Liberty Brigade Issue #0 and Sourcebook

The Liberty Brigade The Villain Files - Regular (left) and Sal Buscema Variant (Right)

Creative Team

We have an amazing team of comic industry veterans featuring:    

Ron Frenz - Ron Frenz has illustrated nearly every character in comics and had terrific runs on The Amazing Spider-Man, Thor, Spider-Girl, Ka-zar and, of course, Superman.  

Barry Kitson  - Like Ron, Barry has worked on almost every comic character out there for Marvel, DC and Valiant.  With Mark Waid, he re-launched the Legion of Super-Heroes and also co-created EMPIRE, the ongoing story of a villain who has conquered the Universe.  

MARK WAID - Mark serves as the Editor and provides plot/script and art advice and acts as the Mr. Miyagi to our new writer, Michael Finn.  If there is a super-hero, Mark has surely written the book and left his indelible "mark" on it. He has had beloved runs on The Flash, Superman, Fantastic Four, Captain America, Daredevil, and the Champions, not to mention Kingdom Come (with Alex Ross) and many of his own titles such as Irredeemable, Incorruptible and The Traveler.  Mark was Editor-in-Chief of Boom! Studios and is known as one of the "good guys" in comicdom.

MICHAEL FINN - Michael is a long-time participant on the comics scene, representing many of the top artists and writers in the business.  With the great encouragement and assistance of his comic book colleagues, Michael is bringing his dream project to life.

Rounding out the team are our inkers Joe Rubinstein (Wolverine, X-Men, Captain America, Batman) and Eisner Award Winner Mick Gray (Batman, Hawkman, Legion of Super-Heroes) along with veteran colorist Memo Regalado, and letterer Dezi Sienty  

Rewards

Risks & Challenges

No Risks - The graphic novel is being colored, dialogued and lettered but all of the art has been penciled and inked.  There are 5 pages left to complete in one of the ancillary books.  We have two assistant editors and everything is tracking.

story:
STAR CIRCUIT is an adrenaline-fueled, cyberpunk racing adventure inspired by the likes of Akira, F-Zero and Bladerunner!  

It is the self-titled, first chapter of a new Comic Book mini-series!

 

Main Cover

Caanan White Variant Cover  (Colors by Steve Firchow)

The Story

After all human attempts have ended in tragedy, one street-racer, Atlys Metric, is still convinced that with the help of a long-forgotten racing legend he can win in a championship full of unbeatable androids and save what’s left of his broken family.

 

 

 

 

 

-UNLOCKED- 'The Legend' Postcard 

 

-UNLOCKED- J. Thevenot Art Print

@StudiosZade​

 

Trading Card (Free for all who signed up Early!)

   Art by Sara Setna.

 

Star Circuit Banner (9" x 24")

 

Layouts and Design

 

T-Shirt Logo Design

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Written and Illustrated by Joe Catapano

Letters by Eric Weathers.

Variant Cover by Caanan White

Trading Card Image by Sara Setna

 

 

Other Ways to Help the Campaign

If the price of STAR CIRCUIT Ch.1  is just something your pocket book can't handle right now...NO WORRIES.  You can still help this project reach its goal and beyond by:

  • Clicking the Follow button on the campaign anyway!  You may not be able to contribute but bookmarking it may remind you to tell a friend.  
  • Sharing this Indiegogo page with your comic friends and family and on social media.
  • Share the Trailer on social media!
  • Follow Me on Twitter, Youtube and Instagram.

story:
Book 2: Belly of the Beast

A 50 page Graphic Novel - that asks the question: What if you had a Near Death Experience, but when you returned from the other side, you brought back a piece of the eternal with you? You awoke to find you now had paranormal abilities and you were a superhuman!

SHADOW SENTRY is an X-Men meets the Matrix Superhero team book with a SUPERNATURAL twist! Join Artist and Creator ERIC NINALTOWSKI along with the same creative team from Book 1- as the story picks up right where it left off...  GET READY TO RUMBLE as the Shadow Sentry clash with Blood Bane and the Hell Born in the first all out battle!

 

 

 

Eric Ninaltowski Regular Cover- Homage to X-Men #3- Colors by Carbon Graphics

Matt Cossin Variant A- Ninja Scroll Poster Homage- Colors by Carbon Graphics

Aaron Lopresti Variant B- All art and colors by Aaron!

Canaan White Variant C - Colors by Carbon Graphics

*NEW* BOOK 1 WRAPAROUND VARIANT -By Eric Ninaltowski and colored by Carbon Graphics

Homage to CABLE #1 by Art Thibert!

LIMITED TO SELECT PERKS DUE TO VERY LIMITED QUANTITY!

Matt Cossin Original Cover art! For sale during the campaign! Get it fast!

 

 

Risks & Challenges

As with all endeavors, we have a grand dream a wonderful plan, however sometimes life happens and there are things that are out of our control - Namely Death. If I die- I really hope I can come back as a High Born and finish this book with Supernatural speed and determination- but if not- rest assured that will be the only thing that will keep me from finishing this book or not delivering.

The last book I managed to finish in a little over a year despite a newborn baby joining our family, and COVID wreaking havoc on everyone's schedule (causing a major shipping delay and thus fulfillment). So have no fear. What I say I will do... I'm gonna do it! Come Hell or high water, one way or another... I will deliver!

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, and that's okay! That doesn't mean you can't help. If you like this campaign please take a second to:

  • Make some noise about the campaign! Share it out to get it before as many people as possible! Social Media is a great place to share!
  • Also use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it. Thanks so much! I look forward to serving you!

Make some noise about the campaign! Share it out to get it before as many people as possible! Social Media is a great place to share!
Also use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it. Thanks so much! I look forward to serving you!

story:
PURE ENTERTAINMENT AWAITS YOU INSIDE THE PAGES OF THIS COMIC BOOK....

Since the last 80 years, comic readers and purist have been interested in only two things when it comes to comics, AMAZING ART AND DYNAMIC WELL WRITTEN STORY!

And best believe I worked hard on those two things in this comic book...

NINJA BLAST : The comic book with 32 high quality pages of action packed manga style art!!!

An High Flying Action Packed Comic Book That Brings Back Nostalgia!

The Ninja Blast comic  centers around the young Shadow Blast Ninja Ace, we begin the story of the young ninja coming into full completion of his training  and becoming a Master just like his Sensei Genshin who is a father figure to him.

On the day of his training completion ceremony of the Shadow Blast Arts, he find himself in a middle of a fued that span over years between his Master and General Ganto, who is Sensei Genshin younger brother.

As Ace falls deeper into the feud between these two Masters of the Shadow Blast Ninjutsu Arts, Ace finds out something that will change the outlook of his Master/Father figure forever....

The Awesome Captivating Dynamic Manga Art  that you see is just a small sample of what you will get in this comic.

Layouts is by you main pal Fatal Jay and line art by Francis Gabriel Catindig!

HALF  OF NINJA BLAST COMIC BOOK IS COMPLETED!

There are two comic covers to choose from or you could want BOTH! Comic Cover A is the original comic version and Cover B is the variant comic version.

Cover A comic layouts done by me your friend Fatal Jay and both covers are done by Francis Gabriel Catindig.

The comic team behind Ninja Blast are pretty skillful when it comes to comics as well with an Katanna sword or two. Here is the Ninja Blast comic team.

Story: L.J. "Fatal Jay" Upshaw 

Art: Francis Gabriel Catindig

Colors: Aikau Oliva de Oliveira Coasta 

Colors: William "Bad Ankle Bill" Blankenship 

Letters: Jason "Mutt" Williams 

Check out the awesome perks on the right side of the screen. You can select a copy of the comic book or grab a variant comic cover or grab both! Whatever Perk is best for you, I will appreciate  very much your support.

Also, there is not just comics their is....This Incredible Ninja blast 11 x 17 Clash Print is also available as a perk!

(UNLOCKED) $4,000 - Funded

(UNLOCKED) $5,000 - Upgraded comic paper stock.

(UNLOCKED) $6,000 - Book marks for everyone!

(UNLOCKED) $7,000 - Sketch and development pages in the back of the comic book

(UNLOCKED) $8,000 - Stickers for everyone!

(UNLOCKED)$9,000 - A trading card for everyone!

(UNLOCKED) $10,000 - Additional 4 pages (36 Pages total) For The Comic.

More to Perks To Come From The Ninja Blast Comic

What We Need & What You Get

We have all the tools to make Ninja Blast the comic, something that will stand out and become a exciting project, but I very much need your help to pay for the last half of the comic book.

Dynamic art you will see in this comic book takes money, and it also cost to get Ninja Blast printed and shipped out to you in a timely matter.

FUNDING IS VERY IMPORTANT TO GETTING THIS BOOK TO YOU ON TIME. 

Which is my number one goal, half of this comic book as been funded out of my own pocket.

We need a minimum of $4,000 dollars to get this comic book made and put into your hands, and without your help this dream will not be possible at all.

In return for your help, I will make sure you will get an comic book that I put my all into, and cool perks to go with that as well!

The Impact

NINJA BLAST is not possible without you simple and plain! This comic book has been in my head for 10 years and I am making sure this book is of quality.

A ton of time, money, and care  went into this comic book, and the team behind Ninja Blast is of consistency and talent.

Risks & Challenges

The Story of Ninja Blast is already written and half of the comic book is done. The biggest challenge is obtaining funds for shipping and wrapping up the rest of the comic book. Ninja Blast when in your hands needs to be of the highest page quality and shipped to you in a timely manner. 

I am not alone, I am surrounded by a team of professionals who have done comic book campaigns in the past and know the best strategies to get a book out in a timely manner.

I will keep you updated step by step on the status of Ninja Blast, keep my commitment to the comic book and deliver to you an professional quality product.

Other Ways You Can Help

One of The Best Things To Do For Ninja Blast Other Then Backing The Comic Book Is:

Share the Ninja Blast comic book on every social media, make youtube videos about the book. Every time you bring Ninja Blast up it increases the chances of new backers and the cool thing about a social media share is its FREE!

THANK YOU SO MUCH FOR SUPPORTING NINJA BLAST!

YOUR FRIEND,

FATAL JAY

story:
CHASING DEMONS

No, nobody is chasing ACTUAL demons in this book... Instead, the characters involved will be chasing and confronting their own personal demons.

STORY SUMMARY

Matthew in many ways seeking seeking redemption. He wants to move on from his days as a crooked cop, but has had no luck. The community sees him as a criminal. He works at a minimum wage job, his girlfriend's parents hate him, and to top it off he is about to get evicted! How long will it take for Matthew to finally break and go to a more beneficial life of crime?

WHY THIS STORY?

I believe in many ways Chasing Demons is different from most things coming out, anyone could say that, so hopefully you take my word for it. Since this is a mini series, we are firing on all cylinders, that means we are holding nothing back! Despite this being a prequel to my Stryde mini series, it is also a perfect jumping on point for new readers. Even if you aren't sold on the story, the art alone by Pradeep Sethi will make your purchase worthwhile.

CHARACTERS

Matthew Foster AKA Cobalt is the main character of this comic, he was a character who appeared in Stryde. I noticed early on that Matthew had a lot of potential to carry his own story. The city hails him a hero, but the tragic fact is he's conning them all. He fights crime mainly for his benefit, as he steals drug money and takes out any illegal competition. Denver is better with Cobalt, but the cost is a lie.

Maximo AKA Marrow is the main antagonist of this comic, my goal was to make him a compelling villain and I believe I have achieved that. Marrow runs Hell's Cradle, a casino catered to criminals. Maximo will endure family problems all while having to deal with Cobalt.

Tessa Flowers is the love interest to Matthew. Without this character, the story has no legs to stand on. Tessa has known Matthew for awhile now and has accepted his darker side, although she is hopeful his better side will prevail.

RISKS
People are understandably nervous to back a campaign, but I can assure you this will get done as I have many campaigns under my belt. I managed to release the entirety of my Stryde mini series and that was when I had zero experience. I cannot do it alone, I was blessed to have backers support me and I will need that to finish out this book.

THANK YOU

Whether you back the comic or not, thank you for taking the time to check out my campaign!

THE TEAM

Writer: Thomas Retzke

Main Artist: Pradeep Sethi

Artist: Jordan Beattie 

Editor: MAB

Letterer: Drew Denis

THE ART

story:
SPECIAL UPDATE:

SCP-5000 WHY The Graphic Novel has been fully printed in a Limited Edition of only 1000 copies, and is in stock at our studio now!

This concludes the Extended Preorder Event. We will however be leaving the Deluxe Package with all the Extras and a Special Discount live here until all 25 Deluxe Packages are claimed.

Shipping for IndieGoGo buyers will commence immediately after all Kickstarter Preorders are sent out.

 

ABOUT THIS BOOK

SCP-5000 WHY The Graphic Novel is a fully realized, illustrated, full-color, comic book-style, mystery, horror, adventure tale that will leave you wondering; WHY?

SCP-5000 WHY The Graphic Novel is based on the SCP Foundation file SCP-5000 Why? by Tanhony. A Creative Commons project in CC 3.0 BY-SA-US

SCP-5000 WHY The Graphic Novel is a Full-Color Illustrated Comic Book which clocks in at 120 Pages! Printed in the USA, in the Industry Standard Comic Book size Apporx. 7 x 10 Inches [17.78 x 25.4cm]. Litho Printed on 100lb Satin paper stock with sturdy Matte Finish Hardcover. And featuring Thread Sewn Binding!

ABOUT THIS STORY

The SCP Foundation has preserved The Veil for ages and maintained The Mission.

To Secure anomalies, Contain them, and Protect humanity.

What exactly is the reason 'WHY' the SCP Foundation has turned against humanity and unleashed the horrors it once Contained? Is this related to the actions of SCP-049? Or is this the very same reason SCP-682 finds humanity so 'disgusting'? 

SCP-5000 WHY The Graphic Novel won't answer every question you may have about this mysterious series of events, but you will see everything much clearer so you can investigate for yourself. Maybe YOU will solve the mystery!

If this is your first introduction to the SCP Foundation you are in good hands. This Tale serves as a primer for what you can expect from SCP Lore and brings together all of the most loved fan favorites of the SCP Foundation containment files.

FREE ITEMS

Bookmark and Mini Print will arrive with every copy of SCP-5000 WHY The Graphic Novel.

BONUS ITEMS

Look for the Deluxe Package that contains the Jigsaw Puzzle, Clearance Card, Patch, Medical Mask and more. All these extra goods are already made and ready to ship as soon as the full stock of SCP-5000 books arrive.

PRODUCTION SCHEDULE

This book is already fully Illustrated, and Produced. Yes, we have all the Funding already. We are using IndieGoGo to expand the Preorder Event we already ran on Kickstarter. FYI, We are making this book a reality NO MATTER WHAT.

We are already working with the printing company and have developed the first test print of this book. The Test Print came out great.  It has been finalized and approved for printing before this IndieGoGo Campaign even ended! Expect a swift production and delivery! Though all Indie GoGo Rewards will be sent out after all Preorders made via Kickstarter.

CONCLUSION

Discordia Merchandising makes strange things for stranger people. Verified Manufacturer on Trampt.com. As Seen in Clutter Magazine & on Boing Boing about this very book!

SOME OF OUR PAST PROJECTS: DIY Spray Can - DIY Boxcat - SCP Pin Series 002 - SCP Sticker Series 001 - SCP Sticker Series 002 - SCP Enamel Pins Series 003 - SCP Super Deluxe Patches Series 001 - SCP Super Deluxe Patches Series 002 GLOW EDITION. 

Discordia Merchandising is a fully independent operation with a 13+ year history of various independent productions (4 Years on Kickstarter). 30+ comic conventions vended, & a convention of our own, 2017s Designer Toy Summit.

Don't Blink, and you Don't recognize the bodies in the water...

Dr Gavriel Discordia, & Dr Starr of Discordia Publishing; a division of Discordia Merchandising

Special Thanks to everyone at the SCP Foundation Wiki for all your amazing work!

For more SCP Goods Visit:

story:
When the mystic realm of Brightwater comes under attack by ancient evils it falls to a spirited young boy to rise to the challenge. Armed with a Living Sword, a Magical Garment and three vials of Hero Water, its up to Arrowyn to protect the Secrets of Eternity and his home.

Be the first of your friends to discover the awe-and-wonder behind this fantastic new series!  Experience THE ADVENTURE, THE FANTASY and THE MAGIC in the most EXCITING fantasy series of the season!

story:
EPIC LEGENDARY FANTASY IN A PREMIUM GRAPHIC NOVEL

VESTIGE is a self-contained 48 page story that sets the scene for an ever expanding universe – a world on the brink of modernism, with its future history in question as ancient yet powerful artifacts of the past are uncovered – with more volumes to come.

Please note, this has completed shipping globally, thank you kindly!

 

DRAWN BY PROFESSIONAL IMAGE COMICS ARTIST

VESTIGE is an epic creative comics effort by Gat Hanzo, writer and creator –  with pages drawn in an all-new style by inimitable artist Donal T. Delay, professional Image Comics artist.

Our saga begins in the 1890s. The remnants and powers of relics that shaped the old world are thought lost, but their rediscovery will shape the future as the dawn of the industrial age nears.

INTERIOR ART PAGES IN PROGRESS

 

THE EPIC STORY

Mixing historical accuracy and fantasy adventure, VESTIGE links the events of history through the influence of legendary weapons of the past, and how the “vestige” imbued within these relics might influence the direction of the future for the soon to be modern world.

These legendary weapons, these relics, convey sometimes vast powers to those who possess them, transforming ordinary mortals into superhumans with supernatural abilities.

PRINT QUALITY AND BOOK QUALITY

This project is released in full color prestige format, with high quality interior and cover stock pages and a perfect bound spine.

Every effort has been and will be made to assure our backers of receiving a product worthy of their trust, shipped in a timely manner in the finest packaging available.

story:
Issue #1 cover:


Issue #2 cover:


WILD TALES is an ongoing anthology of short stories set in the KYRIE universe.

Each story is:

  • Envisioned, written or co-written by KYRIE creator Matt Crotts (@mattcrotts)
  • Showcases an exciting variety of cultures and action scenarios across time 
  • Serves up themes and characters you know and love from the KYRIE graphic novels


Includes:

~ RUBICON faux-suede koozie

~ Iron-on RUBICON patch with gold thread

~ Two exclusive magnets

~ Original 4x6" drawing

~ Decoding cipher

- 3D printed with real marble dust PLA, this 3" diameter cipher is built from independent interlocking rings for deciphering codes!
- 3D printed with copper PLA and hand-polished and aged by Matt Crotts himself, this ancient artifact is affixed to the top of the cipher.

Inside the decoding cipher is a secret key for unlocking the KYRIE code! 

The unlocked code gives you DISCOUNTS on all future KYRIE books!



















You get lots of cool content! The highest quality comic at a reasonable crowdfunding price!

WILD TALES is at least three stories in one 44-page full-color comic (Bonus 12-page story)

 


Story: Revolutionaries, turncoats and spies fight to claim an ancient power from Japan's founding, amidst the fires of the Russo-Japanese War.   17 pages

Writers: Matt Crotts and Mat D. Rhys
Artist: Kayden Rowk
Colorist: Matt Crotts

 



Story: Myra fends off assassins in southwest India, while the Queen of Palmyra bargains with the deadliest thieves in the Roman empire to secure her most precious possession.   14 pages


Writer: Matt Crotts
Artist: José Garcia
Colorist: Matt Crotts



Story: Myra negotiates between organized crime and Palmyrene royalty for the Annual Chariot Race prize.   11 pages

Writers: Matt Crotts and Craig Henderson
Artist: Fresher Luke
Colorist: Matt Crotts





Features Arthur Conan Doyle's Dr. Watson, and characters from Rudyard Kipling's 'The Man Who Would Be King'!  Part 1 of 2.   12 pages 


Story: Dr. Watson and two British soldiers race to stop Lancer insurgents on their way to looting an Afghanistan tomb, and reestablishing the ancient Punjabi kingdom of the Sikhs.

Writers: Matt Crotts and Larry Bernard 
Artist: Jesse White
Colorist: Matt Crotts


... and one BONUS manga - CATACOMB CLASH !


Story:  Myra and her journeyman trainee Lucius travel through Rome's catacombs, in search of a hidden treasure from royal Palmyra.   10 pages


Writer: Matt Crotts
Artist: C. Thomas Anderson






The KYRIE adventure continues ...
Drawn & written by Matt Crotts!


Get ready for a high-adventure trek through 3rd century North Africa, as a team of treasure hunters and outcasts uncover the secrets of Alexander the Great on the frontier of the Roman Empire!

KYRIE tells the story of ​a curious band of thieves, cutthroats, bookworms and traitors as they attempt to outsmart the North African authorities, while navigating their own dark and competing desires as outlaws of a dying Roman Empire.

Books One and Two of this unique graphic novel series is ready to be put into your hands! 

All 280 pages are already printed!
 


See more content from KYRIE Book 1: The Curse of the Macedonian Scroll here.

See more content from KYRIE Book 2: Exiles in Wasteland here.

You get lots of cool content! The highest quality comic at a reasonable crowdfunding price!
WILD TALES is at least three stories in one 44-page full-color comic (Bonus 12-page story) 

Story: Revolutionaries, turncoats and spies fight to claim an ancient power from Japan's founding, amidst the fires of the Russo-Japanese War.   17 pagesWriters: Matt Crotts and Mat D. RhysArtist: Kayden RowkColorist: Matt Crotts 
Story: Myra fends off assassins in southwest India, while the Queen of Palmyra bargains with the deadliest thieves in the Roman empire to secure her most precious possession.   14 pages
Writer: Matt CrottsArtist: José GarciaColorist: Matt Crotts

Story: Myra negotiates between organized crime and Palmyrene royalty for the Annual Chariot Race prize.   11 pagesWriters: Matt Crotts and Craig HendersonArtist: Fresher LukeColorist: Matt CrottsFeatures Arthur Conan Doyle's Dr. Watson, and characters from Rudyard Kipling's 'The Man Who Would Be King'!  Part 1 of 2.   12 pages 
Story: Dr. Watson and two British soldiers race to stop Lancer insurgents on their way to looting an Afghanistan tomb, and reestablishing the ancient Punjabi kingdom of the Sikhs.Writers: Matt Crotts and Larry Bernard Artist: Jesse WhiteColorist: Matt Crotts

... and one BONUS manga - CATACOMB CLASH !
Story:  Myra and her journeyman trainee Lucius travel through Rome's catacombs, in search of a hidden treasure from royal Palmyra.   10 pages
Writer: Matt CrottsArtist: C. Thomas Anderson

The KYRIE adventure continues ...Drawn & written by Matt Crotts!
Get ready for a high-adventure trek through 3rd century North Africa, as a team of treasure hunters and outcasts uncover the secrets of Alexander the Great on the frontier of the Roman Empire!KYRIE tells the story of ​a curious band of thieves, cutthroats, bookworms and traitors as they attempt to outsmart the North African authorities, while navigating their own dark and competing desires as outlaws of a dying Roman Empire.Books One and Two of this unique graphic novel series is ready to be put into your hands! All 280 pages are already printed! 
See more content from KYRIE Book 1: The Curse of the Macedonian Scroll here.See more content from KYRIE Book 2: Exiles in Wasteland here.

  • IRON SIGHTS 2 Graphic Novel

story:
ROCK 'N ROLL NINJA  is a 100-Page Graphic Novel about 4 Vietnam Veterans who escape from a NINJA CLAN to pursue their dream of being in a ROCK BAND.

 

Created by Richard C. Meyer, Matt Bahr and Chuck Dixon

Story by Richard C. Meyer and Chuck Dixon

Script by Chuck Dixon and Richard C. Meyer

Art by Matt Bahr

 

4 VIETNAM VETERANS

1973- 4 young MACV-SOG soldiers finish up their Tour Of Duty in Vietnam and fly back to the USA to start their dream of becoming rock musicians.

NINJA

1975- After having all of their equipment & van stolen after a concert, they accept an offer from a colonel they knew in Vietnam for a 6-week "security consultant" gig in Japan.

What could go wrong?

The boys train some very serious Japanese men in the elite tactics & advanced weaponry that they used as MACV-SOG soldiers. As they finishing the consulting gig, they find out they won't be going home...ever. The people who they had been training are NINJA! 

ROCK BAND

1981- After years of service to the Ninja Clan, the boys finally escape and head back to NYC. They reform the band, but must turn down all record deals and promotion since they have to lie low, so that the Ninja Clan cannot track them down...and kill them OR (even worse) force them back into the nightmarish life they had already escaped from!

ROCK 'N ROLL NINJA

1983- Realizing that their big shot is passing them by, the boys create an elaborate plan to lure their Ninja Clan to New York City and pick them off one-by-one. They do this by splicing in footage of them in ninja garb using secret techniques from their ninja clan into VHS tapes of re-dubbed Ninja Movies that were filmed in The Philippines.  But they're not the only people with plans for the Ninja Clan. The Colonel wants to bring Ninja into the modern world and FRANCHISE them!

TEAM

Richard Meyer, Chuck Dixon & Matt Bahr have banded together to tell this epic story of loyalty, Ninja & Rock 'N Roll.

INSPIRATION
