story:
Hello, everyone! We're back with another campaign. First, we want to thank all our previous supporters.  If you are new to us, we appreciate you taking the time to look at our campaign.

We are attempting to do something different this time. As many of you know, Fred Perry has produced close to 300 issues of his groundbreaking series, Gold Digger. Over the years, we have reprinted his creation in a series of "Bricks" which are collections of his series in 25-issue increments. 

Some of the earlier Bricks we have printed in the past have long gone out of print. Two of those editions are GOLD BRICKS V and VI (a.k.a. Color Bricks 3 and 4), which reprint issues #51 to #75 in Brick V and issues #76 to #100 in Brick VI. These Bricks also have NEVER been reprinted in the newer format, so now we are going to offer BOTH Bricks at the same time. 

So to emphasize....

COLOR GOLD BRICK 3 (Gold Brick V) REPRINTS Gold Digger issues #51 to #75

COLOR GOLD BRICK 4 (Gold Brick VI) REPRINTS Gold Digger issues #76 to #100

 

 If you supported the previous color Gold Bricks, thank you very much, and we hope you support this campaign too. With a load of great standalone and continuity pickup stories, this collection makes a great jumping-on point for any new readers, as well as awesome reading for longtime fans.  Between its black-and-white and full-color issues, Gold Digger is fast approaching the 300-issue mark and is going strong!

Cover to GOLD BRICK V / Color Brick 3

Cover to GOLD BRICK VI / Color Brick 4

 

If you're not familiar with us, my name is Joeming Dunn, and I run Antarctic Press, a small, independent comic company started in 1984. I have personally collected comics of almost every type and genre since 1974, and I can say that during the past 30 years, we have published some of the greatest and best independent comics out there. Our publishing history includes titles like Gold Digger and Ninja High School. The comic industry has changed over the years, so we have started this campaign to help introduce new projects from our talented group of creators.

 

Over the years, we have published a number of series. Prominent among these is Fred Perry's ingenious title, Gold Digger, which Fred describes as a mixture of Indiana Jones and Final Fantasy. The idea for Gold Digger was first conceived during Fred's tour of duty in the first Gulf War, and it debuted in Antarctic Press's anthology comic, Mangazine, in 1991. A four-issue miniseries followed in 1992, and a regular monthly black-and-white series followed starting in 1993. The current color series began in 1999 and has continued since then. It is the second-longest-running solo-created title in the industry. In 2013, Fred was honored at Comic Con International in San Diego, where he received an Inkpot Award for his work on Gold Digger.

 

Over the past years, we have released other Color Gold Bricks as crowdfunding projects. We are now reprinting the fifth and sixth Gold Bricks as Color Gold Brick 3 and 4, which feature Gold Digger series issues 51 to 75 and 76 to 100, respectively.  If you haven't seen or read Gold Digger, this is your chance to enjoy one of the best and longest-running ongoing series in comics. Like the other Bricks, these let new readers join in easily, so you don't have to be shy!

 

The run of Gold Digger has been printed in ten Gold Bricks to date. The earliest volumes, Gold Brick 1 and Gold Brick 2, were black and white. Then Fred began his color series, so Bricks 3-6 were printed in color. Gold Brick 3 was originally printed in limited quantities, and Fred's only reference copy became thoroughly destroyed from years of constant use. Crowdfunding was used to make this out-of-print edition available again as Color Brick 1.  Now the original stock of Bricks 5 and 6 have sold out, so we are offering new printings of them through this campaign, sized to match the current format. (We know this can still be confusing, so we have a numbering guide at the bottom of this page.)

 

We have promised before that would reprint the other volumes to match the new crowdfunded printings' format. We want everyone to have nice editions. In addition to reasons already mentioned, during previous campaigns, many backers have asked if we could skip ahead, since they had already purchased the earlier editions. Skipping ahead allows these backers to have a nice, new volume for their shelves. At the same time, we also help backers who missed the earlier Brick offerings way back in the day to catch up via the reprints.

Here are the cover galleries for each Brick:

Gold Digger Brick V Cover Gallery - Issues #51 to #75

 

Gold Digger Brick VI Cover Gallery - Issues #76 to #100

Each brick is 6 x 9 inches and will contain the Gold Digger series issues listed above. 

 

You can actually read the previews of the series contained in these Bricks to date online with the following links (should be compatible with any PDF-capable device):

GOLD DIGGER #51 PDF (for Preview) 

https://app.box.com/s/c7stzuk7iymwpgy8ikabo5o8h...

GOLD DIGGER #76 PDF (for Preview) 

https://app.box.com/s/0hzo1dx65s5k11uic73u6d9wy...

 

What are we going to do with the crowdfunding money?

Plain and simple, we're going to print and ship the Gold Digger Color Gold Brick 3 and 4. Each of the Color Gold Bricks is over 600 pages in FULL COLOR. Printing the actual books is the biggest single expense. The first print run of a typical Gold Brick is quite costly, as most printers require a minimum run to make it cost-effective. We are thus using Indiegogo to assist us with those costs. If the amount seems high, you must remember that we are printing at least a thousand copies of a 600+ page book. Another cost is shipping: First we will have to ship the books from the printer to our offices, and once we get them, send copies to all our supporters and distributors. Several thousand pounds of books represents a significant shipping expense.

Here is a breakdown of our expenses.

Printing...This includes hard and softcover editions of both volumes.

Shipping...Sending a 600-page book is costly, especially overseas.  The cost for shipping just one copy overseas is unfortunately substantial.

Fees...Indiegogo takes their fees off the top

Handling/Supplies....We have to pay for boxes and pay people to pack those boxes.  This also include costs for sending the large PDF files to all the supporters and other miscellaneous costs.

 

Here are the rewards we are offering.  Some of you may ask why there are not any sketch editions available with these rewards as in previous campaigns. Without going into details, Fred is a very busy man and has taken on more responsibilities, both family- and work-wise. At this time, we did not want to burden him with any further work. We hope you understand.

 

We decided to offer the rewards both individually and in combination. If you want just one volume, that is one option. If you want both volumes (as either softcover or hardcover editions) that is also an option, one we are offering at a discounted price.  If you have any questions, please do not hesitate to message us.

Gold Brick V (Color Brick 3)

 Gold Brick VI (Color Brick 4) 

 

 

We've also decided to offer some Add-Ons! These are items which will help us achieve our goal.

Choose the pledge level of the highest-price item you would like. (E.g., if you want a hardcover, please choose the reward for the hardcover level.)

You can increase your pledge level by the amount of the add-on you would like to add! For instance, if you pledged for the hardcover reward level and also want the knickknacks, just add the appropriate amount.

 

The success of this campaign is in the cards, and we're going to make extra-sure!

We're adding the following reward(s) for reaching the following stretch goal(s):

GOAL                  REWARD

$24,000            Mystery GD Trading Card #1!

 

Every time we reach a stretch goal, that goal's reward will be made available to everyone who's supported the campaign!  What a deal!  Give yourselves a hand!

We hope to print other Gold Bricks, both earlier ones as they sell out and new ones never before collected. As you know, these volume together will reprint 50 issues of the color series, but there are close to 300 issues of Gold Digger, and this printing of 1200+ pages only covers a little under 20% of the entire run. Many of the early issues are the ones that are most desperately out of print. Being a small, independent publisher, we are forced to try to keep our cost margins as narrow as possible, and the end result is many of our books sell out quickly and become unavailable. Hopefully, we can use Indiegogo to help us keep all of our books in print. This is especially important with Gold Digger, since new readers discover the comic every day. We hope to be able to include other items as push goals, which may include getting other Bricks out to you.

NUMBERING GUIDE

 Gold Brick #1 (B/W #1) - The first Gold Brick, which collects the first 25 issues of the black-and-white regular series. (Not offered on Indiegogo.)

 Gold Brick #2 (B/W #2) - The second Gold Brick, which collects issues #26 – 50 of the black-and-white regular series. (Not offered on Indiegogo.)

 Gold Brick #3 (COLOR BRICK #1) - The third Gold Brick, the first to collect the COLOR Gold Digger series issues #1 – 25. (New Printing crowdfunded on January 1, 2014.)

 Gold Brick #4 (COLOR BRICK #2) - The fourth Gold Brick, but the second to collect the COLOR Gold Digger series, containing issues #26 – 50. (New Printing crowdfunded on May 16, 2014.)

 Gold Brick #5 (COLOR BRICK #3) The fifth Gold Brick, collects issues #51 – #75 of the COLOR Gold Digger series. COLLECTED IN THE NEW FORMAT IN THIS CAMPAIGN.

 Gold Brick #6 (COLOR BRICK #4) The sixth Gold Brick, collects issues #76 – #100 of the COLOR Gold Digger series. COLLECTED IN THE NEW FORMAT IN THIS CAMPAIGN.

 Gold Brick #7 (COLOR BRICK #5) The seventh Gold Brick, collects issues #101 – #125 of the COLOR Gold Digger series. (First Printing! Crowdfunding project ended on December 12, 2014.)

 Gold Brick #8 (COLOR BRICK #6) The eighth Gold Brick, collects issues #126 – #150 of the COLOR Gold Digger series. As of color issue #150, we integrated the 50 black-and-white issues into the numbering to emphasize Fred's landmark achievement.  The 150th color issue was therefore published as Gold Digger #200, and the issue numbering proceeds from that point. (First Printing! Crowdfunding project ended on August 2, 2016.)

 GOLD BRICK #9 (COLOR BRICK #7) The ninth Gold Brick, collects issues #201- #225. (First Printing! Crowdfunded on May 15, 2017.)

 GOLD BRICK #10 (COLR BRICK #8) The tenth Gold Brick, collects issues #226-#250. (First Printing! Crowdfunded on March 5, 2021.)

 

Gold Digger Publication History

In the beginning, there was an issue of Mangazine, which introduced Gold Digger to the world, and the issue was good. Then there was a 4-issue miniseries that got this joint a-poppin'. Lo, there came the regular Gold Digger (black and white) issues #1-50. Then, when Mankind was ready and their fingers grew tired of newsprint stains, Gold Digger (color) issues #1-149 on the glossy paper. Many years passed while reading those amazing issues, and the world was ready for re-numberification. There shall be a number, and the number shall be #150—NO, wait! it shall be... #200, and all the Gold Digger numbering was reintegrated. 50+150=200. And the world rejoiced, and the numbering has continued thus ever since! (So, why didn't we include the 4-issue miniseries in the reintegrated numbering? Ugh! Don't ask.)

 Gold Brick #8 (COLOR BRICK #6) The eighth Gold Brick, collects issues #126 – #150 of the COLOR Gold Digger series. As of color issue #150, we integrated the 50 black-and-white issues into the numbering to emphasize Fred's landmark achievement.  The 150th color issue was therefore published as Gold Digger #200, and the issue numbering proceeds from that point. (First Printing! Crowdfunding project ended on August 2, 2016.)
 GOLD BRICK #9 (COLOR BRICK #7) The ninth Gold Brick, collects issues #201- #225. (First Printing! Crowdfunded on May 15, 2017.)
 GOLD BRICK #10 (COLR BRICK #8) The tenth Gold Brick, collects issues #226-#250. (First Printing! Crowdfunded on March 5, 2021.) Gold Digger Publication History
In the beginning, there was an issue of Mangazine, which introduced Gold Digger to the world, and the issue was good. Then there was a 4-issue miniseries that got this joint a-poppin'. Lo, there came the regular Gold Digger (black and white) issues #1-50. Then, when Mankind was ready and their fingers grew tired of newsprint stains, Gold Digger (color) issues #1-149 on the glossy paper. Many years passed while reading those amazing issues, and the world was ready for re-numberification. There shall be a number, and the number shall be #150—NO, wait! it shall be... #200, and all the Gold Digger numbering was reintegrated. 50+150=200. And the world rejoiced, and the numbering has continued thus ever since! (So, why didn't we include the 4-issue miniseries in the reintegrated numbering? Ugh! Don't ask.)

story:
Welcome to EARTHBOUND

Earthbound was a stand-out graphic novel from the Comicsgate indie-circuit in 2019, it SOLD OUT after a groundswell of positive grassroots reviews from readers.  Many claimed it was their favorite book of the year. 

Now we are back with PART 2, the epic conclusion to the tale of Wiz Kid, Julia, and Spaceman.

This time around expect two things: ACTION and ANSWERS!

Julia and Spaceman are headhunters sent to Earth to recruit 4 deadly warriors, The Sirens of Violence.  The mission is a competition, who can recruit more for their employer, The 13th Sponsor.  Should the competition end in a tie, a 5th target has been declared: an estranged teammate of Julia and Spaceman's, WIZ KID.

Now in Part 2, the mission moves unrelentingly towards a clash with the Sirens.  The only way you can survive against a Siren is if you have another Siren right there to protect you, so the recruitment technology of the R-Types, special weaponry given to Spaceman and Julian by the 13th Sponsor, becomes especially imperative.

Part 2 will COMPLETELY WRAP UP THIS ARC of Earthbound.

Funding Details

Funds raised will go towards printing and fulfilment of EARTHBOUND parts ONE and TWO, as well as paying other artists to collaborate on future projects and keep the Narwhal Pipeline flowing.

Get Down with the NARWHAL LIFESTYLE

Earthbound Part 2 is what we call a Narwhal Joint.  Also available in this campaign:

a. The THIRD Sketchbook featuring the conclusion to the Nosferatu comic.

b. Original Print Run copies of Earthbound Part 1.

c. Earthbound SHIRTS screenprinted by hand by Narwhal himself.

d. FOREIGN AGENT: the second Narwhal Joint.

e. 2nd Print Run of Earthbound part 1.

f. Original Print Run copies of Earthbound Part 1 Hardcover

 

Risks & Challenges

Narwhal is a PROVEN creator with a 100% track record who has fulfilled multiple projects successfully.  He has funds saved from previous campaigns to solve any problem that might arise.  And he writes, draws, and letters everything himself, so the workflow is efficient and reliable. 

 

 

STRETCH GOALS:

40k: Narwhal Stickers

50k: Narwhal Mafia Business Cards

60k: New Naked Samurai Short included in the book.

70k: Postcard Prints

100k: Franz Kafka's The Trial Gameboy Style Pixel Comic Sample Booklet

story:
Short Summary

Greetings fellow humans, My name is Eli, and I make comics and board games, although this time I’m talking about my comics. I have been making comics since 2008, and actually publishing them since 2016, and today I’m here to show you the continuation of one of my very first stories Alien 101.

Alien 101 Is a romantic comedy, a sci-fi comic about an alien in Highschool trying to understand human love, and depending on his report he could save the world (probably). This campaign is to help me bring this comic into the hands of the future as well as some long-time fans. 

What We Need & What You Get

Because the book is already done, funds from this campaign will go straight into printing shipping and goodies. Every backer will receive exclusive alt art cards of characters from this comic for my game Scattered Nexus, Even if you never play the game, the art is super cute and collectible.  I would usually only sell these at conventions in person, but I like you guys. books will be printing from “Kablam” printing and cards will be coming from “Drive-thru cards”. 

The Impact

This comic is about an alien in high school trying to understand what human love is. And it's based on my experience when I was in Highschool, and the years after that when I actually figured out about love myself. This story is about the lessons I learned and what I wish I knew back then, as well as some jokes that I think are funny. I think this Is a great story for teens, adults, and anyone navigating the turbulent seas of love.

Risks & Challenges

The companies and services I’m using are designed to make this project as smooth as possible. Aside from these companies exploding, It should be fine. The books are already done and edited, the printers are in the US, and I’m only releasing them to the US. If something does go wrong with the printing I’d just have to use a different printer, I even have a few in mind. 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you cant support me financially just checking out my work on social media is a great help https://linktr.ee/elibeaird .

I am creating content on Webtoons, Facebook, and youtube. Even if you don't like my content I’m sure you have a friend that would love it, so just share this campaign with them to show them that you care. I am going to be making content, comics, and games for years, and I’d love to share my stories with more people, that's why I do it, and I feel like now is the perfect time to share our stories with each other.

story:
Confederate Monster Issues 1-3 EXCLUSIVE FIRST PRINTING

The world of Frankenstein meets the Civil War inside the pages of Confederate Monster! I'm Dave Swartz, creator of ATLAS:Origins, Feast or Famine, and NOW Confederate Monster, another chapter in the classic Frankenstein tale. 

My goal with this campaign is to print the first 3 issues, along with some other EXCLUSIVE perks. Including prints, commissions, tees, hats, stickers, coasters, and tons more! 

 

What is this story about?

If Frankenstein meets the Civil War wasn't enough to grab your attention, here's a brief breakdown of the story...

In the final months of the American Civil war, a secret Confederate Plot is unfolding. Desperate to turn the tide toward their favor, the Confederates have pursued a ghastly ghost story as a last resort. A horrific tale about a mad scientist who is believed to have brought a hideous dead monster back to life! Strangely enough, this foreign fairy tale has proved to be much more fact than fiction.

As the rebels put their final plans into action, a reconstructive surgeon named Dr. Daniel Schmidt rebuilds their broken soldiers. All the while living with bone chilling secrets of his own. For all his charm and brilliance, Daniel hides a monstrous past. Many years ago in a different life, He was none other than the lab assistant to the very same mad scientist the Confederates now seek, Dr. Victor Frankenstein!

This story has everything that made you fall in love with the original Frankenstein story. PLUS, some new twists, and shocking revelations about these beloved literary characters. 

STRETCH PERKS!!!

The campaign has hit it's initial goal, so you know what that means... STRETCH PERKS!!! These perks are going to work a little differently than other campaigns. I wanted to combine the idea of Stretch Perks, with Add-On Perks. So with that in mind, backers who have pledged certain amounts will receive these Stretch Perks for FREE!!! While they will still be available to add-on for those who don't want to pledge at a higher tier.

And I'm happy to say ALL Stretch Perks have been UNLOCKED!!!

Here is a full break down of the Stretch Goal Perks...

 

EXCLUSIVE PERKS

For this campaign I'm bring all the classic perks, Sticker, T-Shirt, Hat, Prints, etc. BUT I didn't want to just stop there! I'm also including some HAND MADE perks as well! Along with the books, you can also get...

  • Black & White Prints, on Aged Paper
  • A western-style WANTED Poster for the Monster
  • A retro-style Comic Cover Print


PLUS a few Stretch Goal ideas I don't want to reveal just yet!

See below for a FULL PERK GALLERY!


 

Cast of Classic Characters

ALL your favorite Frankenstein characters make an appearance in the story. Some may look a little different than you remember, but it's all in service to my vision. Check out a quick look at who you can expect to see...

Dr. Daniel Schmidt (IGOR)
Our main character goes by the name Dr. Daniel Schmidt, but it is merely a disguise. He is in fact Igor, the assistant to the infamous Dr. Frankenstein. After he helped the mad doctor raise a body from the dead, he used a secret identity, and some hidden resources of Victor's, to travel to America. He creates a new life for himself as a Reconstructive Surgeon living in Virginia. My version of Igor is much smarter, charming and more cunning than the original. A true protege to Victor Frankenstein.

 

Victor Frankenstein
After his un-dead monster got loose and ravaged the towns people, Victor was thrown into an Asylum, where he has spent the past 8 years. It has left his mind broken, and his body ravaged by insanity. He is a shell of his former self when we first meet him. However, he has been planning for this moment the entire time. 

 

The Monster
Probably the most recognizable as the classic version of the character. Yet, at the same time his story is very different than anything that has come before. PLUS my version is more of a cowboy, outlaw than a mindless beast. However, his new found intelligence does not inhibit his ability to kick some major butt!

 

The Bride
My version of the Bride is reminiscent of the original, but I take elements of the Monster's Bride, and Victor's Bride, and mixed them together. Creating a NEW character, but one who also kicks some major butt too!

The story also includes historical figures such as General Nathan Bedford Forrest, General Stonewall Jackson, General Robert E Lee, and of course Abraham Lincoln himself for good measure!

 

A Closer Look....

Let's take a closer look at some of the pages from the story...

That's it for now. Don't want to give too much away. If you CAN'T WAIT and need to see more, AND gain access to a SECRET PERK for the campaign - CLICK HERE to subscribe to my Patreon, and unlock ALL the finished artwork, including lettering!

 

Risks & Challenges

The artwork for these three books is nearly complete, and I expect to be done before the campaign ends. The only real challenge will be make sure we hit the goal to be able to afford everything. However, if we exceed our goal, I will be able to add more perks, and a possible short Epilogue comic!

The story also includes historical figures such as General Nathan Bedford Forrest, General Stonewall Jackson, General Robert E Lee, and of course Abraham Lincoln himself for good measure!
 

A Closer Look....
Let's take a closer look at some of the pages from the story...






That's it for now. Don't want to give too much away. If you CAN'T WAIT and need to see more, AND gain access to a SECRET PERK for the campaign - CLICK HERE to subscribe to my Patreon, and unlock ALL the finished artwork, including lettering!
 
Risks & Challenges
The artwork for these three books is nearly complete, and I expect to be done before the campaign ends. The only real challenge will be make sure we hit the goal to be able to afford everything. However, if we exceed our goal, I will be able to add more perks, and a possible short Epilogue comic!

story:
So, Hell exists.

I know, Ned was surprised too. Even more surprising for him was the news that the Infernal Dimension is a big part of his family's legacy. And since finding out that he's next in line to rule his father's Hellpit... Let's just say life's gotten interesting. Seeing demons. A zombie and a couch-potato demon for roommates. Bickering, murderous angels on his scent. Nosy NYPD detectives. And a plot to wipe out his whole family.

Oh, for the bliss of ignorance.

Now Ned's got to find a way out of this inheritance before the dark forces aligning against him give him a way out... PERMANENTLY

This is VOLUME TWO of Ned's story. (If you missed the first volume, don't worry; there's a single combined perk for both Volume One & Two. Or if you'd like to add Vol One for any of the other levels, it's available as an add-on.) As in Volume One, it's a supernatural fish-out-of-water comedy, Ned's dealing with being the new heir-apparent to his father's section in Hell, a Pit ruled by his family for generations.  Not that he's a bad son, but seeing  -and being attacked by-  demons, accidentally creating a zombie roommate, getting on the wrong side of suspicious police, and dealing with Cherubim out for blood just isn't the family life he had hoped for. And it all happened so fast that Ned barely had time to think. In this second part of the story, enough’s enough and he's taking back control of his life. He's going to find a way out of this inheritance... before it gets him killed.

 

The story runs almost 160 pages, and completes the first major story arc began in NLoP Vol 1. If I have room, there'll be extras: Behind the scenes stuff; guest pin-ups; a THANK YOU page to you the collectors. But the story is the important thing, and it almost fills the book now. The page count is not set in stone. The great thing about creator-owned and Indiegogo: No constraints. It's all my vision.

30+ years working in comics and I'm still at it. Besides various work on VALIANT comics, Deadpool, Black Panther and the BAT-books, I've been lucky to have had extended runs on some great books with amazing writers. Peter David's AQUAMAN. Judd Winnick's EXILES. GOTHAM UNDERGROUND with Frank Tieri. RED LANTERNS with Charles Soule. SECRET SIX and LEAVING MEGALOPOLIS with Gail Simone. I love comics. And because of collectors like you, I'm doing my own comics, my way. It's so much more fun, and I thank you.

THE VIDEO: If you have time, check it out. I always have fun with them. The music is again a song by Son of Dave, VOODOO DOLL.  His songs have been featured in TV shows, Breaking Bad and  Preacher. You can check him out on Bandcamp, Spotify or Youtube. Really cool stuff.  And the soundfx were royalty-free from Soundbible and Zapsplat

Printing will be in the US, with the goal of printing 2,000 copies. Supporters will be listed in a THANK YOU page in the book; All physical copies of the book include a FREE BONUS guide to raising your very own demon (below). Never know when it might come in handy. The little buggers are a handful.

SHIPPING-

  • USA- $10
  • Canada- $15
  • The Rest of the World- $25

 

About some of the premium perks:

$85 - REMARK-- This is a b&w full head-sketch that's done on the inside front cover or first blank page of the book. Backer's choice of character. (People use the term "remark" different ways; this is how I mean it.) **NOTE** If you'd like to get the REMARK for any of the other perk levels, it's available as an add-on. Below is an example from NLoP Vol 1:

$195 - SKETCH TIME **Amount is limited**-- This is more of a con-style 9x12 sketch; it's the size I work at conventions when I'm sitting in Artist Alley. Single figure with a simple background (though as you see, I sometimes can't help myself). Below is an example from NLoP Vol 1:

$375 - BIG-TIME SKETCH TIME **Amount is limited**-- This is a full 11x17 illustration, like a cover. Single figure with a full background. Below is an example from NLoP Vol 1:

**NOTE**  If you'd like a bigger, more complex piece, (multi-character, detailed background, a jam-board laid out, etc), or would like it on one of your own blank sketch-covers, message me before backing and we'll discuss it and come up with an amount.

ORIGINAL ART AVAILABLE

I've got have lots of art from NLoP Volume 1 up for different perk levels. Below are the pages listed in the perks. If you'd like a page from NLoP Vol 1 that isn't shown, just message me before backing and we'll set it up. Almost all of NLoP Vol 1 is available.

SHIPPING- Note that there is an additional shipping charge for the commissions and original pages (not the REMARK of course; that is done in the book itself) as they are shipped separately:

  • USA- $20 addt'l
  • Canada- $25 addt'l
  • Rest of the World- $35 addt'l

THE HELL SPREAD

TENTACLE DEMON

GERARD, Zombie Roommate

GRORMAROG

WHERE'S MY NOSE?!

D'UG, Couch Potato Demon

MEET THE ANGELS

 

The first goal is getting us to HARDCOVER. If we exceed that, there will be more. Thinking up some good ones.

Thanks for checking out NED. It will only be done because of you.

NED, Lord of the Pit and all related characters ™ & © James Calafiore

THE CHALLENGES

The project is already under way and will be printed. This is a second chance campaign just for the Indiegogo community. It's my fourth crowd-funded project. Although I have experienced delays on a couple, I have successfully delivered on all three before it. Why wouldn't I? This is all I want to be doing. This is what I love doing. And crowd-funding makes it possible. It only happens because of you.

And if you know of anyone who might like NED...

...please spread the word. I've made an easy link to use: nedlordofthepit.com   And don't forget to use the Indiegogo share tools!

THANKS

(People use the term "remark" different ways; this is how I mean it.) **NOTE** If you'd like to get the REMARK for any of the other perk levels, it's available as an add-on. Below is an example from NLoP Vol 1:

$195 - SKETCH TIME **Amount is limited**-- This is more of a con-style 9x12 sketch; it's the size I work at conventions when I'm sitting in Artist Alley. Single figure with a simple background (though as you see, I sometimes can't help myself). Below is an example from NLoP Vol 1:

$375 - BIG-TIME SKETCH TIME **Amount is limited**-- This is a full 11x17 illustration, like a cover. Single figure with a full background. Below is an example from NLoP Vol 1:

**NOTE**  If you'd like a bigger, more complex piece, (multi-character, detailed background, a jam-board laid out, etc), or would like it on one of your own blank sketch-covers, message me before backing and we'll discuss it and come up with an amount.
ORIGINAL ART AVAILABLE
I've got have lots of art from NLoP Volume 1 up for different perk levels. Below are the pages listed in the perks. If you'd like a page from NLoP Vol 1 that isn't shown, just message me before backing and we'll set it up. Almost all of NLoP Vol 1 is available.
SHIPPING- Note that there is an additional shipping charge for the commissions and original pages (not the REMARK of course; that is done in the book itself) as they are shipped separately:

USA- $20 addt'l
Canada- $25 addt'l
Rest of the World- $35 addt'l

THE HELL SPREAD

TENTACLE DEMON

GERARD, Zombie Roommate

GRORMAROG

WHERE'S MY NOSE?!

D'UG, Couch Potato Demon

MEET THE ANGELS

 

The first goal is getting us to HARDCOVER. If we exceed that, there will be more. Thinking up some good ones.
Thanks for checking out NED. It will only be done because of you.
NED, Lord of the Pit and all related characters ™ & © James Calafiore
THE CHALLENGES
The project is already under way and will be printed. This is a second chance campaign just for the Indiegogo community. It's my fourth crowd-funded project. Although I have experienced delays on a couple, I have successfully delivered on all three before it. Why wouldn't I? This is all I want to be doing. This is what I love doing. And crowd-funding makes it possible. It only happens because of you.
And if you know of anyone who might like NED...
...please spread the word. I've made an easy link to use: nedlordofthepit.com   And don't forget to use the Indiegogo share tools!
THANKS

story:
The story concludes.

 

ABSOLUTE. book 2 is a minimum 46 page story that ends the arc of the battle for the planet! Our heroes are beaten and torn to their bitter limits and their might tested as they rebel against the sadistic totalitarian rule of the Onvi rulers. Back the exciting conclusion that tests our crusader's resolve, courage, trust, and will!

 

Agendas are exposed and secrets revealed. More action and story to wrap up this exciting arc and adventure that thrilled us and introduced us to an unlikely group of heroes. Back it today!

New Villains!

 

New Heroes!

Exciting action!

And more!

Original Cover

Variant Cover

Stretch Goals:

$5,000 - The Old Man D&D trading card by Jason Bascom - UNLOCKED

$7,000 - STICKERS!! - UNLOCKED

$9,000 - The Onvi window cling - UNLOCKED

$15,000 - Inverted logo circle patch

$20,000 - ????

$30,000 - ????

$250,000 - I shave my beard

ALL BACKERS GET 2 OF 3 GUEST ARTIST TRADING CARDS AND HIGHER PERKS CONTAIN ALL 3!

ALL BACKERS GET THE EXCLUSIVE FROG G TRADING CARD DRAWN BY ME AND COLORED BY INK SPOTS!

And the NEFFARIOUS  card colored by the legend Matt Yackey!

POSTER Work In Progress

The Impact

ABSOLUTE. book 1 was a dream come true; to create a comic that people would enjoy as much as I enjoyed working on it. The book was 90% done by the time I launched and was quick to fulfill and on time. Book 2 is about 60% finished after having less time to work on it already and I'm very excited and so far pleased with the work I have in it. I hope you will enjoy it as much as the 1st and if you have yet to pick it up, now's your chance!

Risks & Challenges

As with any crowdfunding campaign on time fulfillment is always a challenge. Life does not care what you have planned, it makes it's own. Getting the book out on time is the ultimate challenge. I will do my very best to do so. Book 1 was on time and I don't want to break that trust! Without the fans there is no me. Your trust is important as are you!

 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't back the project; hey, I completely understand. Even if it's not your cup of black roast coffee, just sharing the link and spreading the word is more than helpful! You never know who might be interested in a little black and white sci-fi action! Thank you!

story:
FUN, AFFORDABLE AND FRIENDLY TO

METAL HEADS, BABES, PUNKERS, ROCKERS, ROLLERS,

POSERS, NERDS, AND GEEKS

AROUND THE WORLD

AND ACROSS THE GALAXIES

 

 

What's happening, Metal Maniacs. 

Welcome back and Thank you for giving the campaign a look see, we appreciate you.

The moshing continues in Thrashers Issues 3 and 4. 

 After having their weekend concert ruined,  Mikey, Dee, Carlos, Maria, Brian and Rocky struggle to evade the Alien assault. 

Meanwhile our Army Rangers are looking for some payback after barely surviving the attack on McMasters Army depot.

 

 

THRASHERS #3 

  • Line-Art by Leonardo Rocha
  • Colors by Rodrigo Ybanez 
  • Letters by Nikki Powers
  • Cover by Leonardo Rocha

Our Metal Heads, are struggling to survive the alien onslaught but our Misfits from the Motor pool are ready to lend a hand

 

THRASHERS #4

  • Line-Art by Leonardo Rocha
  • Colors by Rodrigo Ybanez 
  • Letters by Nikki Powers
  • Cover by Tone Rodriguez

The time has come for our Metal Heads to make a stand, along with the Misfits from the Motor pool, and dish out an earthly THRASHING.

 

Stickers

Alien Pin-Up 8 x 10

 

Cover Posters 11 x 17 

THE GOAL

Just a little information for you. Thrashers Issue #4 will complete the initial story arc and I am excited to see it come to fruition. I am currently wrapping up the scripts for the second arc. Thrashers is far from over.

All the Line-Art by Leonardo Rocha is complete. Those pages are currently in the capable hands of the colorist Rodrigo Ybanez. I will be sending those pages in batches to the letterer Nikki Powers, as I receive them. Then  I will begin formatting each Issue for printing. My hope is to have a quick turn around and have these in your hands before the end of September.

I came to a decision a few weeks ago, that I wanted to make this affordable for every individual that wants to support the campaign. I know that by doing this it could make reaching the funding goal difficult, but that is a risk I am willing to take.

Metal Maniacs I need your help. Share the campaign on all your social media accounts, spread the word far and wide.

Let’s Rock this to the end .

 

 

Stretch Goals

$750  Martin Gimenez Pin-Ups

$1000    Trading Cards 

 

$1250   Backstage Pass

 

$1500   Thrashers Music CD

$2000  Illustrator Mink Poster  11 X 17

story:
Magi’s Megami Magazine or M3 is a manga/comic anthology that is published by Magi Entertainment.  We stated planning on the book in 2020 and released our first book via the Mizuki Saga Indiegogo campaign in March 2021.  The book currently includes Mizuki Saga and Megami Saga Chronicles.

 

 


 

Megami Saga Chronicles focus on Reiko Tenshin and others as she begins her first mission as a miko to protect the land from hostile demons and entities.

Mizuki Saga portrays the everyday life of Mizuki Wakahisa and friends in a cute comical 4-koma series. Series includes cosplay, parodies and cute and comedy moments.

Bonus 

 

M3 Special is a quarterly spinoff of the original M3.  M3 will focus on extra content including exclusive artwork, contest & events, and exclusive content.  M3 Special will also include Megami Saga: Resurrection which takes place ~2 years after the events of Megami Saga Chronicles.

M3 Special 4/21 will be available on April 17, 2021 as an add-on via this campaign or you can also buy the book via our Etsy site.  It’ll include 36 pages of content as well as an exclusive mini print of the cover character & premium version will include an acrylic figure of Reiko.

The summer version of M3 Special will release alongside M3 7/2021 as a premium tier item for anyone who order’s the $25 perk or above.   The summer version of M3 Special will include the following.

  • Megami Saga: Resurrection Director's Cut #2
  • Exclusive Summer Artwork
  • TBA Interview
  • TBA Event

 

Rewards

Add-ons

Megami Saga Chronicles Poster #1

Magi's Megami Magazine March 2021

M3 Special April 2021 Issue

 

 

$1500:  Exclusive Content Funded.

$2000: Bonus item added to all physical perks.

$3000: Extra M3 Special artwork added to the book.

$4000: Mizuki Saga Summer mini chapter will be added to M3 July.

$6000: We'll open a slot for pilot series via M3 Special in a future issue.

 

Staff

Artist -Sentzukabe

I'm spanish, from the Basque Country state, I've worked as professional since 2016, Arts and Professional Comic and Illustration graduate, I've done several collaborative books from the galician market as well as for the newspaper as comic strip artist and now im doing my first solo manga aside my works for clients as manga artist and game graphics.

Artist- Master Krakken

I started a journey several years ago. i was looking for something, but i couldn’t figure out what i was looking for.  In my journey I rolled around from place to place, always looking, but never finding.

My journey continues,  but something has changed,  through it  I found friends,  a cause and a purpose.  and I realized that what I had been looking for was  meaning.

Thanks to all of you wonderful people I couldn't have  found this priceless knowledge without you.

Scenario-Studio Mizuki

We’re an independent group that’s apart of Magi Entertainment that works on the Megami Saga series and assist with other tasks within the group.

 

Why Back M3

  • The funds from the campaign will go directly towards the printing and rewards first, then production second.
  • Due to the virus our main income and promotions are canceled thus we need to rely on crowdfunding to keep it going until everything returns back to normal.
  • The funds will help us get the book and the series off the ground and allow us to eventually expand. 
  • We are doing this to prove that we can release a quality product and release it in a timely manner.
  • Our goal is to release the physical releases quarterly or every two months, depending on how much support we get.
  • We’ll need your support to help get this series off the ground.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you are able to contribute to our campaign, that is wonderful!  If you are not able to contribute by becoming a backer, you can still help by spreading the word about M3.  Please use the share links at the top of the page to help get the word out to others who may be interested in backing the campaign.  Thank you!

story:
THE STORY

When investigating the murder of a young girl's father, hardboiled detective Jack Mulligan is attacked by the bloodthirsty Beast of Bancroft.  After somehow surviving its onslaught, Mulligan must find some way to find the creature and put it down for good. However, the town of Bancroft doesn't just have a werewolf to fear. Sometimes, the worst monsters are the ones that come from within.

Wulfsbane isn't your average werewolf story. It highlights abuse, trauma, and self reflection while telling an engaging and mysterious horror story. 

 

AVAILABLE COVERS

("B" Colors WIP)

 

 

Limited Edition Holographic Cover

 

FINANCES AND REWARDS

The total amount of money needed was $3,599. This was to cover the cost for getting the rest of the pages colored and lettered. Now it is only $700 after acquiring enough money to be able to finish the first issue without backer support. This money earned will be used for printing, posters, upcoming stretch goals, and  funding for the next issue. 

By backing you receive the first issue which is 26 pages in total (including front and back covers) and will be in full color with three physical covers. There is also an Indiegogo only limited edition copy that will include more than twice the number of pages and give you an inside look at the creation of the first issue along (initial cover is not final product). 

 

RISKS AND CHALLENGES

Due to the virus, shipping delivery may be an issue once the copies are being mailed out. Expected delivery time may be delayed. You will be updated if changes occur.

HOW YOU CAN HELP

If you're unable to help fund this project then no worries! Feel free to share this link on your social media sites or to places like comic related podcasts and sites where you're able. Tell your friends about our project and get a conversation going.

story:
What is Grey Matter?

Cybernetics have become part of almost every human body, pushing boundaries of what humans can do. The only downside… it slowly kills you. Downtrodden street fighter Lia is striding close to death's door, but she’s found a girl who’s untouched by the cybernetic sickness. Lia vows to get her to the safety of the inner city, out of reach of the mobsters and denizens that will kill to acquire her.

The first issue of Grey Matter is told over 28 pages of brilliant full colour where this futuristic world is not the paradise we were promised.

Who will Like Grey Matter?

  • Fans of Cyberpunk, Blade Runner, Children of Men, the Fifth Element, and those who like their science fiction a little less glamorous.
  • Collectors of high quality comic books who want something you won't find in stores.
  • People wanting to read a comic book from a small group of creators that are passionate of making the best damn book they can.

IndieGoGo Exclusive Variant Cover

 

IndieGoGo Exclusive Bonus content

 

The Team

Erik Bitmanis (Writer) - Erik is a comic writer based in Ottawa, Canada. An avid sports fan, reader of comics, and home brewer Erik has been involved with creating and publishing comics since 2015. Sporting four successful crowd funding campaigns for his cyber-punk, action comic series “Hard Wyred”. Erik is excited to get Grey Matter moving forward and into reader's hands.

Sara Setna (Artist) - Sara is an artist based in Toronto, Canada. She got her Degree in Animation at Sheridan College and has been working as a Location Design Artist in the animation industry. Sara (formerly Danny)  has completed an Issue of sequential art for Paths: a successful crowd funded comic. She is now ready and available to work as a comic book artist which has always been her primary goal. 

 

Risks & Challenges

I’ve successfully completed and delivered 4 previous crowdfunding campaigns. While this is my first IndieGoGo campaign, I am not new to crowdfunding. We have a timeline we will be adhering to, but the number one risk is production delays. We’ll do our utmost to avoid this, but if they occur, I’ll be sure to notify backers promptly.

Outside of production delays, once the comics are shipped, we are at the mercy of the post offices. If there are any shipping delays either due to the border crossings or postal service issues due to the pandemic, I’ll be sure to notify supporters once again to let them know what’s going on.

story:
BUTCH CLEAVER RIDES AGAIN!

BUTCH CLEAVER 2 IS A 52 PAGE, SQUARE BOUND GRAPHIC NOVEL by Matt Burke

If you threw Batman, Swamp Thing, Jonah Hex and Hellboy into a meat grinder then BUTCH CLEAVER would come out. 

RATED MATURE FOR GORE & VIOLENCE.  Matt Burke brings you the next chapter in BUTCH CLEAVER. In the town of Oubliette rides Butch Cleaver astride his dead bull Tore.  With the power to weaponize bone Butch will come face to face with The Voodoo Doll and his crucible of lieutenants, continuing his crusade in solving his murder, taking a deep dive into his past and having a couple of whiskey-milk shots at the Warg Skoll Saloon.  Will he solve his murder? Is he past the point of redemption? Or was he just a product of his environment? Find out more in the sequel to last summer's gothic-horror-western. Is he THE VICTIM, THE VILLAIN OR THE VICTOR?

 

 

 

 

                                    

 

 

 

 

-6k Patches

 

-8k Metal Book Marks

 

 

 

The Impact

BUTCH CLEAVER was a massive success and a life goal come true.  I was able to fulfill on time and had many blessings along the way, THANK YOU TO EVERYONE THAT HELPED AND BACKED ON THE LAST BOOK, YOU ARE AWESOME!  I have been hard at work on BUTCH CLEAVER 2 and I am about 75% done with the book, I just need to finish a few more pages, letters, edits, pre-press & campaign extras!

 

Risks & Challenges

With BUTCH CLEAVER 2 I want to break new ground with the campaign.  So every week the campaign will level-up with a.....Campaign Gift!  So if you back week 1 and you are one of the first 100 backers you will be able to receive ALL of the gifts for the duration of the Campaign!  SO DON'T MISS OUT ON BACKING WEEK 1!!! THE RISK IS CHALLENGING YET REWARDING, WITH YOUR HELP WE'LL HIT 4K AND GET THOSE GIFTS!

 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't back BUTCH CLEAVER 2 then help out by spreading the word and sharing on social media
story_txt:
BUTCH CLEAVER RIDES AGAIN!
BUTCH CLEAVER 2 IS A 52 PAGE, SQUARE BOUND GRAPHIC NOVEL by Matt Burke
If you threw Batman, Swamp Thing, Jonah Hex and Hellboy into a meat grinder then BUTCH CLEAVER would come out. 

RATED MATURE FOR GORE & VIOLENCE.  Matt Burke brings you the next chapter in BUTCH CLEAVER. In the town of Oubliette rides Butch Cleaver astride his dead bull Tore.  With the power to weaponize bone Butch will come face to face with The Voodoo Doll and his crucible of lieutenants, continuing his crusade in solving his murder, taking a deep dive into his past and having a couple of whiskey-milk shots at the Warg Skoll Saloon.  Will he solve his murder? Is he past the point of redemption? Or was he just a product of his environment? Find out more in the sequel to last summer's gothic-horror-western. Is he THE VICTIM, THE VILLAIN OR THE VICTOR?
 

 



 








 
                                    




 


 

 
 
-6k Patches
 
-8k Metal Book Marks
 
 
 
The Impact
BUTCH CLEAVER was a massive success and a life goal come true.  I was able to fulfill on time and had many blessings along the way, THANK YOU TO EVERYONE THAT HELPED AND BACKED ON THE LAST BOOK, YOU ARE AWESOME!  I have been hard at work on BUTCH CLEAVER 2 and I am about 75% done with the book, I just need to finish a few more pages, letters, edits, pre-press & campaign extras!
 

Risks & Challenges
With BUTCH CLEAVER 2 I want to break new ground with the campaign.  So every week the campaign will level-up with a.....Campaign Gift!  So if you back week 1 and you are one of the first 100 backers you will be able to receive ALL of the gifts for the duration of the Campaign!  SO DON'T MISS OUT ON BACKING WEEK 1!!! THE RISK IS CHALLENGING YET REWARDING, WITH YOUR HELP WE'LL HIT 4K AND GET THOSE GIFTS!
 

Other Ways You Can Help
If you can't back BUTCH CLEAVER 2 then help out by spreading the word and sharing on social media

story:
InterStella Space Angel is a whimsical, supernatural space comic introducing Stella—an angel who watches over the cosmos and protects planet earth!

 

 

MEET STELLA—the angelic being who’s in charge of taking care of the cosmos and managing the inner workings of outer space. From sweeping the rings of Saturn, to replacing burnt-out stars—she’s got every space chore under control. But even with every star at her fingertips, she still wonders what life is like on earth, and how she can help bring the light of hope to a world in need...

 

 

 

 

To create a PRINTED EDITION of InterStella Space Angel!

Help me take this story from pixels to print! I want to get this story into as many hands as possible, and YOU can help me do that by supporting my campaign.

 

 

Since I am independently publishing my comic, the only way I can print this book is with your pre-orders. I need to secure a minimum number of pre-orders in order to hire a printing company and distributor. My minimum number to print is 500 copies to reach a $5000 goal

I understand that not everyone can help financially. If that is you, the biggest thing you can do to help is SPREAD THE WORD. Spread it like peanut butter on a sandwich. SHARE on social media. Tell your niece about it. Tell your cat about it. Make some noise!

 

Use the SHARE BUTTONS near the top of the page to help spread the word about this campaign!

 

By funding this campaign, you not only help out an independent creator, but you also get some pretty great things!

 

------------The Book------------

InsterStella Space Angel contains 32 full-color pages, as well as exclusive bonus content to include mini comics, behind-the-scenes stories, and concept art. The book will look and feel amazing. Not just your run-of-the-mill cheap floppy comic, but a collectable and richly-detailed story you can explore again and again.

 

Book Stats

• 32 pages of beautifully-illustrated story

• 8 pages of exclusive artwork & bonus comics

• 6.7" x 10.2" book dimensions

• 100 lb silky matte laminate cover

• 80 lb satin interior pages

 

 

-------------Art Card-------------

A dazzling high-quality portrait of Stella printed on heavyweight 32pt paperboard. Complete with glossy spot accents and silver foil edging.

 

----------Comet Swag----------

Spruce up your fridge and books with a unique InterStella magnet and bookmark!

 

 

----------Art Critique----------

Take the opportunity to hone your artistic skills with a one-on-one ½ hr video call with me, where I will offer feedback on your artwork and suggestions on how to improve your artistry.

 


Shining Star ($10)

- The Book (32 pages of story + 8 pages bonus content)

 

Binary Stars ($15)

- TWO books (Get one, give one to a friend!)

 

Supernova ($25)

- The Book

- Art Card (5" x 7")

- Comet Swag (Magnet & Bookmark)


Spiral Galaxy ($40)

Get a set, give a set to a friend!

- 2x Books

- 2x Art Cards (5" x 7")

- 2x Comet Swag (Magnet & Bookmark)

 

Quasar ($50)

- The Book

- Art Card

- Comet Swag (Magnet & Bookmark)

- ½ hr One-on-One Video Call Art Critique (to be scheduled with the backer)

 

Star Cluster ($60)

The Retail & Avid Sharer Deal!

- 10x Books


 

SPECIAL REFERRAL PERK!

For every person that you refer to the campaign, you will receive a 4"x6" inked drawing of your choice!

It can be a picture of Stella, a character, animal, object, place—you name it!

  • Each person that backs the campaign using your share link, you earn a unique 4”x6” doodle.

  • For every 5 people, you'll be upgraded to a single 8.5”x11” inked drawing.

  • For every 10 people, you'll be upgraded to either a digitally colored 8.5”x11” drawing OR a 5”x7” watercolor painting.

 

Here's how it goes:

1.) Log into your Indiegogo account (that you created when you contributed to the campaign.) If you checked out as a guest, you will need to create an Indiegogo account to participate.

2.) Navigate to the InterStella Space Angel main campaign page.

3.) From there, you will see the “share” icons in the top right corner of the page.

 

 

 

4.) Click on the icon that looks like a chain link and use the link to share with a friend. (You can also use any of the social media icons if you wish to share to those platforms.)

 

 

5.) In order for you to earn a referral, your friend MUST use the shared link you provided to back the campaign. (Because when you are logged in to Indiegogo, you have a unique ID attached to that shared link, and it’s the only way for the website to track that you shared the link to someone else.)

 

And that’s it! Log in, click the share link on the InterStella Space Angel campaign page, share with a friend. As soon as they back the campaign using that link, you just earned yourself some original artwork.

 

THINGS TO NOTE:

  • Every person you refer must at least back at the $10 minimum—whether the single book perk or donation only.

  • I retain the right to refrain from drawing certain requests (ie: nothing explicit, controversial, etc.)

  • This perk is valid ONLY through August 31, 2021

  • Complex backgrounds and excessive detail will not be included in the drawings/paintings.

 

Prior to this announcement, if you have already shared the campaign with a friend and they have successfully backed the campaign, message me at jessicavanderpolstudios@gmail.com, tell me who you referred, and I will count it towards your referral number.


 

 

 

Check out the cool things you receive if we reach and exceed the campaign goal!

 

Spot Gloss Cover Accent

Campaign must reach $5000 by August 31st, 2021

By fulfilling the $5000 goal, I will add spot gloss accents to the cover for FREE (creating beautiful shiny highlights).

 

 

Bonus Poster

Campaign must reach $6000 by August 31st, 2021

I will create an additional 11” x 17” poster FREE for those who back the campaign by August 31st, 2021 (will be available for purchase after that).

 

 

 

 

InterStella Space Angel is a story about curiosity, struggle, and hope.

I love astronomy. There's something so curiously inaccessible and yet profoundly wondrous about the cosmos. We're so close, and yet we're not. We can see distant stars that are a million-times larger than our earth, and yet they appear as a speck. There are expanses that are mind-bogglingly large, and yet they exist in beautiful harmony and perfect balance.

We live in a truly magnificent universe, and through InterStella Space Angel, I hope to expose more people to its wonders in an effort to educate and inspire the next generation of astronomers.

As passionate as I am about astronomy, the story would be lacking without the heart of its message. Stella's story is a reflection of our day-to-day reality; slogging through the mundane, enjoying the silly moments, wrestling with hardships, and attempting to ascertain the greater meaning of our lives. You know—all wrapped up in a nice little 24-hour package.

 

At the end of the day, we're all dreaming. We're all looking to see where all this is heading. This story is an invitation to wonder, dream, and persevere together.

 

I believe that InterStella Space Angel can spark new excitement, rekindle sidelined dreams, and inspire hope that so many people desperately need. Therefore, I want to share it with as many people as possible. Printing this book will help make it more accessible to others and bring me one step closer to my goal of creating stories that make an impact and leave people in a better place than where they were before.

 

Will you join me on this journey?

 

 

A Word of Thank you

Thank you so much for taking the time to read through this campaign. And an especially heart-felt thank you to all of you who have contributed and supported me throughout the years. You have my utmost appreciation and gratitude.

Thank you.

 

 

About the Creator

Hi! My name is Jessica Vanderpol, and I am an independent illustrator, children's book artist, and graphic novelist. I am the writer and illustrator of InterStella Space Angel—the precursor to my upcoming graphic novel and introduction to my character Stella. If you would like to learn more about me or see my other artwork, please check out my website at www.jessicavanderpol.com

story:
There have always been monsters -- creatures who roamed the land preying upon humankind. In the past, brave warriors rose up to battle these horrors and protect their people, but these warriors are long since gone. Imbued with the powers of the Elders, Wolf is now the last protector of Earth. With his grandfather's guidance, he hunts the dark things that lurk in the shadows.

 

 

The second printing of The Legends of Lone Wolf hard cover is ready to go to print as soon as the campaign finishes.

Everything else is already printed and ready to go out!

 

Lone Wolf Issue 1

Written by Doug Garrett

Art by Jeff Lasley

Colors by Eugen Betivu

Letters by David AJ Berner

Comes with a print by Eric Hawkins

Legends of the Lone Wolf

With stories by several different artists and writers from the indie comic scene.

 

Before the Crows

story:
Youth Mob Zero Issue

Youth Mob Zero IssueGet Ready for the Next Wave of Superheroes that will be around for generations to come.

 This Hard-Hitting Action Adventure explores the lives of six teenagers on their journey to become the best superheroes they can be. This 60 plus page book will remind you of the old versions of the big two comic companies. In terms of quality and stories telling that will leave you wanting more with every future issue. Back Youth Mob Today only on Indiegogo.

 

Still Available at 3BComics.com

 

 

The Youth Mob 3D Animation

Check out the 3D Animated Trailer Created by Wungun of Big Bad Afro Studios. On top of the Campaign Page, This Video was Made to help Promote the comic and help us on our road to being funded.

 

Get to Know the Members of the Youth Mob.

Read The Secret Files for the Youth MOB before there gone.

 

What We Need & What You Get

 The project was Successfully Funded,

 

Preview Pages

Few Pages from The Graphic Novel

60-plus Pages of Content for the Physical Book, 4 Stories in One, All Youth Mob Stories. Digital Comic Readers get 2 stories in One.

 

 

A Fathers Tell 

F. Sean Frye, Cover Artist, Artist, Co-Creator that loved comics through the '80s and '90s that started the dream of creating his own comics, but lived in a time where it was much harder to create indie books but always worked in the art field honing his craft. and he put the dream aside until years later joining forces with his son to reignite his passion to create comics again.

 

My Origin Story

Sean Frye, Creator, Writer, Editor, and Artist of Biff Bam Boom Comics (3B Comics). I've been working on this project since I was 12 years old, I wanted to create a variety of unique heroes that could establish their legacy and represent the future generations of comic book lovers. I took what others viewed as a hobby and decided to create a business out of it. I've had several supporters, tell me that they were inspired by my work; which motivates me to continue to do what I love so much. The love I have for the world of comics and its culture will forever run through me, which is why I'm delighted to set a foundation that will kickstart a long-lasting legacy, within the world of comics. OH YEAH!

 

Risks & Challenges

 

Rest assured, we will definitely do everything promised in this campaign when you support us, you can contact us at any time, just give us a day or so to respond, Thank you for the support.

if you have any questions you can Email Us. Give us a day or two to respond to your email

3bcomicssf@gmail.com

 

 

 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Make sure you back the Campaign and if you can't back us this time please pass this campaign around on all your social sites to help get the word out about us. thank you.

story:
New inked pages!

 

 

New colored pages!

With the book expanded to 80 pages I thought I would share one more non spoiler page featuring Blue Astra with our girl, Hammerella.


 

New Double Page Spread!

The action gets pretty heated in Hammerella: Thundersmoke!

Watch out for Ember Hawks in The Garden of Umbra.

 

16+ pages added!

Gods And Gears co-creator and artist, Dean Kotz, is coming on board the Hammerella train. Dean will be providing 5 new pages, 3 at the start and 2 at the end, that will help connect this story to the Gods And Gears universe.

But that's not all! We are also going to add the first 12 page published Gods And Gears story, THIS MAP OF MISHAP, in the Hammerella trade at no additional cost to backers. We're looking at 16+ more pages!

Those that backed already just got a huge bonus! 

We can't ever thank our fans enough but we can try.

Here is some of Dean's great art from that story.


 

OVER 200 BACKERS!

With over 200 backers we now have 4 new trading cards going into all physical orders! 

 

IT’S HAMMER TIME!

Are you ready for HAMMERELLA?! Cuz she’s on her way! HAMMERELLA: THUNDERSMOKE is a 64+ page comic full of action, fantasy, and adventure that tells the story of a being that descended from gods and witches. Stranded on a distant planet as a child, HAMMERELLA learned quickly that in order to survive she had to be deadlier than the beasts that hunted her. Eventually finding herself in the midst of a galactic war, HAMMERELLA encounters ember hawks, razor wolves, giant mechs, and a rogue naval flight squadron called BLUE ASTRA.


 

THE “GODS AND GEARS” UNIVERSE

GODS AND GEARS is an ongoing indie comic series published by ALTERNA COMICS and created by myself (Ryan Winn), Dean Kotz, and Wes Locher. The series focuses on two boys (JIMMY and ELI) and their awesome adventures chasing down ancient magic, alien artifacts, and futuristic technology.

Do you need to have read GODS AND GEARS to enjoy HAMMERELLA?

Absolutely not! This is a story that can be enjoyed on its own, but reading both will provide you with a deeper understanding of this fantastical world and the dynamic characters that live in it. So for readers that may have missed out on GODS AND GEARS the first time around and would like a more complete experience, GODS AND GEARS #1-4 is also available on this campaign.


 

THE CREATIVE TEAM

Not only will I be writing and coloring this as I do with the regular GODS AND GEARS series, but I will be doing the pencils and inks as well. This will also provide co-creator and regular series artist, Dean Kotz, the chance to move ahead on GODS AND GEARS issues 5-8: “The Heart Of Racing”. I spent most of my career as an inker and illustrator, delivering top quality work and making deadlines so I’m looking forward to bringing that experience to you --the reader!


More interior artwork down below!

We’re exhilarated by the overwhelmingly positive response to the GODS AND GEARS stories and it’s been so rad seeing families read it together. Thank you for your support on this project and for allowing us to expand the GODS AND GEARS universe!

B-B-B-BACKER BONUS ALERT!!!

Weather you already love the GODS AND GEARS characters or weather they are new to your collection, you are not going to want to miss out on our big BACKER BONUS TRADING CARDS, These trading cards not only contain exclusive artwork, they will be packed full of added lore and P-P-P-POWER STATS,

You help us to reach 50 backers and EVERYONE ordering a print copy or higher perk will get this exclusive collector card in their order- for FREE! Help us reach 100 and we release the card for another great addition to the G&G world- Commander Rayo Tankara! Leader of the rogue naval flight squad called Blue Astra.

These cards are only the beginning! As each card is released we will reveal the next BACKER BONUS TRADING CARD ART. These beauties will also be EXCLUSIVE to this campaign and found nowhere else.

You want more G&G lore? You wanna learn just how these characters stack up to each other? Well we want share it all with you so let’s get those backers together! Tell your friends, your coworkers, heck, even your momma will enjoy HAMMERELLA and GODS AND GEARS!

 

We will also be releasing this killer HAMMERELLA powering up print, the image that started it all, to all physical backers when we reach the $10,000 line! We are serious about these bonuses, folks! 

THE ART TELLS THE STORY.

Let’s take a closer look at some of these action packed pages. We will be posting new pages every few days during the campaign so even if you back early, make sure to come back and check out our updates on art AND backer bonuses!


$13,000 STRETCH GOAL!

We have SO many stories to tell in the G&G universe. Some so large in scale it takes 4 giant issues to tell. Others stories are smaller in scale but just as fun to tell. And what could be more fun and also small in scale than- THE BABY HAMMERELLA!
 

If we surpass our goal and get to $13,000 we will add 4 pages of short BABY HAMMERELLA stories of her time as an infant in The Garden Of Umbra. Here’s an adorable sampling of one of the first times BH accidentally summoned her powers. 

$15,000 STRETCH GOAL!

If we can work together to reach the $15,000 stretch goal we will add 8 glorious pages to the story.  There’s nothing a comic artist likes more than getting to spread out action, spend more time in outlandish scenes, and get the chance to show off their storytelling chops.

With 8 more pages we could do that and more! Think of the spreads, the splashes, and the double page spreads that await us all! 
 

Unfortunately there are no samples of that to show- just yet. But I believe we can get there together.
 

HAMMERELLA is on her way and she’s bringing fast paced, fantasy, action, and adventure from the farthest depths of the galaxy right down into your living room!

 

Back the baddest babe in the cosmos today!

 

A monetary donation is not the only way to help our campaign! FREE ways to help us:

  • Tell a friend! Tell your mom!
  • Share to social media - right from this page!
  • Invite us to join your podcast or livestreams
  • Follow the creative team on their social channels!
    • Ryan Winn - Twitter | Instagram | YouTube
story_txt:
New inked pages!  New colored pages!With the book expanded to 80 pages I thought I would share one more non spoiler page featuring Blue Astra with our girl, Hammerella.
 New Double Page Spread!The action gets pretty heated in Hammerella: Thundersmoke!Watch out for Ember Hawks in The Garden of Umbra. 16+ pages added!Gods And Gears co-creator and artist, Dean Kotz, is coming on board the Hammerella train. Dean will be providing 5 new pages, 3 at the start and 2 at the end, that will help connect this story to the Gods And Gears universe.But that's not all! We are also going to add the first 12 page published Gods And Gears story, THIS MAP OF MISHAP, in the Hammerella trade at no additional cost to backers. We're looking at 16+ more pages!Those that backed already just got a huge bonus! We can't ever thank our fans enough but we can try.Here is some of Dean's great art from that story. OVER 200 BACKERS!With over 200 backers we now have 4 new trading cards going into all physical orders!  IT’S HAMMER TIME!Are you ready for HAMMERELLA?! Cuz she’s on her way! HAMMERELLA: THUNDERSMOKE is a 64+ page comic full of action, fantasy, and adventure that tells the story of a being that descended from gods and witches. Stranded on a distant planet as a child, HAMMERELLA learned quickly that in order to survive she had to be deadlier than the beasts that hunted her. Eventually finding herself in the midst of a galactic war, HAMMERELLA encounters ember hawks, razor wolves, giant mechs, and a rogue naval flight squadron called BLUE ASTRA.
 THE “GODS AND GEARS” UNIVERSEGODS AND GEARS is an ongoing indie comic series published by ALTERNA COMICS and created by myself (Ryan Winn), Dean Kotz, and Wes Locher. The series focuses on two boys (JIMMY and ELI) and their awesome adventures chasing down ancient magic, alien artifacts, and futuristic technology.Do you need to have read GODS AND GEARS to enjoy HAMMERELLA?Absolutely not! This is a story that can be enjoyed on its own, but reading both will provide you with a deeper understanding of this fantastical world and the dynamic characters that live in it. So for readers that may have missed out on GODS AND GEARS the first time around and would like a more complete experience, GODS AND GEARS #1-4 is also available on this campaign. THE CREATIVE TEAMNot only will I be writing and coloring this as I do with the regular GODS AND GEARS series, but I will be doing the pencils and inks as well. This will also provide co-creator and regular series artist, Dean Kotz, the chance to move ahead on GODS AND GEARS issues 5-8: “The Heart Of Racing”. I spent most of my career as an inker and illustrator, delivering top quality work and making deadlines so I’m looking forward to bringing that experience to you --the reader!More interior artwork down below!We’re exhilarated by the overwhelmingly positive response to the GODS AND GEARS stories and it’s been so rad seeing families read it together. Thank you for your support on this project and for allowing us to expand the GODS AND GEARS universe!B-B-B-BACKER BONUS ALERT!!!Weather you already love the GODS AND GEARS characters or weather they are new to your collection, you are not going to want to miss out on our big BACKER BONUS TRADING CARDS, These trading cards not only contain exclusive artwork, they will be packed full of added lore and P-P-P-POWER STATS,You help us to reach 50 backers and EVERYONE ordering a print copy or higher perk will get this exclusive collector card in their order- for FREE! Help us reach 100 and we release the card for another great addition to the G&G world- Commander Rayo Tankara! Leader of the rogue naval flight squad called Blue Astra.These cards are only the beginning! As each card is released we will reveal the next BACKER BONUS TRADING CARD ART. These beauties will also be EXCLUSIVE to this campaign and found nowhere else.You want more G&G lore? You wanna learn just how these characters stack up to each other? Well we want share it all with you so let’s get those backers together! Tell your friends, your coworkers, heck, even your momma will enjoy HAMMERELLA and GODS AND GEARS! We will also be releasing this killer HAMMERELLA powering up print, the image that started it all, to all physical backers when we reach the $10,000 line! We are serious about these bonuses, folks! THE ART TELLS THE STORY.Let’s take a closer look at some of these action packed pages. We will be posting new pages every few days during the campaign so even if you back early, make sure to come back and check out our updates on art AND backer bonuses!$13,000 STRETCH GOAL!We have SO many stories to tell in the G&G universe. Some so large in scale it takes 4 giant issues to tell. Others stories are smaller in scale but just as fun to tell. Here’s an adorable sampling of one of the first times BH accidentally summoned her powers. $15,000 STRETCH GOAL!If we can work together to reach the $15,000 stretch goal we will add 8 glorious pages to the story.  There’s nothing a comic artist likes more than getting to spread out action, spend more time in outlandish scenes, and get the chance to show off their storytelling chops.With 8 more pages we could do that and more! story:
Continuing the successful Kickstarter that raised $37,456... FRANK CHO creates an epic, limited edition cover to one of Dynamite's greatest heroes!

Frank Cho is no stranger to rendering bold and beautiful women, and one of the boldest and most beautiful characters he excels at is RED SONJA. The "She-Devil with a Sword" is in the middle of a red-hot run and Dynamite is thrilled and honored to work with the master himself – Frank Cho – to offer fans this limited edition cover featuring his incredible image of the fiery warrior.

 Watch the video to hear Frank talk about his work on the cover and why fan support is important right now during the pandemic.

The COVID-19 pandemic has affected the entire world in a variety of ways and the comics industry is a market that's suffering greatly right now. With comic shops forced to close their doors for safety, and their main source of distribution on hiatus, publishers and creators are feeling the strain. The passion of comic readers has always been a driving force for the comics business, but direct, online support from fans is now essential to the current state of the business, right now. If the comic industry is going to survive this pandemic, the fans will be the ones keeping creators and publishers in business!

 

ADD ANY OF THESE ITEMS BELOW TO YOUR ORDER DURING CHECK-OUT!

 

An EXCLUSIVE CHALLENGE COIN, custom sculpted in gold-colored, plated brass. The 1.5" diameter coin has an image of Red Sonja on one side and Frank Cho's signature on the other.

Also add a signed or unsigned lithograph and have Frank's work ready to frame on your wall. The lithograph is printed on #100 Euro Silk White paperstock at 18x24".

All CGC copies are graded at 9.8 or higher! Pre-order all 3 MAIN covers at a great rate.

About RED SONJA #13...

Frank's cover to issue #13 marks the beginning of Year Two in MARK RUSSELL's epic tale. Artist, BOB Q (Captain America, Fantastic Four) illustrates this next chapter in Red Sonja's adventure to stop a world conqueror and his fatal prophecy while trying to maintain rule over a homeland set for decimation.

This is the perfect issue to jump on, or add the previous graphic novels to your order and start at the very beginning!

About FRANK CHO

Frank Cho is one of the most popular artists working in comics today. He is known for his creator owned properties Fight Girls, Liberty Meadows and Skybourne, as well as his covers and interior artwork for Marvel Comics that include The Mighty Avengers, New Ultimates, Savage Wolverine, and Totally Awesome Hulk. For DC Frank has completed over 60 Harley Quinn covers that have proven to be wildly popular.

LIKE SO MANY OF YOUR FAVORITE ARTISTS AND WRITERS (COMICS OR OTHERWISE), FRANK WORKS FREELANCE AND MAKES HIS LIVING BASED ON THE PROJECTS HE'S HIRED TO DO. WITH PUBLISHERS SLOWING DOWN OR COMPLETELY CEASING PRODUCTION OF NEW COMICS, FRANK AND MANY OTHER CREATORS FACE THE CHALLENGE OF SUPPORTING THEIR FAMILIES.
