story:
Special Update September 2022

Due to health and other issues the book has been delayed but is still in production and will be delivered to backers in the first part of 2022. Updates will be posted to keep you informed of progress. Please also visit the Simone & Ajax webpage for previews of the work in progress. Thanks for your patience in these weird times!

Fun! The world needs more fun these days, and "Simone & Ajax" are back in 4 all-new, wacky adventures. The collection, titled "Lemmings and Tigers and Bears! Oh, My!," is available in both print and digital editions, brought to you by Eisner and Inkwell-award winner and Hugo and Harvey-nominee creator/writer/artist, me, Andrew Pepoy. With over 30 years in comics, you may know me better for my work on Fables, The Simpsons, The X-Men, Red Sonja, Doctor Who, Archie, Sonic the Hedgehog, and many more comics for DC, Marvel, IDW, Dark Horse, Archie, and others. However, my favorite thing I've ever done is my own creation, "The Adventures of Simone and Ajax." Simone, a fun-loving, 20-something girl, and her best pal, Ajax, a small, green dinosaur, first appeared 30 years ago and have since appeared in many comics and been nominated for the Harvey Award for Special Award for Humor. My true comics love is Simone & Ajax. I'm very excited to make new tales of them, and I'm asking for your help to do that. Described by a reviewer as "...like the best issues of Cerebus, and a mood that harkens Bone," and by a reader as "...the look of an Archie comic but the sensibilities of a Marx Brothers movie," in this 128-page book there will be tales of pirates... 

... the Old West...

... vampires and werewolves, and the always popular "hardboiled" Ajax, Private Eye...

... plus lots of lemmings! 

Of the book's 128 pages, over 100 pages will be new comics, along with a collection of other Simone & Ajax artwork, such as covers and Christmas cards, some never seen by the general public, all wrapped in a new cover. As of the launch date, all the new comics are written and thumbnailed, about 60% are drawn, and over 50 pages are colored, with digital colors supplied by the colorist of the previous series, Jason Millet (Archie vs Predator). While a few images are here on this page (and I'll be adding more as finished), I want you to have a better idea what you're getting, so you can read previews of some of the stories at the Simone & Ajax webpage by clicking HERE. 

Kickstarter got us over the fun-ish line, to pay Jason (He has mouths to feed!), pay for printing, and get it out to you connoisseurs of fine and fun comics, but for those of you who missed it there, here it is on Indiegogo. Thank you in advance for your support in any form. A message of support is wonderful! I really need help getting the word out, so sharing this on Facebook or other social media among your friends and even the enemies you think would like it would be a huge help. Please use the link: https://bit.ly/simoneandajax. But the most direct way you can support me and my comics making is to pledge! I have a number of levels and rewards for you to choose from. I know times are tough for many, so anything will be greatly appreciated. Want to send a buck or two to just support the cause? Thank you! Want the digital edition? Thank you! Or get the standard hardcover? Thank you! There are also a few Mystery Boxes left! Every box will contain the new book, a variety of other books/comics/etc. that I love, and some kind of art drawn by me. 

There are art rewards! (NOTE: I will be adding in more art rewards as the Kickstarter is settled) I have never sold a piece of published Simone & Ajax art in all the 30 years of the series, so this is a very rare chance to get not only Simone & Ajax art, but a cover at that!

 Or want art of dinosaurs of a different kind? I have art from my recent Dinosaucers mini-series, and you can choose from a random interior page or a specific cover.  

Examples of interior "Dinosaucers" pages by Andrew Pepoy, sent randomly, available as rewards.

And there's more! My last two "Archie" covers! My last "Doctor Who" cover and "Katy Keene" pin-up! And more!

Want to get a combination of rewards not listed here? Just message me, and let's see what we can make happen. All cover art purchases get their books with a signature and doodle. If you wish to add those to a reward level that does already include that, please add $5 for signature or $10 for signature & doodle to your pledge amount using the Add-On feature.

If you have any questions at all, I'm here to answer them because I want you to feel good about choosing to help me. I know I'm asking something of all of you, to put your faith in me and in a book you can't yet get your hands on, but I hope my 30 years of reliably making comics will help you trust me to finish and get this to you as soon as possible. We all know the world needs more fun, so I thank you in advance for helping me bring some jokes, silliness, lemmings (lots of lemmings!), and adventure to you and others. Simone & Ajax thank you, too! 

Andrew Pepoy has worked for U.S., Canadian, British, and French publishers on hundreds of comics on such characters and titles as The Simpsons, Fables, Batman, The X-Men, Iron Man, Star Wars, Wallace & Gromit, Scooby Doo, Betty & Veronica, Lanfeust, Uncle Scrooge, and many more over the last 30 years. In 2000 Andrew redesigned Little Orphan Annie and drew the newspaper strip for the next year, and in 2005 he brought his knack for retro glamour with a modern twist to writing and drawing a revival of the classic Archie Comics character, Katy Keene. Since 1990 he has written and drawn many stories of his own Harvey Award-nominated creation, The Adventures of Simone & Ajax, which has been collected in book form by IDW and Andrew's own imprint, Spicy Tomato Studios. Nominated several times, Andrew won an Eisner Award in 2009 and has also won an Inkwell Award and been nominated for the Harvey and Hugo Awards. He lives in Chicago. His recent work includes drawing a Dinosaucers mini-series for Lion Forge, inking the 50th Anniversary graphic novel adaptation of the The Beatles' Yellow Submarine for Titan, inking various Simpsons comics for Bongo Comics, art for MAD Magazine, a run as guest artist on the Dick Tracy newspaper comic strip, inking and drawing Die Kitty Die for Astrocomics, and drawing covers for Doctor Who, Archie vs. Predator II, Red Sonja, Lady Death, and other titles.

Jason Millet (project colorist) is an illustrator, storyboard artist, and comic artist. He has provided storyboards and concept art for films and television for NBC-Universal, Sony, Disney, Fox, HBO, and Amazon among others. He has also produced a wide range of artwork for a long list of advertising clientele and publishers. He resides in Chicago with his lovely wife and daughter.

Design help from Danielle Reynolds at DMR Creative Group.

 

Risks & Challenges

If 2020 has taught us anything it's that we can't predict what weird thing will happen next. I've tried to plan for what contingencies I can with the help of many more-experienced crowd-funders. I have dreamed of making this book for many years, so you can be sure I will do my best to get it finished and in your hands on time, but if bumps in the road happen I will keep you informed.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

I can't do this without your help, not just backing the book, but I also need your help getting the word out.  Please share this on social media and with your friends using the link https://bit.ly/simoneandajax

And please share our pages and posts:

website: www.simoneandajax.com

FB: www.facebook.com/simoneandajax

Twitter: @SimoneAjax

Instagram: @AndrewPepoy

"Katy Keene" 2nd series pin-up art by Andrew Pepoy. Available via pledge.

"The Heap" #1 cover art by Andrew Pepoy. Available via pledge.

"Wonderous/Yaya Han" cover art by Andrew Pepoy. Available via pledge.

story:
Rosemari Susan Oppenheimer is the pilot of the Hermit Crab: A one-of-a-kind set of Armor engineered to adapt to any situation.

Mari sails throughout her universe called Ouranos, offering services as a "Contractor." Require a package to be delivered safely? She’ll guarantee it arrives in one piece. Need a bodyguard? She's got you covered. Got a primordial monster in your neighborhood? She’ll one-shot the thing. (Just don’t be within a hundred miles of her, or you’re likely to get caught in the explosion!)

    • Recommended for Ages: 16+
    • Genre: Comedy/Sci-Fi/Action/Drama

 

The setting of Issues #3-4, Thalasania is a swirling network of oceans
which have coalesced into an aquatic super-continent.

 

Story 2: Thalasania

Following a costly outcome against the pirate band Neontooth, Rosemari pauses her vendetta to travel to Thalasania, a floating network of oceans which have merged to form a massive super-continent. Home to the Psari, a diverse species of water breathers, this aquatic paradise is home to valuable resources - and ancient dangers. Her first solo job begins as a simple monster hunt, evolving into a royal dilemma which places the fate of millions squarely in her klutsy lap.

  • Issues #3-4
  • Pages: 76

 

Cover for Issue #3

Cover for Issue #4

 

Story 1: Missed Shot

On the eve of retirement, Doctor Masaka treats himself to a luxury cruise. Unfortunately for everyone aboard, his derpy protege has come along! Easily bored and impetuous, Mari quickly drives everyone around her nuts. A hunky space janitor named Songbird invites her to a romantic ball, until their fun is cut short by the Pirate brigade, Neontooth! Mari armors up and engages in spectacular battle... but who's going to pay for the damages?

  • Issues #1-2 (Originally released January 2020)
  • Pages: 63

 

Exo-suit vs. Cyborg: Action from Issue #2!

 

In Ouranos...

Breathable air is everywhere. There's no right side up, or upside down; gravity is relative to local chunks of mass. An abundance of lifeforms reside on countless floating islands & continents. Mari's species, the Anthropi, occupy only a small archipelago in these swirling, endless heavens.

Mari's greatest professional challenge is deciding which of the Hermit Crab's many tools to carry into a job. Success depends on a variety of factors including environment, opponents, and battery usage: The more Mari carries, more her resources deplete. If her suit runs ever ran out of juice... well, let's hope that never happens!

Winning a fight doesn’t always mean punching the hardest, or shooting the biggest laser. Curious bystanders are always nearby in Ouranos, and confrontations are almost never simple contests of attrition. They will require planning, knowledge, skill, resource management, clear thinking, precise execution, and wit. If Mari isn't careful, she may discover there are unforeseen costs to being so overpowered.

Rosemari enjoys the view from her private quarters.

 

Production:


All my self-published comics are homemade! I’ve been making indie comics for over fifteen years, and have a decade of printmaking experience. I've been told my books far exceed American industry standards (they’ve been called European). In the past seven months this year, I've sold almost 1,500 books!

Every title offered in this campaign (including Mari Sue #1-2: Second Edition) will be printed at an oversized 8.25"x10.5", allowing an enormous amount of detail to be packed into every panel. Interiors will be rendered in full color and printed on excellent, durable stock. Covers will be glossy with gold flourishes. Every copy will also be signed.

 

Goodies & Collectors Edition:

As with the books above, all the following items will be proudly homemade!

  • Trading Cards: Backers will receive one randomly selected card. Each card (from a set of four) will be unique to this campaign, and 1 out of every 100 will be a Gold Card! (Collectors Edition backers are be guaranteed to receive a Gold Card.)
  • Handmade Card: A gorgeous handmade card, inked and colored with copic markers on thick board.
  • Mini Poster: A high quality art print only available through this campaign. Approximately 9x12.
  • T-Shirt: An exclusive design, available only to backers of this campaign. (Design to be announced later.)
  • Pocket & Desktop Galaxies: Your own unique, colorful piece of Ouranos! Pocket galaxies will be keychain-sized. Desktop galaxies are palm-sized, making excellent coasters!

Pocket galaxies!

 

About the Author:

I'm the proud recipient of the Silver trophy in the 7th Annual International Manga Awards (2014) for my Graphic Novel Paris, and have had comics released in multiple languages by publishers including TOKYOPOP and YEN Press. I'm a fulltime Illustrator & Animator who has worked on a number of indie titles in both video games and comics.

My lifetime goal is to help make the medium of comics as respected and widely read in the United States as they are in Japan and Europe. With Mari Sue, I want to deliver an awesome series to the widest possible audience, one that everyone can enjoy!

 

Gallery:

If you've read this far, thanks for your time! I hope you're looking forward to reading more of Mari's adventures as I am to continue drawing them =)

Bork is a feral beast who defends his stash to the death.

Mari sails throughout her universe called Ouranos, offering services as a "Contractor." Require a package to be delivered safely? She’ll guarantee it arrives in one piece. Need a bodyguard? She's got you covered. Got a primordial monster in your neighborhood? She’ll one-shot the thing. (Just don’t be within a hundred miles of her, or you’re likely to get caught in the explosion!)    • Recommended for Ages: 16+    • Genre: Comedy/Sci-Fi/Action/Drama The setting of Issues #3-4, Thalasania is a swirling network of oceanswhich have coalesced into an aquatic super-continent. Story 2: ThalasaniaFollowing a costly outcome against the pirate band Neontooth, Rosemari pauses her vendetta to travel to Thalasania, a floating network of oceans which have merged to form a massive super-continent. story:
The Story

Follow investigative reporter Laura Langley as she unearths the tragic history of her newly inherited home & cabin in North Hudson,NY. This is a tale that started 100 years earlier when this very land was a loggers camp in the early 1900s. Laura's investigation finds her learning of her family's past & accidentally re-awakens a restless spirit! Find out what else is haunting the pages of this completed series! 

**This is the Collected Edition, (NOW 98 pages and it is ALSO Hardcover and the size has increased to 9 X 12 inches!!) of beautiful story and art ** PRINTED IN AMERICA! *** 

Written by Frankie Tartamella
Fully illustrated & put together by Vinnie Tartamella






** Ashcan with  Kelsey Shannon cover, Winner of the Through the Woods drawing contest  

 Update **SECOND CHANCE at getting this beautiful Ashcan is here. Check out the tiers to purchase it**









 











First Major Stretch Goals LOCKED in!! 

  •  At 10k HARDCOVER will be unlocked! Two extra pages are added, 98 pages in total!
  • At 12k The size of the book will go up to 8.5 x 11 inches!!


     


    Shadow of the Kraken is my newest campaign, Check it out here:
    http://igg.me/at/kraken1 


    And check out my other comic series, in demand and shipping right now!!
     City of Venus: Dead City
    http://Igg.me/at/cityofvenus

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute:

  • Remember to share and support this campaign on social media!

story:
Idle Thuggery looks at the superhero genre from the perspective of an up and coming henchman struggling to survive and get ahead in an industry dominated by death and mayhem.

 

After a an oddly fortuitous encounter with an old school friend in a dark alleyway, Frank Grey finds himself suddenly working as a low-level henchman for one of Kenton City's rising arch-villains. Frank is thrust into a world of intrigue and excessive violence, where promotion is a matter of survival rather than skill. On his second mission the newly-made henchman receives a fatal wound, but does not die as he should; a fact which raises some intriguing possibilities.

Super Serious Comics presents the first three issues of Idle Thuggery and a combined Graphic Novel (which includes issues 1-3) with additional art and a new cover from Willi Roberts.

  • Issue 1: 38 pages, full colour
  • Issue 2: 34 pages, full colour
  • Issue 3: 42 pages, full colour
  • Graphic Novel: (Issues 1-3 plus additional artwork) 132 pages, full colour

Note: Idle Thuggery contains graphic violence and Mature content.

US Supporters: We've sourced a US-based printer to ensure that we keep postage costs down and get the comic to your door as soon as we can!

Aussie Supporters: We've also sourced a local, Aussie printer so that you don't get slammed with postage costs!

Original issues can be ordered in both print and digial editions, including standard covers.

The combined 3 issue graphic novel version of Idle Thuggery is 132 pages and includes a load of extra artwork and behind the scenes details, as well as a new cover by superstar artist Willi Roberts!

Graphic Novel Standard Cover

Once we hit 30 backers, the full colour Moises May variant cover will be available on the Graphic Novel! Backers will have a choice between standard and variant covers. 

Moises May Variant Cover [Draft - Full Colour Version Coming]

 

Get a behind the scenes look at the creative process behind Idle Thuggery. Extras in the graphic novel include bespoke artwork, character sketches and some artork which didn't make it into the final version of the book. 

 

 

This project features a bespoke soundtrack with tracks ranging from smooth, chill hip hop to more gritty rock-hop numbers. 

Soundtrack Album Link

 

 

 

 

Idle Thuggery features an international creative team with two primary artists and an in-house music producer responsible for the project soundtrack.  

 

Thanks so much for your support and for helping Super Serious Comics bring our stories to life and get them into hands of awesome readers all around the world. 

Cheers

Morgan Quaid

story:
FINAL BOSS VARIANT COVER!

https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/final-boss-graphic-novel

You can ADD ON my FINAL BOSS VARIANT cover to ANY PHYSICAL REWARD LEVEL!

Tyler Kirkham's creator owned comic book FINAL BOSS featuring my variant cover!

When video games and comic books collide, you get FINAL BOSS. The ultimate fighting game graphic novel experience! The book is a 58 page comic, with over 40 pages of story plus added content like character bios, behind the scenes sketches and cover gallery! 

ARCHIVE UNIVERSE

To save the future, they have to change their past! The Batlantic Studios comic book crossover event of 2021! 

To fix the broken time line and save the future, Ledge has to convince Era Nalyd who wears The WarHood, that Monument needs them to get Versus to help capture Cyst! This project was funded by all the awesome backers on kickstarter at www.archiveuniverse.com and now I'm offering them for sale here! These books are finished, printed and ready to be mailed to you! 


ARCHIVE UNIVERSE is THREE, 52 page black and white square bound super hero action comic books! Featuring ALL of my Batlantic Studios characters! In this campaign you can get signed copies of ARCHIVE UNIVERSE issue ONE and TWO and a RAW pencil only version comic! I'll also be sending awesome bonus stuff like comics and stickers so jump in now! Thank you for supporting my work! 

YOU CAN GET ALL THREE BOOKS! THE COMPLETE STORY!

ADD AN ORIGINAL ART SKETCH COVER!

I'll draw one of my characters on a blank sketch cover for you!

www.dylanandrewsart.com • www.batlanticstudios.com • www.makecomicscool.com • www.batlanticstore.com • www.dylandistraction.com

story:
THE OFFICIAL COVER DESIGN IS COMPLETED!

I commissioned my friend Ryan Haddix (who contributed artwork for the back of book 1 & 2) to design a cover for issue #3.  I've been a fan of his work for a while, and am very satisfied with the design he came up with for this next comic.  The cover image I previously had was a place holder until this artwork was done.  So here is the cover for this next book! Follow Ryan on instagram HERE.

Requiem of the Crazies #3 is the third installment in the harrowing 8 part comic book series about two bums who uncover an insane cult leader's nefarious plot to drug and brainwash the homeless community.  For THIS issue, I'm planning to have around 64 interior pages in full color, 6.875" x 10.5".  Along with the comic book, there are a variety of other perks you can get, so check it out.

COMICS AND PRODUCTS WILL SHIP OUT BY OR BEFORE AUGUST, 2021

 

           What would you do if you completely lost it?  Your job, your home, your family... your mind.  Who would take care of you? Would anyone care? Where would you go?.. Perhaps you would be forced, like so many hundreds of thousands, to live on the streets.  Homeless. a bum.  Forgotten and overlooked by the society you were cast from...  For Dante, these hypothetical questions have become a reality.  A young troubled man who finds himself living on the streets with a gun in his mouth and no where to go, is given hope for a new life when he is taken in by a streetwise bum named Vern.  Dante is introduced to the underground world of the homeless, the Crazies, where a bum can stay for the month of May and wont need any money.  A sanctuary for all those who have been forsaken... If only it were that easy.  When corrupt politicians, drug dealers and an insane cult leader begin fighting for power, the meek homeless become nothing more than pawns in a malicious game of power.  "I thought being homeless would be really easy", Dante thinks, as him and Vern set off on their journey to fight the evil forces bent on corrupting the minds of the homeless. 

CLICK HERE TO READ ISSUE 1 & 2

  Previously...   After Dante is taken to the homeless encampment, under the wise wings of Vern, he is introduced to his new peers consisting of ex-drug addicts, prostitutes and felons.  Growing unease amongst the citizens of Bum Town starts to manifest once a mysterious brutish police-like presence begins to establish itself as the new authority over the homeless... Providing them with food and water, but also arresting the non-obedient trouble makers and hauling them away to an unknown location.  No one knows who these men work for, but some suspect they are a secret agency operated by the city's corrupt Mayor.  Others speculate they work for the enigmatic and elusive 'leader' of Bum Town, known only as King Kallen.  After secretly following these thugs back to their base, Dante discovers the dark fate that awaits the bums who are taken away... and an even more disturbing truth about what is put into the food provided to them.  

 

 

 

IN PART 3... 

Growing tensions begin to arise between the local drug dealers of Bum Town, and the hardworking blue collar families who have seen their neighborhoods declining with the influx of homeless people being bussed into the area.  As Mayor Warf and King Kallen work together to take absolute control of the drug trade in the area, war becomes inevitable.  Unfortunately for our hero Dante, he is now a fugitive of Bum Town, and at this very moment is being caravanned by the police, right back into the center of the outbreaking war.  This time, he is on his own.  Helpless, vulnerable, and missing his mentor, Vern, who was captured by King Kallen's henchmen...

Here are the first 3 pages I have done so far, just to give you a taste...

PAGE 4 - 6

PAGES 7 - 9

 

All of the funding will go to production of the comics and products. I plan to have everything ready to ship out before AUGUST of 2021. 

All tiers will get a copy of Requiem of the Crazies #3 comic book, 64-ish pages, printed on high quality paper. Additional perks include:

• If you missed out on the first two issues of Requiem, you can buy them individually on my website. LINKS AT BOTTOM OF THIS PAGE. These comics are 6.875"x10.5" in full color, 60-64 pages. 

• The cover artwork for Issue #3 has yet to be designed, so this is just a placeholder graphic.

• I offer this product SIGNED as well, depending on the perk you choose.

• Issue #3 will include artwork contributions from talented artists, as well as extra content.

• And 11x17in FOLDED POSTER (I have to fold it in half to ship it). Artwork by Deathink, who is an incredible artist.

• I'm offering 3 stickers. All of them are weather resistant and perfect for putting on your laptop, or maybe the inside of a urinal. 

• This sew on patch contains the sigil of the "Safe Haven" cult. It will look great on any jackets you decide to put it on. (This is just a mock up image)

• 100% REAL MEAT! This one inch enamel pin will be made of shiny brass.  (This is a mock up graphic to give you a rough idea of how the pins will look)

• Want to embed your name in the pages of history? Well, YOU CAN. If you choose this perk, you can have your name printed in the back of ISSUE #3 on a special thank you page! 

My name is Rusty Cage. I’m a musician, artist, beef jerky connoisseur and YouTuber. After running my first successful Indiegogo campaign for Requiem of the Crazies #1, I knew I had to continue this journey into comic books.  It's always been a dream of mine to make this comic series, and now with your help, it is becoming a reality.  Wanna learn more about my music or youtube ventures? You can do so through the links below.  

CONTACT ME:  RequiemoftheCrazies@gmail.com

• WEBSITE

• TWITTER

• INSTAGRAM    

• FACEBOOK   

• YOUTUBE 

• MY MUSIC

 

*****BEFORE YOU CONTRIBUTE*****

* Double check your shipping address to make sure it is complete and accurate.  This includes apartment number, building number, etc...  

* If you choose to donate and want the perks, do so by actually clicking on the perks.  Last campaign, many people donated to the campaign but didn't actually select a perk, so it didn't show up on the reports. 

* FOR EVERYONE WHO WANTS THEIR NAME IN THE BACK OF THE BOOK, make the name on your contribution the name you want printed in the book.  You don't have to do this for your shipping address, but for your contribution name.  This way I know how you want to be recognized.  THANK YOU.

All of the funding will go to production of the comics and products. I plan to have everything ready to ship out before AUGUST of 2021. 
All tiers will get a copy of Requiem of the Crazies #3 comic book, 64-ish pages, printed on high quality paper. Additional perks include:

• If you missed out on the first two issues of Requiem, you can buy them individually on my website. LINKS AT BOTTOM OF THIS PAGE. These comics are 6.875"x10.5" in full color, 60-64 pages. 

• The cover artwork for Issue #3 has yet to be designed, so this is just a placeholder graphic.
• I offer this product SIGNED as well, depending on the perk you choose.
• Issue #3 will include artwork contributions from talented artists, as well as extra content.


• And 11x17in FOLDED POSTER (I have to fold it in half to ship it). Artwork by Deathink, who is an incredible artist.


• I'm offering 3 stickers. All of them are weather resistant and perfect for putting on your laptop, or maybe the inside of a urinal. 


• This sew on patch contains the sigil of the "Safe Haven" cult. It will look great on any jackets you decide to put it on. (This is just a mock up image)

• 100% REAL MEAT! This one inch enamel pin will be made of shiny brass.  (This is a mock up graphic to give you a rough idea of how the pins will look)

• Want to embed your name in the pages of history? Well, YOU CAN. If you choose this perk, you can have your name printed in the back of ISSUE #3 on a special thank you page! 



My name is Rusty Cage. I’m a musician, artist, beef jerky connoisseur and YouTuber. After running my first successful Indiegogo campaign for Requiem of the Crazies #1, I knew I had to continue this journey into comic books.  It's always been a dream of mine to make this comic series, and now with your help, it is becoming a reality.  Wanna learn more about my music or youtube ventures? You can do so through the links below.  
CONTACT ME:  RequiemoftheCrazies@gmail.com
• WEBSITE

• TWITTER

• INSTAGRAM    
• FACEBOOK   
• YOUTUBE 
• MY MUSIC

 



*****BEFORE YOU CONTRIBUTE*****

* Double check your shipping address to make sure it is complete and accurate.  This includes apartment number, building number, etc...  
* If you choose to donate and want the perks, do so by actually clicking on the perks.  Last campaign, many people donated to the campaign but didn't actually select a perk, so it didn't show up on the reports. 
* FOR EVERYONE WHO WANTS THEIR NAME IN THE BACK OF THE BOOK, make the name on your contribution the name you want printed in the book.  You don't have to do this for your shipping address, but for your contribution name.  This way I know how you want to be recognized.  THANK YOU.

story:
EPIC LEGENDARY FANTASY IN A PREMIUM GRAPHIC NOVEL

Bear witness to the sequel of the critically acclaimed fantasy universe VESTIGE! A world where legendary weapons of the past collide with the dawn of the modern era! These weapons bestow god like supernatural powers to ordinary human beings turning them into super heroes ...or super villains! Many seek to acquire these relics of power including a mysterious organization called The Archive, a world wide network of spies and mercenaries trained to seek out and retrieve these artifacts of lore. The Vestige universe features historical accuracy blended seamlessly with mythology and folklore. Welcome to the premier alternative timeline fantasy adventure!

Our story picks up mid mission as the beautiful but deadly Mathilda Klein, an elite sharpshooter and undercover agent of the mysterious Archive, is in desperate pursuit of a powerful unidentified relic. The dagger wielded by wanted murderer, former London dock worker Charles Gemmel is strange indeed. What mystery lies hidden beneath the sheen of this blood soaked blade? Find out in Vestige #2!!

This mind bending fantasy adventure is created by The Wizard of the War Campaign: Gat Hanzo and brought to you by outstanding publisher (Rohan K Pall) well known for producing the exceptional quality previous work of Vestige #1. We aim to provide you with ultimate satisfaction in product and elite customer service.

We also aim ship out your products in a timely manner and if possible exceed expectations of delivery date. No more waiting a year on books.

Both books are each 48 pages in length. VESTIGE #2 cover art is by Pat Maxton as well as interior art. Black Dragon edition of VESTIGE #1 is drawn by Donal DeLay with a cover by Andrew Huerta.

PRINT QUALITY AND BOOK QUALITY

This project will be released in full color prestige format, with high quality interior and cover stock pages and a perfect bound spine.

Every effort has been and will be made to assure our backers of receiving a product worthy of their trust, shipped in a timely manner in the finest packaging available.

BLACK DRAGON COVER ART AND BLACK DRAGON STICKER

This will be supplied as progress is available, thank you to Mr. Andrew Huerta for his fantastic work

INTERIOR ART

Interior art by Pat Maxton aka Doodle Bags

 

 

 

 

Please note that IndieGoGo automatically allows returns within a two-week window from within their system. After that time period, all sales are final as we will be making a timely print order and pursuing immediate fulfillment, to get this in your hands as soon as possible. We value your patronage and endeavor to give you a top quality graphic novel. Thank you brethren for making this possible.

story:
AUTOMARTYR #3 OF 6

SHIPS JUL 2021

 

Blaksol and Skahl find themselves surrounded by mutie hordes and are fast running out of options. Can they overcome the horrors lurking deep within the Sump? Can Blaksol make it back uphive? Or will even bigger, nastier surprises await?

 

NEW COVER ART

 

AUTOMARTYR #2 OF 6

SHIPS MAY 2021 

Last seen at Gehenna, Blaksol collects payment due for the assassination of The Etharch. Betrayed by Shadis Thorg and hunted by the Cataphracts, Blaksol has little choice but to find an alternate way to get up-hive to the Pinnacle. An encounter with a former comrade-in-arms sheds light on a dark past and leaves Blaksol with more than he bargained for.

 

COVER ART

 

#2 INNER PAGES

#2 NEW CHARACTERS

Enter SKAHL, one of the last few surviving members of the 666th that was mysteriously wiped out in the last invasion. 

 

AUTOMARTYR #2 + #3 Bundle 

Enjoy SGD5 off when you get AUTOMARTYR #2 + #3 in one bundle. Friends across continents will also enjoy savings with shipping. Both books ship together.

Bonus (FULLY CLAIMED):

1st 30 backers of duo bundle #will receive a Pulpstar Comics sticker and an AUTOMARTYR sticker. 

 

AUTOMARTYR #1 OF 6

STORY

It is the year 2149. The world is divided into hive colonies and controlled by the ruling Triarchs. As one of the last few surviving members of the 666th, Blaksol finds himself trapped in the pit of Hive Absolumn. In exchange for passage uphive, Blaksol cuts a deal with a fixer to assassinate a god. 

Follow Blaksol as he fights his way through deadly Cataphracts, mutie hordes, augmented posthumans, killer robots and some of the Hive’s most dangerous scum, goons and henchmen!

#1 INNER PAGES


THE BOOKS

Automartyr is a limited edition 6-issue comic series. Each book is 32 pages B/W with full colour cover printed on high quality 105gsm silk coated paper. Each comic comes packed in a sealable bag and backing board.

Please continue to support our journey to completing the AUTOMARTYR series. Your names will eternalised on our HONOUR ROLL at https://www.pulpstarcomics.com/  (check out the ABOUT page)

Show some love by supporting or sharing this campaign with your pals and comic book fans through Twitter, IG, FB or any other platforms that can help get the word out on Blaksol's exploits. Thank you for backing independent comics!
